h4.p: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa

Dhātukathāpakaraṇadesanāya ^a^M0.0001^ea^^a^V0.0001^ea^ desadesakaparisāpadesā vuttappakārā evāti kālāpadesaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desento’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Tasseva anantaraṃ adesayī’’ti hi iminā vibhaṅgānantaraṃ dhātukathā desitāti tassā desanākālo apadiṭṭho hoti. Ye pana ‘‘vibhaṅgānantaraṃ ^a^V0.0002^ea^ kathāvatthupakaraṇaṃ desita’’nti vadanti, tesaṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipanto ^b^‘‘vibhaṅgānantaraṃ…pe… dassetu’’^eb^nti āha.

‘‘Kāmā te paṭhamā senā’’tiādivacanato (su. ni. 438; mahāni. 28; cūḷani. nandamāṇavapucchāniddesa 47) kilesaviddhaṃsanampi devaputtamārassa balavidhamananti sakkā vattuṃ, ‘‘appavattikaraṇavasena kilesābhisaṅkhāramārāna’’nti pana vuccamānattā khantibalasaddhābalādiānubhāvena ussāhaparisābalabhañjanameva devaputtamārassa balaviddhaṃsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Visayātikkamanaṃ^eb^ kāmadhātusamatikkamo. ^b^Samudayappahānapariññāvasenā^eb^ti pahānābhisamayapariññābhisamayānaṃ vasena. Nanu cetaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ bhañjanaṃ sāvakesupi labbhatevāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^‘‘parūpanissayarahita’’^eb^ntiādi. Vīrassa bhāvo vīriyanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahāvīriyoti mahāvīro’’^eb^ti. Mahāvīriyatā ca paripuṇṇavīriyapāramitāya caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena ^a^M0.0002^ea^ anaññasādhāraṇacatubbidhasammappadhānasampattiyā ca veditabbā. Tato eva hissa vīriyāhānisiddhipīti.

Khandhādike dhamme adhiṭṭhāya nissāya visayaṃ katvā abhidhammakathā pavattāti āha ^b^‘‘abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesaṃ kathanato^eb^ti tesaṃ khandhādīnaṃ kathābhāvato. Etena atthavisesasannissayo byañjanasamudāyo pakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā dhātuyo kathīyanti ettha, etena vāti ^b^dhātukathā,^eb^ tathāpavatto byañjanatthasamudāyo. Yadi evaṃ sattannampi pakaraṇānaṃ dhātukathābhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yadipī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^sātisaya^eb^nti savisesaṃ vicittātirekavasena anavasesato ca desanāya pavattattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā’’ti (dhātu. 5). Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ekadesakathanameva hi aññattha kata’’^eb^nti.

Idāni sāsane yesu dhātu-saddo niruḷho, tesaṃ vasena aññehipi asādhāraṇaṃ imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti khandhāyatanadhātūsu. Mahanto pabhedānugato visayo etāsanti ^b^mahāvisayā,^eb^ dhātuyo, na khandhāyatanāni appatarapadattā. Yena vā sabhāvena dhammā saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogehi uddesaniddese labhanti, so sabhāvo dhātu. Sā dhātu idha sātisayaṃ desitāti savisesaṃ dhātuyā kathanato idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘dhātukathā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sabhāvattho hi ayaṃ dhātu-saddo ‘‘dhātuso, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0003^ea^, sattā saṃsandantī’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 2.98) viya. ^b^Dhātubheda^eb^nti dhātuvibhāgaṃ. Pakaraṇanti vacanaseso. Kuto pakaraṇa-saddo labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tena yojanaṃ katvā^eb^ti tena pakaraṇa-saddena ‘‘dhātukathāva pakaraṇaṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇa’’nti yojanaṃ katvā. ^b^Taṃ dīpana^eb^nti taṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇassa atthadīpanaṃ, atthadīpanākārena pavattaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ. ‘‘Atthaṃ dīpayissāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘taṃ suṇāthā’’ti vadanto sotadvārānusārena tattha upadhāraṇe niyojetīti āha ^b^‘‘taṃdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho’’^eb^ti.
Ganthārambhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

1.^b^Cuddasavidhenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0003^ea^^a^V0.0004^ea^ cuddasappakārena, cuddasahi padehīti attho. Tattha ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’’ti idamekaṃ padaṃ, tathā ‘‘sampayogo vippayogo’’ti. ‘‘Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayutta’’ntiādīni pana tīṇi tīṇi padāni ekekaṃ padaṃ. Itaresu padavibhāgo suviññeyyova. ^b^Etehī^eb^ti saṅgahādippakārehi. Nayanaṃ pāpanaṃ, taṃ pana pavattanaṃ ñāpanañca hotīti ‘‘pavattīyati ñāyantī’’ti ca dvidhāpi attho vutto. Nayā eva uddisiyamānā mātikā. Atthadvayepi pavattanañāṇakiriyānaṃ karaṇabhāvena saṅgahādippakārā nayāti vuttā. Tenāha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘iminā saṅgahādikena nayenā’’ti (dhātu. aṭṭha. 1). ^b^Padāna^eb^nti atthadīpakānaṃ vacanānaṃ. Pajjati etena atthoti hi padaṃ. ^b^Padāna^eb^nti ca saṃsāmisambandhe sāmivacanaṃ, ^b^pakaraṇassā^eb^ti pana avayavāvayavīsambandhe.

2.^b^Tadatthānī^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādatthāni. Paṭicca samuppajjati saṅkhārādikaṃ etasmāti hi paṭiccasamuppādo, paccekaṃ avijjādiko paccayadhammo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅkhārapiṭake ‘‘dvādasa paccayā, dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā’’ti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti khandhādīnaṃ. ^b^Tathādassitāna^eb^nti gaṇanuddesavibhāgamattena dassitānaṃ. Kasmā panettha paṭiccasamuppādo dvādasabhāveneva gahito, nanu tattha bhavo kammabhavādibhedena, sokādayo ca sarūpatoyeva idha pāḷiyaṃ gahitāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ‘‘pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā’’ti evaṃ vutte aṭṭhakathāvacane. Kammabhavassa bhāvanabhāvena, upapattibhavassa bhavanabhāvena. Padatthato pana kammabhavo ^a^V0.0005^ea^ bhavati etasmāti bhavo, itaro bhavati, bhavanaṃ vāti. ^b^Tannidānadukkhabhāvenā^eb^ti jarāmaraṇanidānadukkhabhāvena.

‘‘Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā’’ti idampi dhātukathāya mātikākittanamevāti ‘‘sabbāpi…pe… mātikāti ayaṃ dhātukathāmātikāto bahiddhā vuttā’’ti vacanaṃ asambhāvento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M0.0004^ea^. ^b^Pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā^eb^ dhātukathāya mātikābhāvenāti attho. Kāmañcettha mātikābhāvena vuttā, pakaraṇantaragatattā pana aññato gahetabbarūpā ito bahibhūtā nāma honti, sarūpato gahitāva pañcakkhandhātiādikā abbhantarā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mātikāya asaṅgahitattā^eb^ti mātikāya sarūpena asaṅgahitattā, na aññathā. Na hi mātikāya asaṅgahito koci padattho atthi. ^b^Vikiṇṇabhāvenā^eb^ti khandhavibhaṅgādīsu visuṃ visuṃ kiṇṇabhāvena visaṭabhāvena.

3.^b^Nayānaṃ^eb^ saṅgahādippakāravisesānaṃ ^b^pavatti^eb^ desanā, tassā viniggamaṭṭhānatāya ^b^dvāraṃ^eb^. Yathāvuttadhammā yathārahaṃ khandhāyatanadhātuyo arūpino ca khandhāti ^b^tesaṃ uddeso nayamukhamātikā^eb^. Tenāha ‘‘nayāna’’ntiādi. Viyujjanasīlā, viyogo vā etesaṃ atthīti viyogino, tathā sahayogino, saṅgahāsaṅgahadhammā ca viyogīsahayogīdhammā ^b^ca saṅgahā…pe… dhammā,^eb^ saṅgaṇhanāsaṅgaṇhanavasena viyujjanasaṃyujjanavasena ca pavattanakasabhāvāti attho. ^b^Cuddasapī^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. ^b^Yehī^eb^ti yehi khandhādīhi arūpakkhandhehi ca. ^b^Te cattāro^eb^ti te saṅgahādayo cattāro. ^b^Saccādīhipī^eb^ti saccaindriyapaṭiccasamuppādādīhipi saha. ^b^Yathāsambhava^eb^nti sambhavānurūpaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ saṅgahito asaṅgahitoti ca vattuṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ tanti attho.

^b^So panā^eb^ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho. ^b^Saṅgāhakabhūtehī^eb^ti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya kattubhūtehi. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti saccādīhi. ^b^Na saṅgahabhūtehī^eb^ti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi saccādīhi saṅgahāsaṅgaho na vutto. Tatthāpi hi khandhāyatanadhātuyo eva karaṇabhūtāti dasseti. ^b^Khandhādīheva saṅgahehī^eb^ti khandhādīhiyeva saṅgaṇhanakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi, ‘‘khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā ^a^V0.0006^ea^, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā catūhi khandhehi, dvīhāyatanehi, aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho niyametvā vutto. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā saccādīni saṅgāhakabhāvena vuttāni, na saṅgahabhāvena, khandhādīniyeva ca saṅgahabhāvena vuttāni, tasmā.

Kasmā ^a^M0.0005^ea^ panettha saccādayo saṅgahavasena na vuttāti? Tathādesanāya asambhavato. Na hi sakkā rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ samudayasaccādīhi, saññādīnaṃ vā indriyādīhi saṅgahanayena pucchituṃ vissajjituṃ vāti. Tathā ariyaphalādīsu uppannavedanādīnaṃ saccavinimuttatāya ‘‘vedanākkhandho katihi saccehi saṅgahito’’ti pucchitvāpi ‘‘ekena saccena saṅgahito’’tiādinā niyametvā saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti. ^b^Yathāsambhava^eb^nti yehi sampayogo, yehi ca vippayogo, tadanurūpaṃ.

^b^Rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ na hoti, nibbānaṃ vā rūpena^eb^. Kasmā? Sampayuttanti anāsaṅkanīyasabhāvattā. Catunnañhi khandhānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sampayogībhāvato ‘‘rūpanibbānehipi so atthi natthī’’ti siyā āsaṅkā, tasmā tesaṃ itarehi, itaresañca tehi vippayogo vuccati, na pana rūpassa rūpena, nibbānena vā, nibbānassa vā rūpena katthaci sampayogo atthīti tadāsaṅkābhāvato vippayogopi rūpassa rūpanibbānehi, nibbānassa vā tena na vuccati, arūpakkhandhehiyeva pana vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘catūhevā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anārammaṇassa^eb^ cakkhāyatanādikassa. ^b^Anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehī^eb^ti anārammaṇena sotāyatanādinā anārammaṇamissakena ca dhammāyatanādinā. ^b^Missakassa^eb^ dhammāyatanādikassa. Anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehi na hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Yesaṃ pana yehi hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anārammaṇassa panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā hi sārammaṇassa anārammaṇena anārammaṇamissakena ca vippayogo hoti, evaṃ sārammaṇenapi so hotiyeva. Tena viya anārammaṇassa anārammaṇamissakassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

4.^b^Visuṃ yojanā kātabbā^eb^ti yo tīhi saṅgaho catūhi ca sampayogo vutto, taṃ sabhāgo bhāvo payojeti, yo ca tīhi asaṅgaho catūhi ca vippayogo vutto, taṃ visabhāgo bhāvoti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘saṅgaho…pe… viññāyatī’’^eb^ti āha. Yassa saṅgaho, so dhammo khandhādiko ^a^V0.0007^ea^^b^sabhāgo^eb^. Yassa asaṅgaho, so ^b^visabhāgo^eb^. Tathā sampayogesupi veditabbaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttaṃ sabhāgataṃ sarūpato niddhāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^a^M0.0006^ea^^b^samānabhāvo saṅgahe sabhāgatā, ekuppādādiko sampayoge^eb^ti iminā ruppanādividhuro asamānasabhāvo asaṅgahe visabhāgatā, nānuppādādiko vippayogeti ayamattho atthasiddhoti na vuttoti.

5.^b^Etena ṭhapanākārenā^eb^ti sarūpena aggahetvā yathāvuttena pakaraṇantaramātikāya idha mātikābhāvakittanasaṅkhātena ṭhapanākārena. Pakaraṇantaraṭhapitāya mātikāya avibhāgena pacchato gahaṇaṃ bahi ṭhapananti āha ^b^‘‘bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idha aṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti imissā dhātukathāya sarūpena avatvā. ^b^Tathā pakāsitattā^eb^ti mātikābhāvena jotitattā. Dhammasaṅgaṇīsīsena hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ āgatamātikāva gahitāti. Yehi nayehi dhātukathāya niddeso, tesu nayesu, tehi vibhajitabbesu khandhādīsu, tesaṃ nayānaṃ pavattidvāralakkhaṇesu ca uddiṭṭhesu dhātukathāya uddesavasena vattabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti yaṃ uddesavasena vattabbaṃ, taṃ vatvā puna yathāvuttānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ kusalādivibhāgadassanatthaṃ ‘‘sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā’’ti vuttanti evamettha mātikāya nikkhepavidhi veditabbo.

‘‘Gāvīti ayamāhā’’ti ettha gāvī-saddo viya ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’’ti ettha padatthavipallāsakārinā iti-saddena atthapadatthako saṅgahāsaṅgaha-saddo saddapadatthako jāyatīti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā’’^eb^ti. Tena atthuddhārato saṅgahasaddaṃ saṃvaṇṇetīti dasseti. ^b^Aniddhāritaviseso^eb^ti asaṅgahitajātisañjātiādiviseso. ^b^Sāmaññena gahetabbata^eb^nti saṅgahasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena viññāyamāno vuccamāno vā. Na cettha sāmaññañca ekarūpamevāti codanā kātabbā bhedāpekkhattā tassa. Yattakā hi tassa visesā, tadapekkhameva tanti. ^b^‘‘Attano jātiyā’’ti viññāyati^eb^ yathā ‘‘matteyyā’’ti vutte attano mātu hitāti.

^b^Dhammavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā^eb^ti saṅgahitatādinā pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammānaṃ visesanaṃ akatvā. ^b^Sāmaññenā^eb^ti avisesena. ^b^Dhammāna^eb^nti khandhādidhammānaṃ. ^b^Avasesā niddhāretvā^eb^ti ‘‘saṅgahitena ^a^V0.0008^ea^ asaṅgahita’’ntiādikā avasesā ^a^M0.0007^ea^ dvādasapi pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṃ niddhāretvā dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayauddesāti yojanā. Nanu ca ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’ntiādayopi yathāvuttavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayuddesāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’^eb^ntiādi. Yassa attho ñāyati, saddo ca na payujjati, so lopoti veditabbo, āvuttiādivasena vā ayamattho dīpetabbo. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti luttaniddiṭṭhena asaṅgahita-saddena. ^b^Saṅgahitavisesavisiṭṭho^eb^ti cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho, tena sotāyatanādibhāvena asaṅgahito sotapasādādiko yo ruppanasabhāvo dhammaviseso. ^b^Tannissito^eb^ taṃ dhammavisesaṃ nissāya labbhamāno. ‘‘Te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe… catūhi khandhehi asaṅgahitā’’tiādinā asaṅgahitatāsaṅkhāto pucchāvissajjananayo parato pucchitvā vissajjiyamāno idha uddiṭṭho hoti. ^b^Visesane karaṇavacana^eb^nti iminā tassa dhammassa yathāvuttasaṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭhataṃyeva vibhāveti. Evamete pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṃ niddhāretvā pucchanavissajjananayuddesā pavattāti veditabbā.

Nanu ca ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’nti ettāvatāpi ayamattho labbhatīti? Na labbhati tassa dhammamattadīpanato. Nayuddeso heso, na dhammuddeso. Tathā hi ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatana…pe… dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti vatvā ‘‘te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe… asaṅgahitā’’ti (dhātu. 171) pucchitvā ‘‘te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti dutiyaṃ asaṅgahitapadaṃ gahitaṃ. Aññathā ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te katame’’icceva niddisitabbaṃ siyā.

^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti atidesena dassitamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘tesupī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatiyapadenā^eb^ti luttaniddesena gahetabbanti vuttapadaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso^eb^ saṅgahitāsaṅgahitehi tehi dhammehi dhammānaṃ saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāya vuttattā. Tathā ^a^M0.0008^ea^ hi tattha pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘tehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’ti dhammamukheneva saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttā. Dutiyatatiyesu pana saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāsaṅkhātavisesanadvārena dhammānaṃ asaṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttāti tattha ‘‘visesane karaṇavacana’’nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tattha hi…pe… dhammantarassā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sabhāvantarenā^eb^ti saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāsaṅkhātena ^a^V0.0009^ea^ sabhāvantarena pakārantarena. ^b^Sabhāvantarassā^eb^ti asaṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāsaṅkhātassa sabhāvantarassa. ^b^Etesū^eb^ti catutthapañcamesu. ^b^Dhammantarenā^eb^ti aññadhammena. ^b^Dhammantarassā^eb^ti tato aññassa dhammassa visesanaṃ kataṃ. Tattha hi antarena pakāravisesāmasanaṃ dhammeneva dhammo visesitoti. ^b^Ādipadenevā^eb^ti ‘‘saṅgahitenā’’tiādinā vuttena paṭhamapadeneva. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti ‘‘sampayuttaṃ vippayutta’’ntiādinā vuttehi dutiyatatiyapadehi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ekādasamādīsu catūsu. Dutiyatatiyesu viya visesane eva karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na catutthapañcamesu viya kattuattheti adhippāyo. ^b^Pucchāvissajjanāna^eb^ntiādinā tamevatthaṃ vibhāveti.

^b^Vividhakappanato^eb^ti vividhaṃ bahudhā kappanato, saṅgahāsaṅgahānaṃ visuṃ saha ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvakappanatoti attho. Taṃ pana vikappanaṃ vuttākārena vibhajanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘vibhāgatoti attho’’^eb^ti. Sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇena adhimokkhena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇe nicchayanākārena pavattiyā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttadhammā. Te ca tehi saddhiṃ tadavasiṭṭhe dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatadhamme ca saṅgahetvā āha ^b^‘‘sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itare^eb^ti phassādayo. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti ekūnanavutiyā cittuppādānaṃ. ^b^Pariggahetabbā^eb^ti saṅgahādivasena pariggaṇhitabbā. ^b^Mahāvisayena^eb^ adhimokkhena. ^b^Aññesa^eb^nti vitakkādīnaṃ. ^b^Vacanaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ‘‘adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho, so sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo’’ti ^b^dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. yevāpanakavaṇṇanā) ‘‘taṇhāpaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo’’ti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge^eb^ ca āgataṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Atthe satī^eb^ti ‘‘sanniṭṭhāna…pe… sādhāraṇato’’ti evamatthe vuccamāne. ^b^Vattabbesū^eb^ti saṅgahādipariggahatthaṃ vattabbesu. Vuttā ^b^phassādayo^eb^ manasikārapariyosānā. ^b^Tādisassā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0009^ea^ phassādisadisassa sādhāraṇassa adhimokkhasadisassa asādhāraṇassa aññassa dhammassa abhāvā.

Nanu jīvitindriyacittaṭṭhitiyopi sādhāraṇāti? Saccaṃ sādhāraṇā, atthi pana visesoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘jīvitindriyaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. Asamādhisabhāvā balabhāvaṃ appattā sāmaññasaddeneva vattabbāti yojanā. ^b^Sāmaññavisesasaddehi cā^eb^ti sāmaññavisesasaddehi vattabbā ca samādhisabhāvā cittekaggatā. ^b^Visesasaddavacanīyaṃ añña^eb^nti balappattasamādhito aññaṃ sāmaññasaddena byāpetabbaṃ, visesasaddena ca nivattetabbaṃ natthi samādhisabhāvāya eva cittekaggatāya gahitattā. Na aññabyāpakanivattako sāmaññaviseso ^b^anañña…pe… viseso^eb^^a^V0.0010^ea^, tassa dīpanato. ^b^Tasseva dhammassā^eb^ti tasseva balappattasamādhidhammassa. ^b^Bhedadīpakehī^eb^ti visesadīpakehi samādhibalādivacanehi vattabbā. ^b^Vuttalakkhaṇā^eb^ anaññabyāpakanivattakasāmaññavisesadīpanā saddā. Tato ^b^viparītehi^eb^ aññaṃ byāpetabbaṃ nivattetabbañca gahetvā pavattehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vattabbā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā asamādhisabhāvā samādhisabhāvāti dvedhā bhinditvā gahitā cittekaggatā, tasmā. ^b^Asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya^eb^ visesasaddanirapekkhaṃ pavattamānattā. ^b^Itaro^eb^ti samādhibalādiko visesasaddo. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ abbhantaramātikuddese, sādhāraṇe phassādike, mahāvisaye vā adhimokkhe uddisiyamāne. Nanu ca abhinditvā gayhamānā cittekaggatā vedanā viya sādhāraṇā hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘abhinnāpi vā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Cittassa ṭhiti cittekaggatā avisāhaṭamānasatā (dha. sa. 11, 15). Arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhitī’’ti (dha. sa. 19) vacanato samādhijīvitindriyānaṃ ^b^aññadhammanissayena vattabbatā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Na arahatī^eb^ti idha uddesaṃ na arahati samukheneva vattabbesu phassādīsu uddisiyamānesūti attho.
Mātikāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

6. ‘‘Abhiññeyyadhammabhāvena ^a^M0.0010^ea^^a^V0.0011^ea^ vuttā cattāro khandhā hontī’’tiādinā, ‘‘rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo’’tiādinā ca abhiññātalakkhaṇavisayāti āha ^b^‘‘sabhāvato abhiññātāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pariññeyyatādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pahātabbasacchikātabbabhāvetabbatā saṅgayhati. ^b^Adhipatiyādī^eb^ti adhipatipaccayabhāvaupaṭṭhānapadahanādīni. ^b^Saccādiviseso viyā^eb^ti dukkhasaccādipariyāyo abhiññeyyapīḷanaṭṭhādiviseso viya. ^b^Evañca katvā^eb^ti nayamukhamātikāya abhiññeyyanissayena vuccamānattā eva. ^b^Tesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ^eb^ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khandhabhāvena viya ^b^rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hoti,^eb^ na vedanākkhandhādibhāvenāti saṅgahalakkhaṇamāha. ^b^Itī^eb^ti tasmā, yasmā rūpadhammā aññamaññaṃ rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgā, tasmāti attho. ^b^Rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena^eb^ rūpakkhandhabhāvena atthamukheneva gahaṇe. Saddadvārena pana gahaṇe ^b^rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā^eb^ rūpakkhandhavacanavacanīyatāsaṅkhātena. Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandhoti hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

^b^Purimenā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhena. ^b^Saññākkhandhamūlakā^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘purimena yojiyamāne’’tiādiṃ ānetvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanaṃ khandhapadaniddese sabbapacchimamevāti āha ^b^‘‘bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantara’’^eb^nti.

40.^b^Yadipi^eb^^a^V0.0012^ea^^b^ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ^eb^ vissajjanaṃ samudayamaggasaccānaṃ ‘‘samudayasaccaṃ ekena khandhena…pe… maggasaccaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ, catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita’’nti (dhātu. 41) niddiṭṭhattā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ indriyapadaniddese ^a^M0.0011^ea^. ^b^Cakkhusotacakkhusukhindriyadukāna^eb^nti cakkhusotadukaṃ cakkhusukhindriyadukanti etesaṃ dukānaṃ. Cakkhusotasukhindriyānañhi ‘‘ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ, catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita’’nti ekake sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Cakkhusotindriyadukassa pana ‘‘cakkhundriyañca sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti, ‘‘cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti cakkhusukhindriyadukassa ca ^b^asadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Nāpi dukehi tikassā^eb^ti cakkhusotacakkhusukhindriyādidukehi cakkhusotasukhindriyāditikassa nāpi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti saccapadaniddese. ^b^Tikena cā^eb^ti dukkhasamudayamaggāditikena ca. ‘‘Pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.

61.^b^Avijjāvacanenā^eb^ti ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’’ti ettha avijjāggahaṇena. ^b^Visesanaṃ na kattabbaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘sabbampi viññāṇa’’nti vattabbanti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘kusalādīnampī’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Vissajjanāsadisena^eb^ sabbaviññāṇādisaṅgahaṇato. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti viññāṇādipadānaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ paṭhamanaye. ^b^Akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyati^eb^ saddāyatanassapi gahitattā.

71.^b^Jāyamāna…pe… mānāna^eb^nti jāyamānādiavatthānaṃ dhammānaṃ. ^b^Jāyamānādibhāvamattattā^eb^ti nibbattanādiavatthāmattabhāvato. ^b^Vinibbhujjitvā^eb^ti avatthābhāvato vinibbhogaṃ katvā. Paramatthato avijjamānāni, ^b^sabhāvamattabhūtānī^eb^ti paramatthadhammānaṃ avatthābhāvamattabhūtāni ^a^V0.0013^ea^. Aparamatthasabhāvānipi rūpadhammassa nibbattiādibhāvato ruppanabhāvena gayhanti. Tato ‘‘rūpakkhandhassa sabhāgāni, arūpānaṃ pana jātijarāmaraṇānī’’ti ānetvā yojanā. ^b^Ekekabhūtānī^eb^ti yathā ekasmiṃ rūpakalāpe jātiādīni ekekāniyeva honti, evaṃ ekasmiṃ arūpakalāpepīti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^a^M0.0012^ea^^b^‘‘rūpakalāpajātiādīni viyā’’^eb^tiādi. Anubhavanasañjānanavijānanakiccānaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nibbattiādibhūtānipi jātiādīni tathā na gayhantīti āha ^b^‘‘vediyana…pe… agayhamānānī’’^eb^ti. Tena vedanākkhandhādīhi jātiādīnaṃ saṅgahābhāvamāha. ‘‘Jāti, bhikkhave, aniccā saṅkhatā’’tiādivacanato jātiādīnampi saṅkhatapariyāyo atthīti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārakkhandhena tesaṃ saṅgahoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhatā…pe… sabhāgānī’’^eb^ti. Teneva ca saṅkhārakkhandhassa anekantaparamatthakiccatā veditabbā. ^b^Tathā duvidhānī^eb^ti vuttappakārena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ nibbattiādibhāvena dvippakārāni. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti yathāvuttasabhāgatthena. ^b^Tehi khandhādīhī^eb^ti rūpakkhandhasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūhi.
Paṭhamanayasaṅgahāsaṅgahapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

171.^b^‘‘Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’^eb^nti ettha saṅgahitāsaṅgahitasaddā bhinnādhikaraṇā na gahetabbā visesanavisesitabbatāya icchitattā. Yo hi dhammo saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho asaṅgahito heṭṭhā uddiṭṭho, sveva idha asaṅgahitabhāvena pucchitvā vissajjīyatīti dassento ^b^‘‘yaṃ taṃ…pe… tadeva dassento’’^eb^ti āha. Ye hi dhammā cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena ca asaṅgahitā, tesaṃyeva puna khandhādīhi asaṅgaho pucchitvā vissajjito. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhāyatanena…pe… āhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu nayesu vāresu ca. ^b^Khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññāna^eb^nti ‘‘khandhasaṅgahenā’’tiādinā avisesena vuttānaṃ khandhādisaṅgahānaṃ. ‘‘Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatī’’ti āha ^b^‘‘niccaṃ visesāpekkhattā’’^eb^ti. Visesāvabodhanatthāni pañhabyākaraṇānīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhedanissitattā ca pucchāvissajjanāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā^eb^ti ‘‘khandhasaṅgahenā’’tiādinā avisesena vuttāpi ^a^V0.0014^ea^ rūpakkhandhādinā savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā, khandhādinā saṅgahoti attho. ^b^Suddhā^eb^ti kevalā anavasesā, sāmaññabhūtāti vuttaṃ hoti.

^b^Tatthā^eb^ti yathādhikate dutiyanaye. Sāmaññajotanāya visesaniddiṭṭhattā āha ^b^‘‘saṅgahi…pe… niddhāritattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tīsu saṅgahesū^eb^ti khandhādisaṅgahesu ^a^M0.0013^ea^ tīsu. ^b^Aññehī^eb^ti vuttāvasesehi dvīhi ekena vā. ^b^Ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ^eb^ tāvatāpi saṅgahitena asaṅgahitabhāvassa pakāsitattā. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvena vuttadhammānaṃ. ^b^Evaṃvidhāna^eb^nti ‘‘cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatana’’ntiādinā aniddhāritavisesānaṃ. ^b^Asambhavā^eb^ti vuttappakārena niddisituṃ asambhavā. Saṅgahādinayadassanamattaṃ nayamātikāya byāpāro, yattha pana saṅgahādayo, te khandhādayo kusalādayo ca tesaṃ visayabhūtāti tehi vinā saṅgahādīnaṃ pavatti natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nayamātikāya abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saṅgāhakaṃ^eb^ asaṅgāhakañcāti vattabbaṃ. Yo hi idha saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto dhammo asaṅgāhakabhāvenapi vuttoyevāti.

‘‘Ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti, ‘‘ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’ti ca ^b^yattha pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ natthi, tattha paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca^eb^ ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi saṅgahito? Ekena khandhenā’’ti (dhātu. 6), ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi sampayuttoti? Natthi. Catūhi khandhehi vippayutto’’ti (dhātu. 228) ca evaṃ ^b^pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena. Itaresū^eb^ti dutiyādinayesu. ^b^Tassa tassā^eb^ti yaṃ pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca ‘‘ye dhammā’’ti aniyamitarūpena niddhāritaṃ, tassa tassa ‘‘te dhammā’’ti niyāmakabhāvena.

^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ pakaraṇe. ^b^Yena yena^eb^ cakkhāyatanādinā saṅgāhakena. ^b^Khandhādisaṅgahesū^eb^ti khandhāyatanadhātusaṅgahesu. ^b^Tena tenā^eb^ti khandhādisaṅgahena. ^b^Añña^eb^nti tato tato saṅgāhakato aññaṃ. Tabbinimuttaṃ saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ atthi, taṃ tadeva ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti ^b^saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakabhāvena uddhaṭaṃ. Añño dhammo natthi^eb^ tassa sabhāgabhāvena saṅgāhakasseva abhāvato. Siyā panetaṃ sabhāgena ekadesena saṅgahoti, taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha ^b^‘‘na ca so…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yañcā^eb^tiādinā vacanantaraṃ pariharati.

^b^Yadi^eb^^a^M0.0014^ea^^a^V0.0015^ea^^b^cā^eb^tiādināpi tasseva tena saṅgahābhāvaṃ pāṭhābhāvadassanena vibhāveti. Tattha ^b^so evā^eb^ti yo rūpādikkhandho saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto, so eva tena rūpādikkhandhena saṅgayheyya saṅgahetabbo bhaveyya, teneva tassa saṅgahābhāve lakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekadesā viya^eb^ cakkhāyatanādayo ^b^samudāyassa^eb^ rūpakkhandhādikassa. ^b^Rūpakkhandho cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ na saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca^eb^ sabhāgavisabhāgabhāvābhāvato. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Samudāyantogadhāna^eb^ntiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Tattha ^b^yenā^eb^ti vibhāgena. ^b^Te^eb^ti ekadesā. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti ekadesānaṃ. Ettha tadantogadhatāya vibhāgābhāvo, vibhāgābhāvena sabhāgavisabhāgatābhāvo, tena saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakatābhāvo dassitoti veditabbo.

Yathā sabbena sabbaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgābhāvena ekadesānaṃ samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hoti, evaṃ ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānanti dassento ^b^‘‘tathā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yathā^eb^tiādi udāharaṇadassanena yathāvuttassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Khandhasaṅgahena saṅgāhakaṃ asaṅgāhakañcāti yojanā. Tathā sesesupi. ^b^Na hi ekadesa…pe… visabhāgaṃ^eb^ yena samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca siyāti adhippāyo. Ettha ca saṅgāhakattaṃ tāva mā hotu, asaṅgāhakattaṃ pana kasmā paṭikkhipīyatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena parāmasati. Attato aññassa, attani antogadhato aññassa, attekadesasabhāgato aññassa satipi asaṅgāhakatteti yojanā. Taṃ panetaṃ ‘‘rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hotī’’tiādinā vutte tayo pakāre sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅgāhakattameva etesaṃ natthī^eb^ti etesaṃ attā, attani antogadho, attekadesasabhāgo cāti vuttānaṃ saṅgāhakabhāvo eva natthi sabhāgābhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo’’tiādi. ^b^Yenā^eb^ti saṅgāhakattena. ^b^Evarūpāna^eb^nti yathāvuttānaṃ tippakārānaṃ ^b^aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ^eb^ satipi visabhāgabhāveti adhippāyo.

^b^Tenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0015^ea^ ‘‘dhammāyatana’’ntiādinā vacanena. Ekadesassa vedanākkhandhādikassa samudāyassa dhammāyatanassa saṅgāhakattaṃ ekadesena samudāyassa saṅgahitabhāvanti attho, samudāyassa rūpakkhandhassa ekadesassa cakkhāyatanassa sotāyatanassa ca saṅgāhakattaṃ samudāyena ekadesassa saṅgahitabhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ na dasseti, atha kiṃ dassetīti āha ^b^‘‘catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehī^eb^ti rūpādicatukkhandhagaṇanavibhāgehi ^a^V0.0016^ea^. ^b^Pañcadhā^eb^ti rūpādicatukkhandhasaṅgaho viññāṇakkhandhasaṅgahoti evaṃ pañcappakārena bhinnataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvenā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ekena khandhenā’’tiādīsu karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, na kattuattheti katvā āha ^b^‘‘saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhāna’’^eb^nti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dutiyādayo pana^eb^ nayā. ^b^Agaṇanādidassanānī^eb^ti agaṇanagaṇanadassanāni. Nanu ca dutiyādīsu gaṇanādīnipi vijjantīti? Saccaṃ vijjanti, tāni pana visesanabhūtāni appadhānānīti visesitabbabhūtānaṃ padhānānaṃ vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’tiādinā kattuādayo niddiṭṭhāti āha ^b^‘‘kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā’’^eb^ti.

^b^Tathā tathā^eb^ti tena tena rūpakkhandhādippakārena. ^b^Taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatā^eb^ti rūpadhammādīnaṃ rūpakkhandhādibhāvo sabhāgatā, vedanākkhandhādiabhāvo visabhāgatāti attho. ^b^Yathāniddhāritadhammadassane^eb^ti ‘‘ye dhammā, te dhammā’’ti niddhāritappakāradhammanirūpane. ^b^Saṅgāhakasaṅgahetabbāna^eb^nti cakkhāyatanādikassa saṅgāhakassa sotāyatanādikassa ca saṅgahetabbassa. ^b^Samānakkhandhādibhāvo^eb^ti ekakkhandhādibhāvo, rūpakkhandhādibhāvoti attho. ^b^Tadabhāvo^eb^ti tassa samānakkhandhādibhāvassa abhāvo aññakkhandhādibhāvo. ^b^Aya^eb^nti yvāyaṃ paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbatāsaṅkhāto dutiyādinayesu yathāvuttānaṃ samānakkhandhādibhāvābhāvasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo vutto, ayametesaṃ dvippakārānaṃ nayānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgatāsu viseso.

^b^Samudayasaccasukhindriyādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena maggasaccadukkhindriyādi saṅgayhati. ^b^Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato^eb^ti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassa asaṅgāhakattassa abhāvato ^a^M0.0016^ea^. Na hi sakkā ‘‘samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’tiādi vattuṃ. ^b^Dukkhasaccasadisāni^eb^ abyākatapadādīni. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭānīti yojanā. ^b^Eva^eb^ntiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Na rūpakkhandho^eb^ti na sabbo rūpakkhandhadhammoti attho.

‘‘Khandhapadenā’’ti idaṃ karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, na kattuattheti āha ^b^‘‘khandhapadasaṅgahenāti attho’’^eb^ti. Tenevassa kattuatthataṃ paṭisedhetuṃ ^b^‘‘na saṅgāhakenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Karaṇaṃ pana katturahitaṃ ^a^V0.0017^ea^ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘kenaci saṅgāhakenāti idaṃ pana ānetvā vattabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Saṅgāhakesu na yujjati^eb^ na saṅgahetabbesūti adhippāyo. Rūpakkhandhadhammā hi ‘‘ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’ti vuttāti. Samudāye vuttavidhi tadavayavepi sambhavatīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento ^b^‘‘etena nayenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Paṭiyogīnivattanaṃ eva-saddena karīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṃ eva-saddassa attho’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅgāhakato aññanivāraṇaṃ eva-saddassa attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^So ca…pe… pekkha^eb^nti iminā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Saṅgāhakāpekkhatte hi ‘‘so cā’’tiādivacanassa ‘‘cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito’’ti ettha cakkhāyatanaṃ saṅgāhakanti yathādhippetassa atthassa asambhavo evāti idāni taṃ asambhavaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhī’’ti ettha. ^b^‘‘Rūpakkhandhenā’’ti ānetvā vattabbaṃ^eb^ āyatanadhātuvisesanatthaṃ. Na so eva tassa, samudāyo vā tadekadesānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca hotīti vuttovāyamatthoti āha ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandho…pe… na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iminā pariyāyenā^eb^ti yasmā vuttappakāraṃ saṅgāhakattaṃ natthi ‘‘yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakaṃ siyā’’ti iminā pariyāyena. ^b^Asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vutto^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ (dhātu. aṭṭha. 171) ‘‘so ca…pe… natthī’’ti. ^b^Saṅgahitatāyā^eb^ti nippariyāyena saṅgahitabhāvena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti na yujjatīti yojanā. ^b^Sā saṅgahitatā^eb^ti attanā attano, attekadesānaṃ ^a^M0.0017^ea^ vā saṅgahitatā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhena. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti rūpakkhandhatadekadesānaṃ. ^b^Atthi ca vippayuttatā^eb^ vedanākkhandhādīhi. ^b^Cakkhāyatanādīhi viyā^eb^ti visadisudāharaṇaṃ. ^b^Etehi^eb^ rūpavedanākkhandhādīhi ^b^aññehi ca^eb^ evarūpehi. ^b^Etāni aññāni cā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

^b^Teneva tassa saṅgahitattābhāvadassanena^eb^ heṭṭhā dassitena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ vāre. ^b^Aggahaṇe^eb^ti akathane, adesanāyanti attho. ^b^Samudayasaccādīsū^eb^ti samudayasaccasukhindriyādīsu yujjeyya taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? ^b^Tehi^eb^ samudayasaccādīhi khandhādisaṅgahena ^b^saṅgahite^eb^ dhammajāte sati tassa āyatanasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitattassa abhāvato. ^b^Rūpakkhandhādīhī^eb^ti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīhi. ^b^Saṅgahitameva natthi,^eb^ kasmā? ‘‘So eva tassa saṅgāhako na hotī’’ti vuttovāyamattho. Yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā rūpakkhandhādikassa attano…pe… natthīti sambandho. Aññassa pana vedanākkhandhādikassa rūpakkhandhādinā saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ atthīti yojanā. ^b^Ubhayābhāvo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0018^ea^ saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattābhāvo. ^b^Ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ vāre. ^b^Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīna^eb^nti dhammāyatanādīnaṃ khandhacatukkasaṅgāhakatte, jīvitindriyādīnaṃ khandhadukasaṅgāhakatteti yojanā. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā ^b^‘‘satī’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena paṭhamena dhammadhātusaḷāyatanādīnaṃ sukhindriyādīnañca, dutiyena ekakkhandhassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sukhindriyañhi vedanākkhandhasseva saṅgāhakaṃ. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti khandhacatukkakhandhadukādīnaṃ ^b^asaṅgahitatā na natthi^eb^ atthevāti tassā abhāvo anekantiko. ^b^Pubbe vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpakkhandhādīhi panā’’tiādinā vuttanayena.

^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva pubbe vutte sanidassanasappaṭighapade. ^b^Nivattetvā gaṇhanto^eb^ti pubbe vuttaṃ paṭinivattetvā gaṇhanto paccāmasanto. ^b^Tadavattabbatā^eb^ti tesaṃ saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakasaṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattānaṃ avattabbatā. ^b^Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva…pe… na saṅgāhakattābhāvato^eb^ti yasmā nesaṃ asaṅgāhakattaṃ viya saṅgāhakattampi natthi, tato eva saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattampīti dasseti.
Dutiyanayasaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

179.^b^Rūpakkhandhena^eb^^a^M0.0018^ea^^b^khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ekadesasabhāgatā samudāyasabhāgatā na hoti, tasmā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhena. ^b^Tānī^eb^ti vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānāni. Yathā ca ekadesavisabhāgatāya na saṅgahitatā, evaṃ ekadesasabhāgatāya asaṅgahitatāpi natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Saṅgahitāneva na na hontīti yojanā. ^b^Te^eb^ti vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānasukhumarūpadhammā. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi. ^b^Na kathañci sammissā^eb^ti kenacipi pakārena na sammissāti asammissatāya saṅgahitattābhāvaṃ sādheti. ^b^Rūpakkhandhena viya…pe… na hotī^eb^ti yathā rūpakkhandhena sabhāgatābhāvato nibbānaṃ na kenacipi saṅgahaṇena saṅgahitaṃ, evaṃ viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi taṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ na hotīti khandhasaṅgahābhāvo pākaṭo vuttovāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.

^b^Evarūpāna^eb^nti ^a^V0.0019^ea^ rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīnaṃ. Na hi nibbānaṃ sandhāya ‘‘rūpakkhandhena viññāṇakkhandhena cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’ti sakkā vattuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅgāhakattābhāvato evā’’^eb^ti. Tathā ‘‘abyākatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’tiādi na sakkā vattuṃ tādisassa dhammassa abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘sanibbāna…pe… bhāvatovā’’^eb^ti. Aggahaṇaṃ veditabbanti yojanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kañcī^eb^ti kañci dhammajātaṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ti abyākatadhammādayo. ^b^Attano^eb^ti abyākatadhammādiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Ekadeso^eb^ti rūpakkhandhādi. ^b^Attekadesasabhāgo^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi dhammāyatanadhammadhātupariyāpannatāya tadekadesasabhāgo. ^b^Asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā^eb^ti khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitānaṃ saññākkhandhādīnaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgāhakattāti attho.

Visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā khandhasaṅgahena dhammāyatanena na koci dhammo saṅgahito atthīti yojanā. ^b^Etassā^eb^ti ‘‘dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā’’ti etassa padassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena saṅgahitāti attho. Oḷārikarūpasammissaṃ ^b^dhammāyatanekadesaṃ^eb^.
Tatiyanayaasaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

191.^b^Tiṇṇaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0019^ea^^b^saṅgahāna^eb^nti khandhāyatanadhātusaṅgahānaṃ. Saṅgahaṇapubbaṃ asaṅgahaṇaṃ, asaṅgahaṇapubbaṃ saṅgahaṇañca vuccamānaṃ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇānaṃ pavattivisesena vuttaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saṅgahaṇā…pe… uddiṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Saṅgahābhāvakato asaṅgaho saṅgahahetuko saṅgahassa pavattivisesoyeva nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ samudayasaccādinā tīhipi saṅgahehi ^b^saṅgahitena^eb^ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannena ^b^dhammavisesena^eb^ puna tatheva ^b^saṅgahito^eb^ so eva samudayasaccādiko ^b^dhammaviseso^eb^ saṅgahitena saṅgahito. ^b^Saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā,^eb^ na asaṅgāhakattā eva. Yathā hi tīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā, evaṃ ^a^V0.0020^ea^ dvīhi, ekenapi saṅgahena na saṅgāhakā idha na uddhaṭā. ^b^Tehi saṅgahitā^eb^ti tehi tīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahitā dhammā. ^b^Yassā^eb^ti yassa attano saṅgāhakassa.

^b^Sakalavācakenā^eb^ti anavasesaṃ khandhādiatthaṃ vadantena. ^b^Tena khandhādipadenā^eb^ti ‘‘teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyyā’’ti ettha tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana ayojetvā ‘‘yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya, taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthī’’ti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmāti ce? Na hi ^b^yena^eb^ samudayasaccādinā ^b^yaṃ^eb^ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ khandhādisaṅgahehi ^b^saṅgahitaṃ, teneva^eb^ samudayasaccādinā ^b^tassa^eb^ tadavasiṭṭhassa saṅkhārakkhandhadhammassa, ^b^na ca tasseva^eb^ kevalassa samudayasaccādikassa saṅgaho pucchito vissajjitoti yojanā, atha kho ^b^tena^eb^ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammena phassādinā. ^b^Saṅgahitassā^eb^ti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassāti attho. Tasmā attano saṅgāhakaṃ sakalakkhaṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna tena khandhādipadena yaṃ saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya, taṃ tādisaṃ natthīti attho veditabbo. ^b^Vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañcā^eb^ti vedanā visuṃ khandho, saddo ca visuṃ āyatananti attho. ^b^Aññena^eb^ khandhantarādinā. ^b^Asammissa^eb^nti abyākatadukkhasaccādi viya amissitaṃ. ^b^Na hi…pe… etthā^eb^ti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhena dhammena yo dhammo saṅgahito, tassa saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhoyeva yo saṅgaho, so na ettha vāre pucchito vissajjito ca. ^b^Saṅgahovā^eb^ti kevalo saṅgaho ^a^M0.0020^ea^, na kattāpekkhoti attho. ^b^Na saṅgāhakenā^eb^ti idaṃ yathāvuttena atthena nivattitassa dassanaṃ. ^b^Na hī^eb^tiādi taṃsamatthanaṃ.
Catutthanayasaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

193.^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti yasmā saṅgahappavattivisesavirahito asaṅgahitadhammavisesanissito pañcamanayo, tasmā yo ettha kenaci asaṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna asaṅgahito dhammaviseso asaṅgahitena asaṅgahito asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca. Tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṃ ^a^V0.0021^ea^ dassento ‘‘rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitāti āhā’’ti catutthanaye vuttanayānusārena. ^b^Yathāniddhāritadhammadassana^eb^nti pāḷiyaṃ niddhāritappakāradhammadassanaṃ. Saha sukhumarūpenāti sasukhumarūpaṃ, tena sukhumarūpena saddhiṃ gahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ, tena sahitadhammasamudāyā ^b^sasukhuma…pe… dāyā^eb^. Ke pana teti āha ^b^‘‘dukkhasaccā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kesañcī^eb^ti nibbānacakkhāyatanādīnaṃ. ^b^Tīhipi^eb^ saṅgahehi. Paripuṇṇasaṅgahehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā ^b^paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā^eb^. ^b^Abyākatadhammasadisā^eb^ nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbanevasekkhānāsekkhādayo. ^b^Itare^eb^ti rūpakkhandhādayo. ^b^Tabbipariyāyenā^eb^ti vuttavipariyāyena, tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahetabbassa atthitāya paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakattāti attho.

^b^Asaṅgāhakesu nibbānaṃ antogadhaṃ,^eb^ tasmā taṃ anidassanaappaṭighehi asaṅgahetabbaṃ na hotīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ca tadeva tassa asaṅgāhaka’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā’’tiādayo nava pañhā dutiyapañhādayo, te paṭhamapañhena saddhiṃ dasa, nāmarūpapañhādayo pana catuvīsatīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbepi catuttiṃsa hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpakkhandhādivisesakapada^eb^nti ‘‘rūpakkhandhenā’’tiādinā asaṅgāhakattena visesakaṃ rūpakkhandhādipadaṃ. ^b^Pucchāyā^eb^ti ca pucchanatthanti attho. ‘‘Rūpakkhandhenā’’tiādi sabbampi vā viññāpetuṃ icchitabhāvena vacanaṃ pañhabhāvato pucchā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^M0.0021^ea^ ‘‘pañhā panettha…pe… catuttiṃsa hontī’’ti. ^b^Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitā^eb^ti te niddhāritadhammā teneva asaṅgahitāsaṅgahitatāya niddhāraṇasaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena dassitā.

^b^Tadevāti eva-saddenā^eb^ti ‘‘tadevā’’ti ettha eva-saddena. ‘‘Yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ, taṃ khandhādīhi asaṅgahita’’nti ettha ‘‘khandhādīhevā’’ti avadhāraṇaṃ nippayojanaṃ pakārantarassa abhāvato. ‘‘Tīhi asaṅgaho’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā ‘‘asaṅgahitamevā’’ti saṅgahitatānivattanassa anadhippetattā. Tadevāti pana icchitaṃ uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvassa avadhāretabbattāti dassento ^b^‘‘na kadācī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^aññassā^eb^ti anuddhaṭassa. ^b^Aniyatataṃ dassetī^eb^ti idaṃ avadhāraṇaphaladassanaṃ. ^b^Niyamatoti sakkā vacanaseso yojetu^eb^nti idampi eva-kārena siddhamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ vuttaṃ. Yato hi eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyamoti. ^b^Evaṃpakāramevā^eb^ti pucchāya uddhaṭappakārameva, yaṃ pakāraṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ, taṃpakāramevāti attho. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0022^ea^ asaṅgahitassa. ^b^Aññassā^eb^ti pucchāya anuddhaṭappakārassa. Etena yo pucchāya uddhaṭo tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahito, tasseva idha pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvo, na aññassāti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pucchāya uddhaṭañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Āyatanadhātusaṅgahavasena cettha rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ ^b^aññasahitatā,^eb^ viññāṇakkhandhādīnaṃ ^b^asahitatā^eb^ ca veditabbā.

Avasesā vedanādayo tayo khandhā nibbānañca sakalena rūpakkhandhena tesaṃ saṅgaho natthīti ‘‘saṅgahitā’’ti na sakkā vattuṃ, ekadesena pana saṅgaho atthīti ^b^‘‘asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabba’’^eb^nti āha. ‘‘Rūpadhammāvā’’ti niyamanaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvāpekkhanti dassento ^b^‘‘pucchāya…pe… adhippāyo’’^eb^ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā evā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ pañcamanayaniddese. ^b^Paṭhame naye^eb^ti paṭhame atthavikappe. Tathā ^b^dutiye^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Rūpaviññāṇehī^eb^ti asukhumarūpadhammehi viññāṇena cāti ayamettha adhippāyoti dassento ^b^‘‘oḷārika…pe… attho’’^eb^ti āha. Kathaṃ pana rūpadhammāti vutte oḷārikarūpasseva gahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahito’’^eb^ti.

196.^b^Asaṅgāhaka^eb^nti ^a^M0.0022^ea^ ‘‘cakkhāyatanena…pe… asaṅgahitā’’ti evaṃ asaṅgāhakabhāvena vuttaṃ pucchitabbavissajjetabbabhāvena vuttampi kāmaṃ vedanādīheva catūhi asaṅgahitaṃ, taṃ pana na cakkhāyatanamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhāyatanena panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yehi dhammehī^eb^ti khandhādīsu yehi. ^b^Sabbaṃ^eb^ dhammajātaṃ ^b^teva^eb^ rūpādike dhamme ^b^udāneti^eb^ pāḷiyaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ udānetīti āha ^b^‘‘sadisavissajjanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paṭhamena^eb^ udānena. ^b^Dve^eb^ti ‘‘bāhirā upādā dve’’ti ettha vuttaṃ dve-saddaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Tassa^eb^ asaṅgahitassa. ^b^Yathādassitassā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpa’’ntiādinā dassitappakārassa. Dhammanvayañāṇuppādanaṃ ^b^nayadānaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Rūpaṃ dhammāyatana’’ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena ^b^dvevīsapadiko esa nayo^eb^.
Pañcamanayaasaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

228. ‘‘Tatthā’’ti ^a^V0.0023^ea^ iminā ‘‘sampayogavippayogapadaṃ bhājetvā’’ti ettha sampayogavippayogapadaṃ bhājitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇetabbatāya ca padhānabhūtaṃ paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, na rūpakkhandhādipadanti dassento ^b^‘‘yaṃ labbhati…pe… veditabba’’^eb^nti vatvā puna ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandhādīsu hī’’^eb^tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati. Tattha ^b^na labbhatī^eb^ti ‘‘sampayuttaṃ vippayutta’’nti vā gahetuṃ na labbhati, ^b^alabbhamānampi pucchāya gahitaṃ^eb^ paṭikkhepena vissajjetuṃ. Paṭikkhepopi hi pucchāya vissajjanameva. Tathā hi ^b^yamake^eb^ (yama. 1.khandhayamaka.59-61) ‘‘yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā’’ti pucchāya ‘‘natthī’’ti vissajjitaṃ. Tena panettha rūpadhammesu sampayogaṭṭho na labbhatīti ayamattho dassito hoti. Alabbhamānampi sampayogapadaṃ gahitanti sambandho. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīsu. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti rūpanibbānānaṃ. ^b^Visabhāgatā^eb^ti ataṃsabhāgatā. Ekuppādādibhāvo hi sampayoge sabhāgatā, na saṅgahe viya samānasabhāgatā, tasmā ekuppādādibhāvarahitānaṃ rūpanibbānānaṃ sā ekuppādāditā visabhāgatā vuttā. ^b^Tadabhāvato^eb^ti tassā visabhāgatāya ekuppādāditāya abhāvato. ^b^Vippayogopi nivārito eva hoti,^eb^ visabhāgo bhāvo vippayogoti vuttovāyamatthoti. ^b^‘‘Catūsu^eb^^a^M0.0023^ea^^b^hī’’^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Tattha ^b^tesaṃ tehī^eb^ti ca arūpakkhandhe eva parāmasati. ^b^Visabhāgatā ca hoti^eb^ rūpanibbānesu avijjamānattāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ca rūpekadesassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti catukkhandhasabhāgattā eva.

^b^Tīhi viññāṇadhātūhī^eb^ti ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayutte ^b^anārammaṇamissake^eb^ rūpadhammamissake dhamme dīpeti rūpabhavoti yojanā. ^b^Pañcahī^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇādīhi pañcahi viññāṇadhātūhi. ^b^Ekāya^eb^ manodhātuyā. ^b^Na sampayutte^eb^ti na sampayutte eva. Tathā hi ‘‘vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti vippayuttatāpaṭikkhepena. ^b^Tāhī^eb^ti sattaviññāṇadhātūhi. ^b^Sampayutte dīpentī^eb^ti sampayutte dīpentiyeva, na sampayutte evāti evamavadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Sampayutte^eb^ vedanādike. ^b^Sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṃ,^eb^ taṃyeva viññāṇadhātusattakaṃ. Sampayuttabhāvena navattabbāni ^b^sampayuttanavattabbāni,^eb^ bhinnasantānikāni, nānākkhaṇikāni ca arūpānipi dhammajātāni. ^b^Anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṃsampayuttā^eb^ dhammāyatanādipadehi dīpetabbā, ^b^anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātuyo^eb^^a^V0.0024^ea^ acetasikādipadehi dīpetabbā, ^b^tadubhayasamudāyā^eb^ dukkhasaccādipadehi dīpetabbāti veditabbā.

^b^Yadi eva^eb^nti yadi anārammaṇamissānaṃ dhammānaṃ vippayogo natthi. ^b^Anārammaṇamissobhayadhammā^eb^ti rūpanibbānasahitasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṃsampayuttadhammā. ^b^Khandhādīhevā^eb^ti khandhāyatanadhātūhi eva, na arūpakkhandhamattena. Arūpakkhandheyeva pana sandhāya ‘‘tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā’’ti vuttanti nāyaṃ dosoti dasseti. ^b^Tadekadesā^eb^ti ‘‘anārammaṇamissā’’tiādinā vuttadhammasamudāyassa ekadesā. ^b^Tadekadesaññasamudāyā^eb^ti tasseva yathāvuttassa samudāyassa ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ avayavānaṃ rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ samudāyabhūtā. ^b^Vibhāgābhāvato^eb^ti bhedābhāvato. Bhedoti cettha accantabhedo adhippeto. Na hi samudāyāvayavānaṃ sāmaññavisesānaṃ viya accantabhedo atthi bhedābhedayuttattā. Tesaṃ accantabhedameva hi sandhāya ‘‘samudāyantogadhānaṃ ekadesānaṃ na vibhāgo atthī’’ti saṅgahepi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti avibhāgasabbhāvato sabhāgavisabhāgattābhāvena. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0024^ea^. ^b^Te ca^eb^ akusalābyākatā. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā vibhattasabhāvānaṃ na tesaṃ samudāyekadesādibhāvo, tasmā. Yasmā pana kusalādayo eva khandhādayoti khandhādiāmasanena samudāyekadesādibhāvo āpanno evāti vuttanayena vippayogābhāvo hoti, tasmā taṃ pariharanto ^b^‘‘khandhādīni anāmasitvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti kusalādīnaṃ. ^b^Aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā^eb^ ‘‘kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā’’tiādinā. ^b^Sabbesū^eb^ti dutiyādisabbapañhesu.

Chattiṃsāya piṭṭhidukapadesu vīsati dukapadāni imasmiṃ naye labbhanti, avasiṭṭhāni soḷasevāti āha ^b^‘‘soḷasāti vattabba’’^eb^nti. Tato eva ‘‘tevīsapadasata’’nti ettha ‘‘tevīsa’’nti idañca ‘‘ekavīsa’’nti vattabbanti yojanā. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbapañhesu. Ekakālekasantānānaṃ bhinnakālabhinnasantānānañca anekesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudāyabhūtā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātuyoti āha ^b^‘‘kālasantāna…pe… dhātūna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ekadesasammissā^eb^ti cittiddhipādādinā attano ekadeseneva khandhantarādīhi sammissā iddhipādādayo, ^b^anārammaṇehi^eb^ rūpanibbānehi ca asammissā. ^b^Samānakālasantānehī^eb^ti ekakālasantānehi kālasantānabhedarahitehi ekadesantarehi, saṅkhārakkhandhādīnaṃ ekadesantarehi, saṅkhārakkhandhādīnaṃ ekadesavisesabhūtehi ^a^V0.0025^ea^ satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānasaññākkhandhādīhi vibhattā eva samudayasaccādayo sampayogīvippayogībhāvena, rūpakkhandhādayo vippayogībhāvena gahitāti yojanā. ^b^Tehi^eb^ samudayasaccādīhi. ^b^Te^eb^ saññākkhandhādayo. ^b^Kehici^eb^ sahuppajjanārahehi ekadesantarehi vibhattehi. Na hi saṅkhārakkhandhādipariyāpannattepi samudayasaccādayo maggasaccādīhi sampayogaṃ labhanti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti vedanākkhandhasaññākkhandhādīnaṃ. ^b^Ekuppādā…pe… visabhāgatā cā^eb^ti ekuppādāditāsaṅkhātā yathārahaṃ sabhāgatā visabhāgatā ca. ^b^Tena^eb^ yathāvuttakāraṇena sampayogassa vippayogassa ca labhanato.

Bhinnakālānaṃ samudāyīnaṃ samudāyā ^b^bhinnakālasamudāyā^eb^. ^b^Vattamānā ca^eb^ ekasmiṃ santāne ^b^ekekadhammā^eb^ vattanti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā etadeva, tasmā. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ ^b^vibhajitabbassa^eb^ ekadesabhūtassa abhāvato. ^b^Sukhindriyādīni^eb^ vedanākkhandhekadesabhūtānipi. ^b^Tena^eb^ vibhāgākaraṇena ^a^M0.0025^ea^. Yadi samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viññāṇakkhandhassa vibhāgaṃ na karonti, atha kasmā ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā’’ti vuttanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^‘‘khandhāyatana…pe… vippayuttāti vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti yathā dhātuvibhāgena vibhattassa viññāṇassa, evamevaṃ.

235.^b^Taṃsampayogībhāva^eb^nti tehi khandhehi sampayogībhāvaṃ. Yathā hi samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatehi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhehi samudayasaccassa sampayuttatā, evaṃ bhinnasantānehi bhinnakālehi ca tehi tassa vippayuttatāti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ…pe… na vutta’’^eb^nti. Visabhāgatānibandhassa vibhāgassa abhāvena ^b^avibhāgehi tehi^eb^ tīhi khandhehi. ^b^Vibhāge hī^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. ^b^Vibhāgarahitehī^eb^ti samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatattā avibhattehi vedanākkhandhādīhi na yuttaṃ vippayuttanti vattuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vijjamānehi…pe… bhāvato’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^vijjamānassa^eb^ samānassa samānajātikassāti adhippāyo. Na hi vijjamānaṃ rūpārūpaṃ aññamaññassa visabhāgaṃ na hoti. ^b^Anuppannā dhammā viyā^eb^ti idaṃ visadisudāharaṇadassanaṃ. Yathā ‘‘anuppannā dhammā’’ti anāgatakālaṃ vuccatīti āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ, evaṃ yaṃ āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hotīti attho. ^b^Uddharitabbaṃ^eb^ desanāya desetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vijjamānasseva vijjamānena sampayogo, sampayogārahasseva ^a^V0.0026^ea^ ca vippayogoti atthibhāvasannissayā sampayuttavippayuttatāti āha ^b^‘‘paccuppannabhāvaṃ nissāyā’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘avijjamānassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tañcā^eb^ti uddharaṇaṃ.

^b^Vibhāgarahitehī^eb^ti visabhāgatābhāvato avibhāgehi. ^b^Anāmaṭṭhakālabhede^eb^ti anāmaṭṭhakālavisese. ^b^Avijjamānassa…pe… sampayogo natthī^eb^ti etena pārisesato vijjamānassa ca vijjamānena sampayogo dassito. ^b^Avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite^eb^ti yathāgahitesu dhammesu tehi vippayogīnaṃ avijjamānabhāvadīpake tesaṃyeva visese ‘‘arūpabhavo ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto’’tiādinā (dhātu. 246) gahite teneva ruppanādinā bhedena tesaṃ ^a^M0.0026^ea^ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti vippayogo hotīti yojanā. ^b^Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇenā^eb^ti yathāvutte avijjamānatādīpake visese, visabhāge vā aggahite ‘‘vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto’’tiādinā tena tena gahaṇena sabhāgatādīpanena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sabhāgatāva hoti. Tathā ca sati sabhāgatte kā panettha sabhāgatāti āha ^b^‘‘vijjamānatāya…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti sabhāgatāya. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti visabhāgatāya alabbhamānattā, sabhāgatāya ca labbhamānattā.

262.^b^Vitakko viyā^eb^ti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko viya. So hi vitakkarahitattā avitakko vicāramatto ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā’’^eb^ti. Tato eva so appadhāno, dutiyajhānadhammā evettha padhānāti āha ^b^‘‘ye padhānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakkassa avitakkavicāramattaggahaṇena idha aggahitattā, vitakkattike dutiyarāsiyeva ca adhippetattā. ^b^Anantaranaye^eb^ti sampayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese. ^b^Samudayasaccena samānagatikā^eb^ sadisappavattikā. ^b^Itī^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena. ^b^Te^eb^ avitakkavicāramattā dhammā na gahitā, samudayasaccaṃ viya na desanāruḷhā. Na savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti yojanā. Yadi hi te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikā siyuṃ, ‘‘avitakkavicāramattehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā na kehici khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā’’ti vattabbā siyuṃ. Yasmā pana te samudayasaccena samānagatikā. Yathā hi ye samudayasaccena sampayuttehi vippayuttā, tesaṃ kehici vippayogaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ tehipi ^a^V0.0027^ea^. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘samudayasaccādīnī’’tiādi. ^b^Dasamo…pe… vutto^eb^ti ettha dasamanaye tehi avitakkavicāramattehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo vutto, osānanaye tehi vippayuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgaho ca vuttoti tasmā na te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti dasseti.

^b^Vitakkasahitesū^eb^ti ^a^M0.0027^ea^ sahavitakkesu. ^b^Tesū^eb^ti avitakkavicāramattesu saha vitakkena dutiyajjhānadhammesu, ‘‘avitakkavicāramattā’’ti gahitesu vuttesūti attho. ^b^Sabbepi te^eb^ti dutiyajjhānadhammā vitakko cāti sabbepi te dhammā sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hi sampayogavippayogapadaniddese ‘‘avitakkavicāramattā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ekena khandhenā^eb^ti saṅkhārakkhandhena. ^b^So hi samudāyo^eb^ti ‘‘avitakkavicāramattā dhammā’’ti vuttadhammasamudāyo. Nanu vitakkopettha dhammasaṅgahaṃ gato, so ca vicārato aññenapi sampayuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘na hi tadekadesassa…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathā^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ iddhipādanidassanena vibhāveti. Tassattho – yathā iddhipādasamudāyassa ekadesabhūtānaṃ chandiddhipādādīnaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo vutto, taṃsamudāyassa na hoti, evaṃ idhāpi vitakkassa aññehi sampayogo avitakkavicāramattassa samudāyassa na hotīti.

Yadi evaṃ ‘‘iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto’’tiādi na vattabbanti ce? No na vattabbanti dassento ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^tesū^eb^ti iddhipādesu. ^b^Samudāyassā^eb^ti iddhipādasamudāyassa. ^b^Tehi^eb^ vedanākkhandhādīhi ^b^sampayuttatā vuttā^eb^ ‘‘iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto’’tiādinā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti vicārena. ^b^Na hī^eb^tiādinā yathādhigatadhammānaṃ sampayuttatāya navattabbābhāvaṃ udāharaṇadassanavasena vibhāveti. ^b^Keci^eb^ vicikicchā taṃsahagatā ca mohavajjā mohena sampayuttā, keci asampayuttā. ^b^Mohenā^eb^ti vicikicchāsahagatamohameva sandhāya vadati. ^b^Iti^eb^ iminā kāraṇena na samudāyo ^b^tena^eb^ mohena sampayutto. ^b^Añño koci dhammo^eb^ hetubhāvo nāpi atthi, ^b^yena^eb^ hetunā ^b^so^eb^ dassanenapahātabbahetukoti vutto samudāyo. ^b^Eva^eb^nti iminā nayena ‘‘bhāvanā…pe… yopi sampayuttā’’ti navattabbatāya nidassetabbāti attho. ^b^Eva^eb^nti yathā dassanenapahātabbahetukasamudāyassa sampayuttatā na vattabbā, evaṃ yena dhammena avitakka…pe… siyā, taṃ na natthi. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā avitakkavicāramattesu kocipi vicārena ^a^V0.0028^ea^ asampayutto natthi, tasmā. ^b^Te^eb^ti avitakkavicāramattā ^a^M0.0028^ea^ dhammā. ^b^Ekadhammepi…pe… kato^eb^ yathā ‘‘appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā’’ti.
Chaṭṭhanayasampayogavippayogapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

306.^b^Tehi^eb^ samudayasaccādīhi khandhattayakhandhekadesādike ^b^sampayutte satipi, sampayuttehi ca vippayutte^eb^ rūpanibbānādike tadaññadhamme satipi vippayogābhāvato. Saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ lobhasahagatacittuppādato ^b^aññadhammānaṃ^eb^ avasiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ ^b^khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo na hi atthi^eb^ khandhapañcakādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhanato tesaṃ. ^b^Te eva cittuppādā^eb^ti te lobhasahagatacittuppādā eva. ^b^Tadaññadhammāna^eb^nti tadaññadhammānampīti pi-saddalopo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti iminā na ca te eva dhammā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyo, atha kho te ca tato aññe cāti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati.

Nanu tadaññabhāvato eva tehi itaresaṃ vippayogo siddhoti āha ^b^‘‘na cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tadaññasamudāyehī^eb^ti tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññasamudāyehi ^b^aññe^eb^ lobhasahagatā dhammā vippayuttā na honti. Kasmā? ^b^Samudāye…pe… vippayogābhāvato^eb^. Tassattho – ^b^samudāyena^eb^ lobhasahagatatadaññadhammarāsinā ^b^ekadesānaṃ^eb^ lobhasahagatadhammānaṃ vippayogābhāvato, tathā ye ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ avayavānaṃ samudāyabhūtā, tesañca samudāyena vippayogābhāvatoti. Anena samudāyena avayavassa samudāyassa avayavena ca tassa na vippayogo, avayavasseva pana avayavenāti dasseti. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yvāyaṃ samudayasacce vutto vidhi, eseva maggasaccasukhindriyādīsu arūpakkhandhekadesattā tesanti dasseti. ^b^Niravasesesū^eb^ti abahikatavitakkesu. Vitakko hi samudāyato abahikato. ‘‘So hi samudāyo’’tiādiko vuttanayo labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissatī’’^eb^ti.

^b^Aññesupi^eb^^a^M0.0029^ea^^a^V0.0029^ea^ samudayasaccādīsu ^b^vissajjanassa…pe… daṭṭhabbaṃ,^eb^ yato samudayasaccādi idha na gahitanti adhippāyo. Sampayuttādhikārato ‘‘aññenā’’ti padaṃ sampayuttato aññaṃ vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘asampayuttena asammissanti attho’’^eb^ti. Idāni byatirekenapi tamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^‘‘adukkhamasukhā…pe… gahitānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Etena lakkhaṇenā^eb^ti ‘‘asampayuttena asammissa’’nti vuttalakkhaṇena. ^b^Citta^eb^nti ‘‘cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’ti pañhaṃ upalakkheti. ^b^Sahayuttapadehi sattā^eb^ti ‘‘cetasikehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’tiādinā cittena sahayutte dhamme dīpentehi padehi āgatā satta pañhā. Tiṇṇaṃ tikapadānamaggahaṇena ^b^ūnoti katvā^eb^. Ye sandhāya ^b^‘‘tike tayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana vedanāpītittikesu pacchimaṃ, vitakkattike paṭhamanti padattayaṃ veditabbaṃ.

309. Uddhaṭapadena pakāsiyamānā atthā abhedopacārena ‘‘uddhaṭapada’’nti vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tena^eb^ ca yathāvuttena uddhaṭapadena. ^b^Manena yuttā^eb^ti ettha mananamattattā manodhātu ‘‘mano’’ti vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā’’^eb^ti.
Sattamanayasampayuttenavippayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

317. Rūpakkhandhena vippayuttā nāma cattāro arūpino khandhā, tesaṃ aññehi sampayogo nāma natthi tādisassa aññassa sampayogino abhāvato. Samudāyassa ca ekadesena sampayogo natthīti vuttovāyamattho. Vedanākkhandhādīhi vippayuttaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānañca, tassa kenaci sampayogo natthevāti āha ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandhādīhi…pe… natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā’’tiādivacanena.
Aṭṭhamanayavippayuttenasampayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

319. ‘‘Samāsapadaṃ ^a^M0.0030^ea^^a^V0.0030^ea^ ida’’nti vatvā ayaṃ nāma samāsoti dassento ^b^‘‘yassa khandhādino’’^eb^tiādimāha, yassa vedanākkhandhādinoti attho. ^b^Yaṃ idha sampayuttaṃ vutta^eb^nti imasmiṃ navamanaye yaṃ dhammajātaṃ sampayuttanti vuttaṃ. ^b^Rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu^eb^ abbhantarabāhiramātikādhammesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^Tañhi^eb^ dhammajātaṃ ^b^attanā sampayuttena^eb^ vedanākkhandhādinā sayaṃ sampayuttanti niddhāritaṃ. ^b^Ayogo^eb^ti asampayogo. ^b^Vakkhati^eb^ dasamanaye. Tattha hi ‘‘rūpakkhandhena vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi rūpakkhandho vippayutto’’ti vatvā nibbānaṃ kathanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ pana sukhumarūpagatikamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Manāyatanaṃ ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta’’nti ettha hi yathā sukhumarūpaṃ viya sarūpato anuddhaṭampi nibbānaṃ kehicītipadena gahitameva hotīti edisesu ṭhānesu nibbānaṃ sukhumarūpagatikanti viññāyati, evamidhāpi ‘‘rūpamissakehi vā’’ti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi asampayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi padehi sahavattino aññassa sampayogino abhāvato atītānāgatehi ca sampayogo natthevāti tassa ayujjamānataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vattamānānameva…pe… arūpabhavādīhīti attho’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Itare^eb^ti ye sampayogaṃ labhanti, ke pana te rūpena asammissā arūpekadesabhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vedanākkhandhādayo’’^eb^ti.
Navamanayasampayuttenasampayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

353. Ye vippayuttena vippayuttabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ aggahitā, tesu keci vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvato keci khandhādīhi vippayogasseva asambhavatoti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘dhammāyatanādidhammā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sabbacittuppādagatadhammabhāvato^eb^ti iminā bhinnakālatādivisesavato arūpakkhandhassa vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvamāha, ^b^anārammaṇamissakabhāvato^eb^ti iminā pana sabbassapi. Kāmabhavo ^a^M0.0031^ea^ upapattibhavo saññībhavo pañcavokārabhavoti ^a^V0.0031^ea^ ime ^b^cattāro mahābhavā. Vippayogābhāvato^eb^ti vippayogāsambhavato. Na hi ye dukkhasaccādīhi vippayuttā, tehi vippayuttānaṃ tesaṃyeva dukkhasaccādīnaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo sambhavati.
Dasamanayavippayuttenavippayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

409.^b^Te^eb^ti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā. ^b^Sesehī^eb^ti avasiṭṭhehi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhehi. ^b^‘‘Etena saha sambandho’’^eb^ti iminā padānaṃ sambandhadassanamukhena ‘‘samudayasaccena ye dhammā sampayuttā’’ti pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā kehicītipadassatthaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘kehicīti etassa panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Atthaṃ dassetuṃ āhāti sambandho. ^b^Visesetvā^eb^ti ettha tesaṃ dhammānaṃ taṇhāvajjānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātupariyāpannatākittanaṃ visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yato te samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttā. Sayaṃ attanā sampayutto na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘attavajjehī’’^eb^ti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘cittaṃ na vattabbaṃ cittena sampayuttantipi, cittena vippayuttantipī’’ti. ^b^Sampayogārahehī^eb^ti visesanaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ nibbānanti dve sandhāya kataṃ, na taṇhādike.
Ekādasamanayasaṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
417. Navamanaye sampayogavisiṭṭhā sampayuttā uddhaṭā, dvādasamanaye ca sampayogavisiṭṭhā saṅgahitāsaṅgahitāti ubhayatthāpi sampayogavisiṭṭhāva gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘dvādasama…pe… labbhantī’’^eb^ti.
Dvādasamanayasampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

448.^b^Yehī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0032^ea^^a^V0.0032^ea^ rūpakkhandhadhammāyatanādīhi. ^b^Tīhipi^eb^ khandhāyatanādisaṅgahehi. Puna ^b^yehī^eb^ti arūpabhavādīhi. ^b^Oḷārikāyatanāneva honti^eb^ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehipi asaṅgahitattā. ^b^Te^eb^ti catuvokārabhavādayo. ^b^Vuttāvasesā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhadhammāyatanādīhi avasiṭṭhā. Satipi asaṅgāhakatte tehi asaṅgahitānaṃ sampayogo na sambhavatīti ^b^vedanākkhandhādayo idha^eb^ terasamanaye ^b^vissajjanaṃ na ruhanti^eb^ nārohanti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti, tesañca sampayogo nāma natthī’’ti (dhātu. 448) ^b^asaṅgāhakā eva na honti^eb^ avikalapañcakkhandhādisamudāyabhāvato.

^b^Te^eb^ti ‘‘dukkhasaccādī’’ti ādi-saddena vuttadhammā. ^b^Asabba…pe… siyuṃ^eb^ avitakkāvicārādidhammā viya. ^b^Na tesaṃ vippayogo natthi^eb^ tabbinimuttassa cittuppādassa sambhavato. ^b^Vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṃ^eb^ anārammaṇamissakattā na ‘‘vippayogassa atthitāyā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tathā cāha ‘‘rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā’’ti. ^b^Ubhayābhāvato^eb^ti sampayogavippayogābhāvato. ^b^Anārammaṇasahitasabbaviññāṇataṃdhātusampayuttatadubhayadhammā^eb^ acetasikacetasikalokiyapadādīnaṃ vasena veditabbā.
Terasamanayaasaṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
456.^b^Dhammasabhāvamattattā^eb^ti sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammamattattā avatthāvisesamattattā.

Samucchijjati etenāti ^b^samucchedo^eb^. Saṅgahādivicārapariniṭṭhānabhūto cuddasamanayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariyosāne naye’’^eb^ti. Vissajjetabbadhammavivittā pucchā ^b^moghapucchā,^eb^ sā tathābhūtāpi vissajjetabbadhammābhāvassa ñāpikā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ pucchāya moghattā te na labbhantī’’^eb^ti. Moghā pucchā etassāti ^b^moghapucchako. Aṭṭhamo nayo^eb^^a^M0.0033^ea^ tattha sabbapucchānaṃ moghattā ^a^V0.0033^ea^. ^b^Tena ca sahā^eb^ti tena aṭṭhamanayena saddhiṃ imasmiṃ osānanaye aṭṭhamanaye ca osānanaye ca ^b^ete^eb^ dhammāyatanādayo sabbappakārena na labbhanti. ^b^Vippayogassapi abhāvā^eb^ti tattha kāraṇamāha.
Cuddasamanayavippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Dhātukathāpakaraṇa-anuṭīkā samattā.

1. ‘‘Dhātukathaṃ ^a^M0.0035^ea^^a^V0.0034^ea^ desayitvā anantaraṃ tassa āha puggalapaññatti’’nti vutte tattha kāraṇaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya vibhāvento ^b^‘‘dhammasaṅgahe’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yadipi dhammasaṅgahe phassādīnaṃ pathavīādīnañca dhammānaṃ nānānayavicitto anupadavibhāgopi kato, na saṅgaho eva, so pana tesaṃ kusalattikādihetudukāditikadukehi saṅgahasandassanatthoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammasaṅgahe tikadukādivasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammāna’’^eb^nti. Teneva hi taṃ pakaraṇaṃ ‘‘dhammasaṅgaho’’ti samaññaṃ labhi. Kāmañca dhammasaṅgahepi ‘‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 58) khandhādivibhāgo dassito, so pana na tathā sātisayo, yathā vibhaṅgapakaraṇeti sātisayaṃ taṃ gahetvā āha ^b^‘‘vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ dassetvā’’^eb^ti, yato taṃ ‘‘vibhaṅgo’’tveva paññāyittha. ^b^Dhātukathāyā^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ, tathā ‘‘dhammasaṅgahe vibhaṅge’’ti etthāpi. Ādhāro hi saṅgahaṇavibhajanappabhedavacanasaṅkhātānaṃ ^a^V0.0035^ea^ avayavakiriyānaṃ taṃsamudāyabhūtāni pakaraṇāni yathā ‘‘rukkhe sākhā’’ti. Karaṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ, dhātukathāya karaṇabhūtāyāti attho.

Ettha ca abhiññeyyadhamme desento desanākusalo bhagavā tikadukavasena tāva nesaṃ saṅgahaṃ dassento ^b^dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ^eb^ desetvā saṅgahapubbakattā vibhāgassa tadanantaraṃ khandhādivasena vibhāgaṃ dassento ^b^vibhaṅgaṃ^eb^ desesi. Puna yathāvuttavibhāgasaṅgahayutte dhamme saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayappabhedato dassento ^b^dhātukathaṃ^eb^ desesi tassā abbhantarabāhiramātikāsarīrakattā. Na hi sakkā khandhādike kusalādike ca vinā saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayaṃ netunti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tathāsaṅgahitavibhattāna’’^eb^nti. Evaṃ saṅgahato vibhāgato pabhedato ca dhammānaṃ desanā yassā ^a^M0.0036^ea^ paññattiyā vasena hoti, yo cāyaṃ yathāvuttadhammupādāno puggalavohāro, tassa ca samayavimuttādivasena vibhāgo, taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^puggalapaññatti^eb^ desitāti idametesaṃ catunnaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ desanānukkamakāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

^b^Tesa^eb^nti dhammānaṃ. ^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti ‘‘phasso vedanā’’tiādisabhāvato. ^b^Upādāyā^eb^ti ‘‘puggalo satto poso’’tiādinā khandhe upādāya. Paññāpanaṃ ^b^yāya^eb^ tajjāupādādibhedāya paññattiyā hoti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ paññattiṃ. ^b^Pabhedato^eb^ti khandhādisamayavimuttādivibhāgato. Yāya paññattiyā sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpananti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘tattha ye dhamme’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha asabhāvapaññattiyāpi mūlabhūtaṃ upādānaṃ sabhāvadhammo eva, kevalaṃ pana tesaṃ pavattiākārabhedasannissayato visesoti dassento ^b^‘‘ye dhamme…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ^b^pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāne^eb^ti iminā pabandhasannissayataṃ dassento santānapaññattiṃ vadati, ^b^asabhāvasamūhavasenā^eb^ti iminā sesapaññattiṃ. Tisso hi paññattiyo santānapaññatti samūhapaññatti avatthāvisesapaññattīti. Tattha pabandho ^b^santāno^eb^. Samudāyo ^b^samūho^eb^. Uppādādiko daharabhāvādiko ca ^b^avatthāviseso^eb^. Tesu asabhāvaggahaṇena vinā pabandhasamūhānaṃ asabhāvatte siddhe asabhāvasamūhavasenāti asabhāvaggahaṇaṃ pabandhasamūhavinimuttapaññattisandassanatthanti tena avatthāvisesapaññattiyā pariggaho vuttoti veditabbo.

^b^Tesa^eb^nti pubbe yaṃ-saddena parāmaṭṭhānaṃ indriyabaddhadhammānaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘aññesañca bāhirarūpanibbānāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sasabhāvasamūhasasabhāvappabhedavasenā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhādisasabhāvasamūhavasena cakkhāyatanādisasabhāvavisesavasena ca. ‘‘Sasabhāvasamūhasabhāvabhedavasenā’’ti ca pāṭho. Tattha ^b^samūhasabhāvo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0036^ea^ sabhāvasantānaṃ avatthāvisesavidhuraṃ samūhavasena lakkhaṇamevāha. Tathā hi khandhapaññattiyāpi sabhāvapaññattitā vuttā. ^b^Tāyā^eb^ti āyatanapaññattiādippabhedāya sabhāvapaññattiyā. ^b^Vibhattā sabhāvapaññattī^eb^ti ‘‘phasso phusanā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 2) vibhattā phassādisabhāvapaññatti. ^b^Sabbāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena sabhāvadhammesu sāmaññavasena pavattaṃ kusalādipaññattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rūpādidhammānaṃ samūho santānena ^a^M0.0037^ea^ pavattamāno avatthāvisesasahito ekattaggahaṇanibandhano sattoti voharīyatīti so sabhāvadhammo nāma pana na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘puggalapaññatti pana asabhāvapaññattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tāyā^eb^ti puggalapaññattiyā. Yasmā pana dhammānaṃ pabandho samūho ca dhammasannissitoti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā ^b^‘‘pariññeyyādisabhāvadhamme upādāya pavattito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

^b^Vijjamānapaññatti^eb^ pana ‘‘sabhāvapaññattī’’ti vuttā, ^b^avijjamānapaññatti^eb^ ‘‘asabhāvapaññattī’’ti vuttā. ^b^Sabbā paññattiyo^eb^ti upādāyapaññattikiccapaññattiādayo sabbā paññattiyo. Yadi sabbā paññattiyo idha dassitā honti, kathaṃ ‘‘puggalapaññattī’’ti nāmaṃ jātanti āha ^b^‘‘khandhādipaññattīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aññatthā^eb^ti dhammasaṅgahādīsu. ^b^Ye dhamme^eb^ti ye khandhādidhamme. ^b^Paññattiyā vatthubhāvenā^eb^ti paññāpanassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvena. Adhiṭṭhānañhi paññāpetabbadhammā paññāpanassa. Evañca katvā khandhādīhi saddhiṃ puggalo gahito. ^b^Ye dhamme^eb^ti vā ye paññattidhamme. ^b^Paññāpetukāmo^eb^ti nikkhipitukāmo vatthubhedato asaṅkarato ṭhapetukāmo. ^b^Paññattipariccheda^eb^nti ca vatthubhedabhinnaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ paricchedaṃ. Evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

^b^Sāmaññappabhedapaññāpanā^eb^ti sāmaññabhūtānaṃ visesabhūtānañca atthānaṃ paññāpanā. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti attha-saddāpekkhāya pulliṅganiddeso. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti paññāpanāya atthadassanabhūtesu dassanādīsu. ^b^Idamevaṃnāmaka^eb^nti idaṃ ruppanādiatthajātaṃ itthannāmakaṃ rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādisamaññaṃ. ^b^Taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāsikakaraṇa^eb^nti rūpavedanāditaṃtaṃatthavibhāgapariyāpannatāpādanaṃ. Tathā saññuppādānamevāti āha ^b^‘‘bodhanameva nikkhipanā’’^eb^ti. Bodhanañhi bodhaneyyasantāne bodhetabbassa atthassa ṭhapananti katvā ‘‘nikkhipanā’’ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Paññāpanā’’tiādinā bhāvasādhanena vatvā sādhanantarāmasanena atthantaraparikappāsaṅkā siyāti taṃ nivāretuṃ ^b^‘‘yo panāyaṃ…pe… veditabbo’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti taṃtaṃpaññāpetabbadhammānaṃ. Dassanabhūtāya nāmapaññattiyā ^b^diṭṭhatāya,^eb^ ṭhapanabhūtāya ^b^ṭhapitatāya. Taṃnimittata^eb^nti tassa dassanassa ṭhapanassa ca nimittakāraṇataṃ. Nimittañhi kattubhāvena ^a^V0.0037^ea^ voharīyati yathā ‘‘bhikkhā vāsetī’’ti, ‘‘ariyabhāvakarāni saccāni ariyasaccānī’’ti ca.

^b^Pāḷiyaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0038^ea^^b^anāgatata^eb^nti vijjamānatādivisesavacanena saha pāṭhānāruḷhataṃ. ^b^Vijjamānassa sato^eb^ti vijjamānassa samānassāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vijjamānabhūtassāti attho’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena ^b^avijjamānassa^eb^ anupalabbhamānassa. Taṃ pana anupalabbhamānataṃ tathā-saddena byatirekavasena dīpitaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā kusalādīnī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^vinivattasabhāvānī^eb^ti vibhattasabhāvāni. ^b^Upaladdhī^eb^ti gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Tenākārenā^eb^ti tena rūpavedanādiākārena avijjamānassa. ^b^Aññenākārenā^eb^ti tato rūpavedanādito aññena tabbinimuttena paññāpetabbapaññāpanākārena vijjamānassa. Paññattiduke vuttameva ‘‘ayañca vādo sevatthikathāya paṭisiddho’’tiādinā. ^b^Lokaniruttimattasiddhassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^matta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ tassa paññattivatthussa na kevalaṃ vijjamānasabhāvatānivattanatthameva, atha kho viparītaggāhanivattanatthampīti dassento ^b^‘‘anabhinivesena cittenā’’^eb^ti āha. Catusaccapañcakkhandhādivinimuttaṃ saccantarakhandhantarādikaṃ ^b^pañcamasaccādikaṃ^eb^. Sace taṃ koci atthīti paṭijāneyya, ayāthāvagahitassa taṃ vācāvatthumattamevassāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sābhinivesena…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. Uddese niddese ca sattavantaṃ padhānabhāvena āgamanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatata’’^eb^nti. Guṇabhāvena pana uddhaṃsotapaññāvimuttapāsāṇalekhādiggahaṇesu itarāpi tisso paññattiyo imasmiṃ pakaraṇe āgatā eva.

^b^Yathāvuttassa…pe… avirodhenā^eb^ti ‘‘vijjamānapaññatti avijjamānapaññattī’’ti evaṃ vuttappakārassa avilomanena. ^b^Ācariyavādā^eb^ti cettha attanomatiyo veditabbā, aññattha pana aṭṭhakathā ca. Yathā ca avirodho hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^avijjamānattā paññāpetabbamattatthena paññattī^eb^ti etena ‘‘avijjamānā paññatti avijjamānapaññattī’’ti imaṃ samāsavikappamāha. ^b^Avijjamānapaññattī^eb^ti ettha hi dve samāsā avijjamānassa, avijjamānā vā paññattīti avijjamānapaññatti. Tesu purimena nāmapaññatti vuttā, dutiyena upādāpaññattiādibhedā itarāpi. ^b^Sasabhāvaṃ^eb^ vedanādikaṃ. ^b^Tajjaparamatthanāmalābhato^eb^ti tajjassa tadanurūpassa paramatthassa anvatthassa nāmassa labhanato, anubhavanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ paramatthikassa vedanādināmassa labhanattāti attho ^a^M0.0039^ea^. Etena visesanivattiattho ^a^V0.0038^ea^ matta-saddo, tena cāyaṃ viseso nivattitoti dasseti. ^b^Parato labhitabba^eb^nti paraṃ upādāya laddhabbaṃ yathā rūpādike upādāya sattoti nissabhāvasamūhasantānādi paññattivatthu. ^b^Ekattenā^eb^ti anaññattena. ^b^Anupalabbhasabhāvatā^eb^ ñāṇena aggahetabbasabhāvatā, yato te navattabbāti vuccanti.

Sasūkasālirāsiādiākārena saṃkucitaggo vāsavavāsudevādīnaṃ viya moliviseso kirīṭaṃ, so pana makuṭavisesopi hotiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘kirīṭaṃ makuṭa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabbasamorodho^eb^ti sabbāsaṃ vijjamānapaññattiādīnaṃ channaṃ paññattīnaṃ antokaraṇaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhātabbappadhānattā^eb^ti idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Na hi sabbāpi upanidhāpaññattisaṅkhāvasena pavattā, nāpi sabbā saṅkhātabbappadhānā. ^b^Dutiyaṃ tatiya^eb^ntiādikaṃ pana upanidhāpaññattiyā, ^b^dve tīṇī^eb^tiādikaṃ upanikkhittapaññattiyā ekadesaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena dassento tassa ca saṅkhyeyyappadhānatāyāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhātabbappadhānattā’’^eb^ti. Pūraṇattho hi saddo tadatthadīpanamukhena pūretabbamatthaṃ dīpeti. So ca saṅkhāvisayo padhānovāti dutiyādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ saṅkhātabbappadhānatā vuttā. Yāva hi dasasaṅkhā saṅkhyeyyappadhānāti. Tathā ^b^dve tīṇī^eb^tiādīnampi paññattīnaṃ. Saṅkhātabbo pana attho koci vijjamāno, koci avijjamāno, koci saha visuñca tadubhayaṃ missoti ^b^chapi paññattiyo bhajatī^eb^ti.

^b^Itarā^eb^ti upādāsamodhānatajjāsantatipaññattiyo vuttāvasesā upanidhāpaññattiupanikkhittapaññattiyo ca. Sattarathādibhedā upādāpaññatti, dīgharassādibhedā upanidhāpaññatti ca avijjamānapaññatti. Hatthagatādivisiṭṭhā upanidhāpaññatti, samodhānapaññatti ca avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti. Tatheva ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇo brahmassaro’’tiādikā vijjamānagabbhā vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattiṃ bhajantīti āha ^b^‘‘yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññatti’’^eb^nti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ…pe… bhajantī’’ti. ^b^Yañhī^eb^tiādi yathāvuttaupanidhāupanikkhittapaññattīnaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvasamatthanaṃ. Tattha ^b^tañca saṅkhāna^eb^nti yaṃ ‘‘paṭhamaṃ eka’’ntiādikaṃ saṅkhānaṃ, tañca saṅkhāmukhena gahetabbarūpaṃ. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddena saṅkhyeyyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tampi hi paññāpetabbaṃ paññattīti. Tassā pana paramatthato abhāvo vuttoyeva. ^b^Kiñci^eb^^a^M0.0040^ea^^b^natthī^eb^ti paramatthato kiñci natthi. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti iminā avijjamānenaavijjamānabhāvanti etaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hi…pe… vijjamāno’’^eb^ti.

^b^Okāse^eb^ti ^a^V0.0039^ea^ avīciparanimmitavasavattīparicchinne padese. So hi kāmādhiṭṭhānato ‘‘kāmo’’ti vuccati. ^b^Kammanibbattakkhandhesū^eb^ti iminā uttarapadalopena kāmabhavaṃ ‘‘kāmo’’ti vadati. Bhaṇanaṃ saddo cetanā vā, taṃsamaṅgitāya tabbisiṭṭhe puggale bhāṇakoti paññattīti āha ^b^‘‘vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattipakkhaṃ bhajatī’’^eb^ti. Yebhuyyena rūpāyatanaggahaṇamukhena rūpasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānaṃ gayhatīti tassa tena abhedopacāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānenā’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ abhedopacāraṃ bhindituṃ ajānantā nikāyantariyā rūpāyatanaṃ saṇṭhānasabhāvaṃ paṭijānanti. ‘‘Kiso puggalo, thūlo puggalo, kiso daṇḍo, thūlo daṇḍo’’tiādinā puggalādīnaṃ paññāpanā tathātathāsanniviṭṭhe rūpasaṅkhāte kisādisaṇṭhānapaññatti, na rūpāyatanamatteti āha ^b^‘‘saṇṭhānanti vā rūpāyatane aggahite’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccattadhammanāmavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘pathavī phasso’’tiādinā dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃnāmavasena. Kiccapaññattiādivibhāgena pavatto ayampi ācariyavādo ‘‘kiccapaññatti ekaccā bhūmipaññatti paccattapaññatti asaṅkhatapaññatti ca vijjamānapaññatti, liṅgapaññatti ekaccā paccattapaññatti ca avijjamānapaññatti, ekaccā kiccapaññatti vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti, ekaccā bhūmisaṇṭhānapaññatti vijjamānena vā avijjamānena vā avijjamānapaññattī’’ti dassitattā ‘‘dhammakathā itthiliṅga’’ntiādīnaṃ vijjamānenavijjamānapaññattibhāvo, avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvo ca dassitanayoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbasaṅgāhakoti daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. Upādāpaññattiādibhāvo cettha kiccapaññattiādīnaṃ kiccapaññattiādibhāvo ca tāsaṃ yathārahaṃ vibhāvetabbo.

2.^b^Saṅkhepappabhedavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘yāvatā pañcakkhandhā’’ti sabbepi khandhe khandhabhāvasāmaññena saṃkhipanavasena, ‘‘yāvatā rūpakkhandho’’tiādinā khandhānaṃ tato sāmaññato pakārehi bhindanavasena ca. ^b^Ayaṃ attho^eb^ti ayaṃ paññattisaṅkhāto attho. Sāmaññato vā hi dhammānaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti visesato vā. Viseso cettha attano sāmaññāpekkhāya veditabbo, visesāpekkhāya pana sopi sāmaññaṃ sampajjatīti ‘‘kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī’’ti pucchāya saṅkhepato vissajjanavasena ^a^M0.0041^ea^ ‘‘yāvatā pañcakkhandhā’’ti vuttanti tatthāpi ‘‘khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī’’ti ānetvā yojetabbanti āha ^b^‘‘yāvatā…pe… paññattī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Yāvatā pañcakkhandhā, ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti. Yāvatā rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho, ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī’’ti evamettha pāḷiyojanā kātabbā. Evañhi saṅkhepato pabhedato ca khandhapaññatti vissajjitā hoti. Tathā hi imasseva atthassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ ^a^V0.0040^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘yattakena…pe… ādikenā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ vissajjanassa atthavacane, tasmiṃ vā vissajjanapāṭhe tadatthavacane ca. ^b^Pabhedanidassanamatta^eb^nti pabhedassa udāharaṇamattaṃ. ^b^Avuttopi sabbo^eb^ bhūtupādiko, sukhādiko ca pabhedo. Taṃ pana bhūmimukhena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro’’^eb^tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena pāḷiyā atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ pakārantarena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ayaṃ vā^eb^ti vuccamānaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ khandhapaññattivissajjane. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ padaṃ. ^b^Yattako…pe… khandhapaññattiyā pabhedo^eb^ti iminā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca khandhānaṃ pabhedaṃ pati paññattivibhāgoti dassitaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vatthubhedena…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pakaraṇantare^eb^ti vibhaṅgapakaraṇe. Tattha hi sātisayaṃ khandhānaṃ vibhāgapaññatti vuttā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘sammāsambuddhena hi…pe… kathitā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca paṭhamanaye samukhena, dutiye vatthumukhena paññattiyā vibhāgā dassitāti ayametesaṃ viseso.

^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti iminā khandhapaññattiyā vuttamatthaṃ āyatanapaññattiyādīsu atidisati. Tattha ^b^‘‘yāvatā pañcakkhandhā’’^eb^ti, ^b^‘‘khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī’’^eb^ti idaṃ paññattiniddesapāḷiyā ādipariyosānaggahaṇamukhena dassanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Yāvatā dvādasāyatanānī’’^eb^ti, ^b^‘‘āyatanānaṃ āyatanapaññattī’’^eb^ti imassa attho ^b^‘‘yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato dvādasāyatanānī’’^eb^ti etena dassito, ^b^‘‘yāvatā cakkhāyatana’’^eb^ntiādikassa pana ^b^‘‘pabhedato cakkhāyatana’’^eb^ntiādikenāti. Tattha ^b^‘‘cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… dhammāyatana’’^eb^nti pabhedanidassanamattametaṃ. Etena avuttopi sabbo saṅgahito hotīti ^b^‘‘tatrāpi dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ vā ettha pāḷiyā atthayojanā – ‘‘yāvatā’’ti idaṃ sabbehi padehi ^a^M0.0042^ea^ yojetvā ‘‘yattakāni dvādasāyatanāni…pe… yattako dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tappabhedānañca cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pabhedo, tattako āyatanānaṃ āyatanapaññattiyā pabhedo’’ti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthupabhedena āyatanapaññattiyā pabhedaṃ dassetītiādinā itarapaññattīsupi nayo yojetabbo.

7. ‘‘Cha paññattiyo…pe… puggalapaññattī’’ti imaṃ apekkhitvā ‘‘kittāvatā…pe… ettāvatā indriyānaṃ indriyapaññattī’’ti ayaṃ pāḷipadeso niddesopi samāno ^a^V0.0041^ea^ pakaraṇantare vatthubhedena vuttaṃ khandhādipaññattippabhedaṃ upādāya uddesoyeva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘uddesamattenevāti attho’’^eb^ti.
Mātikāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

1. Paccanīkadhammānaṃ ^a^M0.0043^ea^^a^V0.0042^ea^ jhāpanaṭṭhena jhānaṃ, tato suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkhoti nippariyāyena jhānaṅgāneva vimokkhoti aṭṭhakathāadhippāyo. Ṭīkākārena pana ‘‘abhibhāyatanaṃ viya sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ vimokkho’’ti maññamānena ^b^‘‘adhippāyenāhā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Jhānadhammā hi sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃyeva paṭipakkhato vimuccanti, na vinā, tathā abhirativasena ārammaṇe nirāsaṅkappavattipīti adhippāyo. Yathā vā jhānaṅgānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayabhāvato saviseso jhānapariyāyo, evaṃ vimokkhakiccayogato tesaṃ saviseso vimokkhapariyāyo, tadupacārena sampayuttānaṃ veditabbo. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ samaṅgibhāvattha^eb^nti paṭilābhaṃ sandhāyāha. ‘‘Phusitvā viharatīti paṭilabhitvā iriyatī’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘yena hi saddhiṃ…pe… paṭiladdhā nāma hontī’’ti tehi sādhetabbasahajātādipaccayalābhoyevettha paṭilābho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā phasso yattha uppanno, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusatīti vuccati, evaṃ sampayuttadhammepi taṃsabhāvattāti āha ^b^‘‘samphassena phusanattha’’^eb^nti. Tassa ‘‘vivaratī’’ti iminā sambandho. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti upacārampītiādinā upacārapurimappanāparappanānaṃ paṭilābhakāraṇanti vacanehi. ^b^Itare kāraṇatthe^eb^ti ‘‘upacārena…pe… phusatiyevā’’ti vutte kāraṇatthadīpake atthe. Phusati phalaṃ adhigacchati etāyāti kāraṇabhāvassa phusanāpariyāyo veditabbo.

^b^Paṭhamatthamevā^eb^ti samaṅgibhāvatthameva. ^b^Tāni aṅgānī^eb^ti iminā jhānakoṭṭhāsabhāvena vuttadhammāyeva gahitā, na phassapañcamakaindriyaṭṭhakādibhāvenāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sesā…pe… saṅgahitānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ satī^eb^ti sukhasaṅkhātajhānaṅgato vedanāsomanassindriyānaṃ sesitabbabhāve ^a^V0.0043^ea^ sati. Evañhi nesaṃ phassakatā itarassa phassitabbatāva siyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukhassa phusitabbattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vedayitādhipateyyaṭṭhehī^eb^ti ārammaṇānubhavanasaṅkhātena vedayitasabhāvena, tasseva sātavisesasaṅkhātena sampayuttehi anuvattanīyabhāvena ca. ^b^Upanijjhāyanabhāvo^eb^pi yathāvuttavedayitādhipateyyaṭṭhavisiṭṭho oḷārikassa ārammaṇassa nijjhāyanabhāvo. Abhinnasabhāvopi hi dhammo purimavisiṭṭhapaccayavisesasambhavena visesena ^a^M0.0044^ea^ bhinnākāro hutvā visiṭṭhaphalabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Yathekaṃyeva kammaṃ cakkhādinibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ.
