Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vedayitā…pe… vuttattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅgānī^eb^ti nāyaṃ tapparabhāvena bahuvacananiddeso anantabhāvato, kevalañca aṅgānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ, tena kiṃ siddhaṃ? Paccekampi yojanā siddhā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paccekampi yojanā kātabbā’’^eb^ti. Yadi ‘‘sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā’’ti yojanāyaṃ sesā tayo khandhā honti, sesā tayo, cattāro ca khandhā hontīti vattabbaṃ siyāti? Na, catūsu tiṇṇaṃ antogadhattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbayojanā…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti.

2.^b^Asamayavimokkhenā^eb^ti heṭṭhāmaggavimokkhena. So hi lokiyavimokkho viya adhigamavaḷañjanatthaṃ pakappetabbasamayavisesābhāvato evaṃ vutto. Aggamaggavimokkho pana ekaccāsavavimuttivacanato idha nādhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekaccehi āsavehi vimutto^eb^ti diṭṭhāsavādīhi samucchedavimuttiyā vimutto. ^b^Asamaya…pe… lābhenā^eb^ti yathāvuttaasamayavimokkhassa upanissayabhūtassa adhigamena. Tato eva ^b^sātisayena,^eb^ ekaccehi kāmāsavehi vimutto vikkhambhanavasenāti attho. ^b^So eva^eb^ ekaccasamayavimokkhalābhī yathāvutto ^b^samayavimutto^eb^ asamayavimokkhavisesassa vasena samayavimokkhapaññattiyā adhippetattā. ^b^So^eb^ti asamayavimokkhūpanissayasamayavimokkhalābhī. ^b^Tena^eb^ sātisayena samayavimokkhena. ^b^Tathāvimuttova hotī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā tathāvimutto hoti, tasmā samayavimuttapaññattiṃ laddhuṃ arahatīti pariññātatthaṃ hetunā patiṭṭhāpeti. Byatirekamukhenapi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘puthujjano panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^samudācārabhāvato^eb^ti samudācārassa sambhavato. ^b^So^eb^ti jhānalābhī puthujjano.

Yadi punarāvattakadhammatāya puthujjano samayavimuttoti na vutto, tadabhāvato kasmā arahā tathā na vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘arahato panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tadakāraṇabhāva^eb^nti tesaṃ vimokkhānaṃ, tassa vā samayavimuttibhāvassa akāraṇabhāvaṃ. ^b^Sabbo^eb^ti sukkhavipassakopi samathayānikopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhīpi ^a^V0.0044^ea^. Bahiabbhantarabhāvā apekkhāsiddhā, vattu adhippāyavasena gahetabbarūpā cāti āha ^b^‘‘bāhirānanti lokuttarato bahibhūtāna’’^eb^nti.

3.^b^Rūpato^eb^^a^M0.0045^ea^^b^aññaṃ na rūpa^eb^nti tattha rūpapaṭibhāgaṃ kasiṇarūpādi rūpa-saddena gahitanti tadaññaṃ paṭhamatatiyāruppavisayamattaṃ arūpakkhandhanibbānavinimuttaṃ arūpa-saddena gahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭipakkhabhūtehi kilesacorehi amūsitabbaṃ jhānameva ^b^cittamañjūsaṃ. Samādhi^eb^nti vā samādhisīsena jhānameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

4.^b^Attano anurūpena pamādenā^eb^ti ettha anāgāmino adhikusalesu dhammesu asakkaccaasātaccakiriyādinā. Khīṇāsavassa pana tādisena pamādapatirūpakena, tādisāya vā asakkaccakiriyāya. Sā cassa ussukkābhāvato veditabbā. Paṭippassaddhasabbussukkā hi te uttamapurisā. ^b^Samayena samaya^eb^nti samaye samaye. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ upayogavacanañca. ^b^Anipphattito^eb^ti samāpajjituṃ asakkuṇeyyato. ^b^Assā^eb^ti ‘‘tesañhī’’tiādinā vuttassa imassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti yathābhatena suttena.

5. Yenādhippāyena ^b^‘‘dhammehī’’ti vattabba^eb^nti vuttaṃ, taṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘idhā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti ‘‘parihānadhammo aparihānadhammo’’ti etasmiṃ padadvaye. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ‘‘kuppadhammo akuppadhammo’’ti padadvaye. Sati vacananānatte attheva vacanatthanānattanti āha ^b^‘‘vacanatthanānattamattena vā’’^eb^ti. Vacanatthaggahaṇamukhena gahetabbassa pana vibhāvanatthassa natthettha nānattaṃ, yato tesaṃ pariyāyantaratāsiddhi.

7-8.^b^Samāpatticetanā^eb^ti yāya cetanāya samāpattiṃ nibbatteti samāpajjati ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tadāyūhanā’’^eb^ti. Ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā satīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘anurakkhaṇā…pe… satī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ‘‘ekārakkho satārakkhena cetasā viharatī’’ti. Tathā hi sā ‘‘kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesatī’’ti vuttā.
11. Aggamaggaṭṭhopi itaramaggaṭṭhā viya anupacchinnabhayattā bhayūparatavohāraṃ labhatīti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggaṭṭho ca…pe… bhayūparato’’^eb^ti.
12.^b^Kecī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0045^ea^ tihetukapaṭisandhike mandabuddhike sandhāyāha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘duppaññāti iminā gayhantī’’^eb^ti. Dubbalā paññā yesaṃ te duppaññāti.
14. Aniyatadhammasamannāgatasseva ^a^M0.0046^ea^ paccayavisesena niyatadhammapaṭilābhoti āha ^b^‘‘yattha…pe… hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tadabhāvā^eb^ti niyatāniyatavomissāya pavattiyā abhāvā.

16.^b^Pariyādiyitabbānī^eb^ti pariyādakena maggena khepetabbāni. Taṇhādīnaṃ palibudhanādikiriyāya matthakappattiyā sīsabhāvo veditabbo, nibbānassa pana visaṅkhārabhāvato saṅkhārasīsatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodho’’^eb^ti. Keci pana ‘‘saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodhasamāpattī’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paññattimattassa sīsabhāvānupapattito taduddhañca saṅkhārappavattisabbhāvato. ^b^Saha viyā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ viya. Etena sama-saddassa atthamāha. Sahattho hesa sama-saddo. ^b^Saṃsiddhidassanenā^eb^ti saṃsiddhiyā niṭṭhānassa uparamassa dassanena.

^b^Idhā^eb^ti imissā puggalapaññattipāḷiyā, imissā vā tadaṭṭhakathāya. ^b^Kilesapavattasīsāna^eb^nti kilesasīsapavattasīsānaṃ. Tesu hi gahitesu itarampi pariyādiyitabbaṃ kilesabhāvena pariyādiyitabbatāsāmaññena ca gahitameva hotīti kilesavaṭṭapariyādānena maggassa itaravaṭṭānampi pariyādiyanaṃ. Vaṭṭupacchedakena maggeneva hi jīvitindriyampi anavasesato nirujjhatīti. Kasmā panettha pavattasīsaṃ visuṃ gahitanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘pavattasīsampī’’^eb^tiādi. Odhiso ca anodhiso ca kilesapariyādāne sati sijjhamānā paccavekkhaṇavārā tena nipphādetabbāti vuttā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kilesapariyādānasseva vārā’’^eb^ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ āgamena sādhento ^b^‘‘vimuttasmi’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Cuticittena hotī^eb^ti idaṃ yathāvuttassa kilesapariyādānasamāpanabhūtassa paccavekkhaṇavārassa cuticittena paricchinnattā vuttaṃ, tasmā cuticittena paricchedakena paricchinnaṃ hotīti attho.
17.^b^Tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti na upagaccheyya. Ṭhānañhi gatinivatti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nappavatteyyā’’^eb^ti.
18. Payirupāsanāya bahūpakārattā ^b^payirupāsitabbattā^eb^.

20. Aggavijjā ^a^V0.0046^ea^ yassa anadhigatavijjādvayassa hoti, so ce pacchā vijjādvayaṃ adhigacchati, tassa paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa viya atevijjatābhāvā ^a^M0.0047^ea^ yadipi nippariyāyatā tevijjatā, paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa pana sā savisesāti dassento ^b^‘‘yāya katakiccatā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^aggavijjā^eb^ti āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇameva vā veditabbaṃ. Sā ca tevijjatāti yojanā.
22.^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti saccābhisambodhe eva.

24.^b^Ta^eb^nti nirodhasamāpattilābhino ubhatobhāgavimuttatāvacanaṃ. ^b^Vuttalakkhaṇūpapattiko^eb^ti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇena upapattito yuttito samannāgato. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathā catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato nirodhato ca vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattānaṃ vasena pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā, tathā sekkhabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ vasena pañca kāyasakkhino hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.

^b^Dassanakāraṇā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘disvā’’ti ettha tvā-saddo hetuatthoti dasseti yathā ‘‘sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī’’tiādīsu. Dassane sati parikkhayo, nāsatīti āha ^b^‘‘dassanāyattaparikkhayattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Purimakiriyā^eb^ti āsavānaṃ khayakiriyāya purimakiriyā. Samānakālattepi hi kāraṇakiriyā phalakiriyāya purimasiddhā viya voharīyati. ^b^Tato^eb^ nāmakāyato muccanato. Yato hi yena muccitabbaṃ, taṃ nissito hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nāmanissitako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti kāyadvayavimuttiyā ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvassa. Arūpaloke hi ṭhitārahantavasenāyamattho vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sutte hī’’^eb^tiādi.

^b^Dvīhi bhāgehī^eb^ti vikkhambhanasamucchedabhāgehi. ^b^Dve vāre^eb^ti kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchindanavasena dvikkhattuṃ. ^b^Kilesehi vimutto^eb^ti idaṃ paṭhamatatiyavādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ dutiyavādassa. Arūpajjhānaṃ yadipi rūpasaññādīhi vimuttaṃ taṃsamatikkamādinā pattabbattā, pavattinivārakehi pana kāmacchandādīhiyevassa vimutti sātisayāti dassento ^b^‘‘nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyato vimutta’’^eb^nti āha. Yañcāpi arūpajjhānaṃ rūpaloke vivekaṭṭhatāvasenapi rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ, taṃ pana rūpapaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhaneneva hotīti vikkhambhanameva ^a^V0.0047^ea^ padhānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena^eb^^a^M0.0048^ea^^b^rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ nāma hoti^eb^ samucchedavimuttiyā abhāvā.
25. ‘‘Sattisayo’’ti viya samudāye pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissatīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena…pe… vuccatī’’^eb^ti.

26.^b^Phuṭṭhāna^eb^nti phassitānaṃ, adhigatānanti attho. ^b^Anto^eb^ti antasadiso phassanāya parakālo. Tadanantaro hi tappariyosāno viya hotīti. Kālavisayo cāyaṃ anta-saddo, na pana kālattho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhippāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāmakāyekadesato^eb^ti nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyekadesato. ^b^Ālocito pakāsito viya hoti^eb^ vibandhavikkhambhanena ālocane pakāsane samatthassa ñāṇacakkhuno adhiṭṭhānasamuppādanato. ^b^Na tu vimutto^eb^ti vimuttoti na vuccateva.

28.^b^Imaṃ pana naya^eb^nti ‘‘apica tesa’’ntiādinā āgatavidhiṃ. ^b^Yena visesenā^eb^ti yena kāraṇavisesena. ^b^So^eb^ti diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttānaṃ yathāvutto paññāya viseso. ^b^Paṭikkhepo kato^eb^ kāraṇassa avibhāvitattā. Ubhatobhāgavimutto viya, paññāvimutto viya vā sabbathā avimuttassa sāvasesavimuttiyampi diṭṭhippattassa viya paññāya sātisayāya abhāvato ^b^saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvo^eb^ daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Saddhāya adhimutto^eb^ti idaṃ āgamanavasena saddhāya adhikabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, maggādhigamato panassa paccakkhameva ñāṇadassanaṃ.

31. ‘‘Sototi ariyamaggassa nāma’’nti nippariyāyena taṃsamaṅgī sotāpannoti adhippāyena codako ‘‘api-saddo kasmā vutto’’ti codanaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā ^b^‘‘nanū’’^eb^tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Itaro ^b^‘‘nāpanna’’^eb^ntiādinā pariharati. ^b^Samannāgato eva nāma^eb^ lokuttaradhammānaṃ akuppasabhāvattā. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti dutiyamaggaṭṭhādīhi. ^b^So evā^eb^ti paṭhamaphalaṭṭho eva. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sattakkhattuparamaniddese. Sotaṃ vā ariyamaggaṃ ādito panno adhigatoti sotāpannoti vuccamāne dutiyamaggaṭṭhādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0049^ea^ nattheva sotāpannabhāvāpatti. Sutte pana ^b^sotaṃ^eb^ ariyamaggaṃ ^b^ādito^eb^ mariyādaṃ amuñcitvāva ^b^panno^eb^ paṭipajjatīti katvā maggasamaṅgī ‘‘sotāpanno’’ti vutto. Pariyāyena itaropi tassa aparihānadhammattā sotāpannoti veditabbaṃ. Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāya samudayasaccaṃ viya dukkhasaccampi paccavekkhitaṃ hoti saccadvayapariyāpannattā ^a^V0.0048^ea^ kilesānanti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccapaccavekkhaṇādīna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena phalapaccavekkhaṇauparimaggaphaladhamme ca saṅgaṇhāti.
32.^b^Mahākulamevā^eb^ti uḷārakulameva vuccati ‘‘kulīno kulaputto’’tiādīsu viya.

33. Sajjhānako aparihīnajjhāno kālakato brahmalokūpago hutvā vaṭṭajjhāsayo ce, uparūpari nibbattitvā nibbāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘anāgāmisabhāgo’’^eb^ti. Yato so jhānānāgāmīti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāvattidhammo’’^eb^ti.
36. Parayoge tvā-saddo tadanto hutvā ^b^‘‘parasaddayoge’’^eb^ti vutto, appatvāti vuttaṃ hotīti ^b^‘‘appattaṃ hutvā’’^eb^ti iminā vuccati.
37.^b^Tenā^eb^ti ‘‘upahaccā’’ti padena. Nanu ca vemajjhātikkamo ^b^‘‘atikkamitvā vemajjha’’^eb^nti iminā pakāsito hotīti adhippāyo.

40.^b^Taṇhāvaṭṭasotā^eb^ taṇhāvaṭṭabandhā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti sotassa. Sambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Uddhaṃsotassa uparibhavūpagatā ekaṃsikāti āha ^b^‘‘yattha vā tattha vā gantvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti uddhaṃsotassa. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti avihesu. ^b^Lahusālahusagatikā^eb^ti lahukālahukāyugatikā, lahukālahukañāṇagatikā vā. ^b^Uppajjitvāva nibbāyanakādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā nibbāyatī’’tiādinā vuttā tisso upamā saṅgaṇhāti. Antarāupahaccaparinibbāyīhi adhimattatā, uddhaṃsotato anadhimattatā ca asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ na veditabbāti yojanā. ^b^Te evā^eb^ti antarāupahaccaparinibbāyiuddhaṃsotā eva. Yadi evaṃ asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ upamāvacanena tato mahantatarehi kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tato mahanta…pe… dassanattha’’^eb^nti.

^b^Tenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0050^ea^ ‘‘no cassa, no ca me siyā’’ti vacanena. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti vā yathāvuttena tassa atthavacanena. ^b^Imassa dukkhassā^eb^ti imassa sampati vattamānassa viññāṇādidukkhassa. ^b^Udayadassanaṃ^eb^ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^Catūhipī^eb^ti ‘‘no cassā’’ti catūhi padehi. ^b^Yaṃ atthī^eb^ti yaṃ paramatthato vijjati ^a^V0.0049^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhūtanti sasabhāva’’^eb^nti, bhūtanti khandhapañcakanti attho. Yathāha ‘‘bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, samanupassathā’’ti. ^b^Vivaṭṭamānaso^eb^ viviccamānahadayo taṇhādisotato nivattajjhāsayo. ^b^Upekkhako hotī^eb^ti cattabhariyo viya puriso bhayaṃ nandiñca pahāya udāsino hoti.

^b^Avisiṭṭhe^eb^ti hīne. ^b^Visiṭṭhe^eb^ti uttame. ‘‘Bhave’’ti vatvā ‘‘sambhave’’ti vuccamānaṃ avuttavācakaṃ hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘paccuppanno’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Bhūtameva vuccatī^eb^ti yaṃ bhūtanti vuccati, tadeva bhavoti ca vuccati, bhavati ahosīti vā. Sambhavati etasmāti ^b^sambhavo. Tadāhāro^eb^ tassa bhavassa paccayo. ^b^Anukkamena maggapaññāyā^eb^ti vipassanānukkamena laddhāya ariyamaggapaññāya. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sekkhena.
Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
63.^b^Kassacī^eb^ti kassacipi. ^b^Kathañcī^eb^ti kenaci pakārena, vikkhambhanamattenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Ajjhattaggahaṇassā^eb^ti attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa.

83.^b^Purimaggahita^eb^nti ‘‘karissati me’’tiādinā cittena paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^Taṃ kata^eb^nti taṃ tādisaṃ upakāraṃ. Puññaphalaṃ upajīvanto kataññupakkhe tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto’’^eb^ti.
90. Guṇapāripūriyā paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha tittoti āha ^b^‘‘niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko’’^eb^ti.
Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

91.^b^Sesasaṃvarabhedenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0051^ea^^a^V0.0050^ea^ kāyikavācasikavītikkamato sesena saṃvaravināsena. So pana dvāravasena vuccamāno manodvāriko hotīti āha ^b^‘‘manosaṃvarabhedenā’’^eb^ti. Idāni taṃ pakārabhedena dassento ^b^‘‘satisaṃvarādibhedena vā’’^eb^ti āha, muṭṭhasaccādippavattiyāti attho. Yaṃ kiñci sabhāvabhūtaṃ caritampi ‘‘sīla’’nti vuccatīti akusalassapi sīlapariyāyo vutto.
94.^b^Samānavisayāna^eb^nti paṭhamaphalādiko samāno evarūpo visayo etesanti samānavisayā, tesaṃ.
107.^b^Tadattho^eb^ tappayojano lokuttarasādhakoti attho. ^b^Tassa^eb^ paramatthasāsanassa. ^b^Mūlekadesattā^eb^ti mūlabhāvena ekadesattā.
118.^b^Unnaḷo^eb^ uggatatucchamāno.
123. Sīlassa anuggaṇhanaṃ aparisuddhiyaṃ sodhanaṃ apāripūriyaṃ pūraṇañcāti āha ^b^‘‘sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhisīlaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti adhisīlaṃ nissayaṃ katvā uppannapaññāya.
124.^b^Gūthasadisattameva dasseti,^eb^ na gūthakūpasadisattanti adhippāyo. Gūthavaseneva hi kūpassapi jigucchanīyatāti. Ayañca attho gūtharāsiyeva gūthakūpoti imasmiṃ pakkhe navattabbo siyā.

130. Sarabhaṅgasatthārādayo rūpabhavādikāmādipariññaṃ katvā paññapento lokiyaṃ pariññaṃ sammadeva paññapentīti āha ^b^‘‘yebhuyyena na sakkontī’’^eb^ti. Asamatthabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya no ca paññāpetuṃ sakkontīti vuttanti yojanā.
Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

133.^b^Parenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0052^ea^^a^V0.0051^ea^ aññena, āṇattenāti attho. ^b^Āṇattiyā attanā cā^eb^ti āṇāpakassa āṇattiyā, attanā ca āṇattena kataṃ tañca tassa āṇāpakassa yaṃ vacīpayogena katanti yojanā. ^b^Āṇattiyā pāpassā^eb^ti āṇāpanavasena pasutapāpassa.
148.^b^Desanāya^eb^ karaṇabhūtāya. ^b^Dhammāna^eb^nti desanāya yathābodhetabbānaṃ sīlādidhammānaṃ.

152.^b^Anantara^eb^nti ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitanti anantaraṃ vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^‘‘vacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Lujjatī^eb^ti idaṃ yena kāraṇena loka-saddo tadatthe pavatto, taṃ dassetīti āha ^b^‘‘kāraṇayutta’’^eb^nti.

156.^b^Sahitāsahitassā^eb^ti kusalasaddayogena sāmivacanaṃ bhummattheti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sahitāsahiteti attho’’^eb^ti. Sahitabhāsanena desakasampatti, sahitāsahitakosallena sāvakasampatti veditabbā. Parisasampattipi ñāṇasampannassa dhammakathikassa paṭibhānasampadāya kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sāvakasampattiyā bodhetuṃ samatthatāyā’’^eb^ti.
157.^b^Kusaladhammehī^eb^ti samathavipassanādhammehi. ^b^Catuttho vutto,^eb^ yo neva saṅghaṃ nimanteti, na dānaṃ deti.

166.^b^Yamidaṃ ‘‘kālenā’’ti vutta^eb^nti ‘‘yo tattha avaṇṇo, tampi bhaṇati kālena. Yopi tattha vaṇṇo, tampi bhaṇati kālenā’’ti yaṃ idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, ^b^tatra tasmiṃ vacane^eb^ vākye ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo ‘‘kālena bhaṇatī’’ti vutto, ^b^so kīdiso^eb^ti vicāraṇāya tassa dassanatthaṃ ‘‘kālaññū hotī’’tiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento saṅgahe āhāti yojanā.
168.^b^Pubbuppannapaccayavipattī^eb^ti tasmiṃ attabhāve paṭhamuppannapaccayavipatti. Tesaṃ vipatti pavattappaccayavipattīti yojanā.
173.^b^Tesa^eb^nti ^a^M0.0053^ea^^a^V0.0052^ea^ pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ. ^b^Vimuttidassanameva hoti^eb^ vimuttiatthattā taṃdassanassa.
174.^b^Tantāvutānaṃ vatthāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.

178.^b^Nāmakāyo^eb^ti nāmasamūho. ^b^Idameva ca dvaya^eb^nti sīlasaṃvarapūraṇaṃ, sājīvāvītikkamanañcāti idameva dvayaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ti sājīvāvītikkamanato. Kathāya haliddarāgādisadisatāti yojanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na puggalassā’’^eb^ti.
179.^b^Iti-saddenā^eb^ti ‘‘dārumāsako’’ti ettha vuttaiti-saddena. ^b^Evaṃpakāre^eb^ti imināpi salākādike saṅgaṇhāti.
181.^b^Avisaṭasukha^eb^nti avikkhepasukhaṃ.
187.^b^Khandhadhammesū^eb^ti saṅkhatadhammesu. ^b^Tadalābhenā^eb^ti maggaphalālābhena. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti sīlādiatthena.
Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

191.^b^Yathā tesu paṭipajjitabba^eb^nti tesu pañcasu puggalesu yathārahaṃ upameyyopamādassanamukhena hitūpadesapaṭipattiyā yathā aññehi paṭipajjitabbanti attho. Kiriyāvācī ārambha-saddo adhippeto, na ‘‘ārambhakattussa kasāvapucchā’’tiādīsu viya dhammavācīti āha ^b^‘‘ārambhakiriyāvācako saddo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Nirujjhantī’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘maggakiccavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
192.^b^Gahaṇaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0053^ea^ ‘‘evameta’’nti sampaṭicchanaṃ.
199.^b^Na evaṃ sambandho^eb^ asamānajātikattā.
Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

202.^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0054^ea^ saccābhisambodhādikaṃ ^b^saṅgahitaṃ hoti^eb^ phalassa hetunā avinābhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāma’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Anācariyakena attanā uppāditenā^eb^ti idaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe vijjamānaguṇakathanaṃ, na tabbidhuradhammantaranivattanaṃ tathārūpassa aññassa abhāvato. Tenassa sācariyakatā, parato ca uppatti paṭikkhittāti imamatthamāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādinā. Tattha ^b^sācariyakattaṃ^eb^ parūpadesahetukatā, ^b^parato uppatti^eb^ upadesena vināpi sannissāya nibbattīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

203.^b^Kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ, na visayeti dassento ^b^‘‘kusalesu dhammesu antogadhā’’^eb^ti āha. Idāni visayalakkhaṇaṃ etaṃ bhummanti dassento ^b^‘‘bodhipakkhiyadhammesu vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^‘‘Tadupakāratāyā’’^eb^ti idaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sādhetabbesūti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Ummujjanapaññāyā^eb^ti ummujjāpanapaññāya, ummujjanākārena vā pavattapaññāya. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti ummujjanamattattā eva. Yathā hi ñāṇuppādo saṃkilesapakkhato ummujjanaṃ, evaṃ saddhuppādopīti āha ^b^‘‘saddhāsaṅkhātameva ummujjana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Cittavāro^eb^ti cittappabandhavāro. Paccekaṃ ṭhānavipassanāpataraṇapatigādhappattiniṭṭhattā ^a^V0.0054^ea^ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ^b^‘‘aneke puggalā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Tenattabhāvena arahattassa aggahaṇato. ^b^Tatiyapuggalādibhāva^eb^nti ummujjitvā ṭhitapuggalādibhāvaṃ.
Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

209.^b^Sotāpannādayo^eb^ti ^a^M0.0055^ea^ vuttavisesayuttā sotāpannasakadāgāmijhānānāgāmino. ^b^Asā…pe… panā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthadīpano. Tena ‘‘ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā’’ti idaṃ visesaṃ dīpetīti veditabbaṃ.
Dasakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Puggalapaññattipakaraṇa-anuṭīkā samattā.

Samudāye ^a^M0.0057^ea^^a^V0.0055^ea^ ekadesā antogadhāti samudāyo tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena vutto yathā ‘‘rukkhe sākhā’’ti dasseti ^b^‘‘kathāsamudāyassā’’^eb^tiādinā. Tattha ^b^kathāna^eb^nti tisso kathā vādo jappo vitaṇḍāti. Tesu yena pamāṇatakkehi pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanapaṭikkhepā honti, so ^b^vādo^eb^. Ekādhikaraṇā hi aññamaññaviruddhā dhammā pakkhapaṭipakkhā yathā ‘‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.65). Nānādhikaraṇā pana aññamaññaviruddhāpi pakkhapaṭipakkhā nāma na honti yathā ‘‘aniccaṃ rūpaṃ, niccaṃ nibbāna’’nti. Yena chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānehi pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ paṭikkhepārambho, so ^b^jappo^eb^. Ārambhamattamevettha, na atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ ārambhaggahaṇaṃ. Yāya pana chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānehi paṭipakkhapaṭikkhepāya vāyamanti, sā ^b^vitaṇḍā^eb^. Tattha atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto ^b^chalaṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘navakambaloyaṃ puriso, rājā no sakkhī’’ti evamādi ^a^V0.0056^ea^. Dūsanabhāsā ^b^jātayo,^eb^ uttarapatirūpakāti attho. ^b^Niggahaṭṭhānāni^eb^ parato āvi bhavissanti. Evaṃ vādajappavitaṇḍappabhedāsu tīsu kathāsu idha vādakathā ‘‘kathā’’ti adhippetā. Sā ca kho aviparītadhammatāya patiṭṭhāpanavasena, na viggāhikakathābhāvenāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Mātikāṭhapanenevā^eb^ti uddesadesanāya eva. ^b^Ṭhapitassā^eb^ti desitassa. Desanā hi desetabbamatthaṃ vineyyasantānesu ṭhapanato nikkhipanato ṭhapanaṃ, nikkhepoti ca vuccati.
Ganthārambhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

^b^Parinibbānameva^eb^^a^M0.0058^ea^…pe… ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^. Abhinnasabhāvampi hi atthaṃ tadaññadhammato visesāvabodhanatthaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā voharanti yathā ‘‘attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhammā’’ti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1). ^b^Sā^eb^ti asaṅkhatā dhātu. ^b^Karaṇabhāvena vuttā^eb^ yathāvuttassa upasamassa sādhakatamabhāvaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Dhammavādī…pe… dubbalatā vuttā^eb^ tathārūpāya paññāya bhāve tādisānaṃ pakkhabhāvābhāvato. ^b^Laddhiyā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi puggalo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, parihāyati arahā arahattā’’tiādiladdhiyā. ^b^Suttantehī^eb^ti devatāsaṃyuttādīhi. ^b^Liṅgākappa^eb^bhedaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati.

^b^Bhinditvā mūlasaṅgaha^eb^nti mūlasaṅgītiṃ vināsetvā, bhedaṃ vā katvā yathā sā ṭhitā, tato aññathā katvā. ^b^Saṅgahitato vā aññatrā^eb^ti mūlasaṅgītiyā saṅgahitato aññatra. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asaṅgahitaṃ sutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nītatthaṃ^eb^ yathārutavasena viññeyyatthattā. ^b^Neyyatthaṃ^eb^ vipariṇāmadukkhatādivasena niddhāretabbatthattā. ^b^Tīhi ṭhānehī^eb^ti ‘‘sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti (a. ni. 9.21) evaṃ vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇita^eb^nti ekaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ. ^b^Aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsū^eb^ti sabbassapi brahmacariyavāsassa vasena ‘‘natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso’’tiādikaṃ (kathā. 269) aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Suttañca aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ tato aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ katvā ^a^V0.0057^ea^ ṭhapayiṃsu, tassa atthañca aññaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. ^b^Suññatādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena aniccatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

^b^Gambhīraṃ ekadesaṃ^eb^ mahāpadesaparivārādiṃ. ^b^Ekacce sakalaṃ abhidhammaṃ vissajjiṃsu^eb^ chaḍḍayiṃsu seyyathāpi suttantikā. Te hi taṃ na jinavacananti vadanti. ^b^Kathāvatthussa savivādatte^eb^tiādi heṭṭhā nidānaṭṭhakathāya āgatanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Keci pana puggalapaññattiyāpi savivādattaṃ maññanti. ^b^‘‘Tatiyasaṅgītito pubbe pavattamānānaṃ vasenā’’^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tatiyasaṅgītito pubbepi taṃ mātikārūpena pavattateva? Niddesaṃ vā sandhāya tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Aññānī^eb^ti aññākārāni abhidhammapakaraṇādīni akariṃsu, pavattantānipi tāni aññathā katvā paṭhiṃsūti attho ^a^M0.0059^ea^. ^b^Mañjusirī^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ nāmaṃ piṭakattayaṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi gayhati? Itarehi gayhamānampi vā sāsanikapariññehi na sāsanāvacaraṃ gayhatīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Nikāyanāma^eb^nti mahāsaṅghikādinikāyanāmaṃ, duttaguttādivagganāmañca.
^b^Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedo suttavādī^eb^ti saṅkantikānaṃ anantare eko nikāyabhedo suttavādī nāma bhijjittha. ^b^Sahā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ katvā, gaṇiyamānāti attho.

^b^Uppanne vāde sandhāyā^eb^ti tatiyasaṅgītikāle uppanne vāde sandhāya. ^b^Uppajjanake^eb^ti tato paṭṭhāya yāva saddhammantaradhānā etthantare uppajjanake. ^b^Suttasahassāharaṇa^eb^ñcettha paravādabhañjanatthañca sakavādapatiṭṭhāpanatthañca. Suttekadesopi hi ‘‘sutta’’nti vuccati samudāyavohārassa avayavesupi dissanato yathā ‘‘paṭo daḍḍho, samuddo diṭṭho’’ti ca. Te panettha suttapadesā ‘‘atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno’’tiādinā āgatā veditabbā.
Nidānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

1. Sambarādīhi ^a^M0.0060^ea^^a^V0.0058^ea^ pakappitavijjā, tathābhisaṅkhatāni osadhāni ca ‘‘māyā’’ti vuccanti, idha pana māyāya āhitavisesā abhūtaññeyyākārā adhippetāti dassento ^b^‘‘māyāya amaṇiādayo maṇiādiākārena dissamānā māyāti vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. Saccaññeva saccikaṃ, so eva attho aviparītassa ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti ^b^saccikaṭṭho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhūtaṭṭho’’^eb^ti. Aviparītabhāvato eva paramo padhāno atthoti ^b^paramattho,^eb^ ñāṇassa paccakkhabhūto dhammānaṃ aniddisitabbasabhāvo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uttamattho’’^eb^ti.

^b^Atthīti vacanasāmaññenā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 4.96; kathā. 22) ‘‘atthī’’ti pavattavacanasāmaññena. Atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto chalanti vadanti. ^b^Patiṭṭhaṃ pacchindanto^eb^ti hetuṃ dūsento, ahetuṃ karontoti attho. Hetu hi paṭiññāya patiṭṭhāpanato patiṭṭhā, taṃ pana hetuṃ atthamattato dassento ^b^‘‘yadi saccikaṭṭhenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Payogato pana dūsanena saddhiṃ parato āvi bhavissati. ^b^Okāsaṃ adadamāno^eb^ti yathānurūpaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ avasaraṃ adento. Atha vā ^b^patiṭṭhaṃ pacchindanto,^eb^ paṭiññaṃ eva parivattentoti attho. Upalabbhati puggaloti hi sakavādiṃ uddissa paravādino paṭiññāva ^a^V0.0059^ea^ na yuttā appasiddhattā visesitabbassa. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘anupalabbhaneyyato na tava vādo tiṭṭhatīti nivattento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpañca upalabbhati…pe… dassetī^eb^ti etena paravādinā adhippetahetuno viparītatthasādhakattaṃ dasseti.

^b^Upalabbhamānaṃ nāma hotī^eb^ti ākārato taṃākāravantānaṃ anaññattāti adhippāyo. ^b^Aññathā^eb^ti ākāra, ākāravantānaṃ bhede. ^b^Etissā^eb^ti ‘‘tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhenā’’ti evaṃ ^a^M0.0061^ea^ vuttāya dutiyapucchāya. ^b^Esa viseso^eb^ti yo yathāvutto dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ visayassa sabhāvākārabhedo, esa dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ viseso. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇena abhinnānampi salakkhaṇato bhedoyevāti aññadhammassa aññenākārena na kadācipi upalabbho bhaveyya. Yadi siyā, aññattameva na siyāti ruppanādisapaccayādiākārena anupalabbhamānopi puggalo attano bhūtasabhāvaṭṭhena upalabbhatevāti vadantaṃ paravādinaṃ pati ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho’’tiādi codanā anokāsāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘yathā pana…pe… niggaho ca na kātabbo’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^niggaho^eb^ti ‘‘ājānāhi niggaha’’nti evaṃ vuttaniggaho, parājayāropanena paravādino niggaṇhananti attho.

Svāyaṃ pana yasmā tassa vādāparādhahetuko, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dosāparādhapariyāyehi vibhāvito. Avajānanañhettha niggahaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā hi paṭiññāhāni, paṭiññāntaraṃ, paṭiññāvirodho, paṭiññāsaññāso, hetvantaraṃ, atthantaraṃ, niratthakaṃ, aviññātatthaṃ, asambandhatthaṃ, appattakālaṃ, ūnaṃ, adhikaṃ, punaruttaṃ, ananubhāsanaṃ, aviññātaṃ, appaṭibhā, vikkhepo, matānuññā, anuyuñjitabbassa upekkhanaṃ, ananuyuñjitabbassa anuyogo, apasiddhantaraṃ, hetvābhāsā cāti ^b^dvāvīsati^eb^ niggahaṭṭhānāni ñāyavādino vadanti.

Tattha visadisūdāharaṇadhammānujānanaṃ paṭhamudāharaṇe ^b^paṭiññāhāni^eb^. Paṭiññātatthapaṭisedhe tadaññatthaniddeso ^b^paṭiññāntaraṃ^eb^. Paṭiññāviruddhahetukittanaṃ ^b^paṭiññāvirodho^eb^. Paṭiññātatthāpanayanaṃ ^b^paṭiññāsaññāso^eb^. Avisesavutte hetumhi paṭisiddhe visesahetukathanaṃ ^b^hetvantaraṃ^eb^. Adhikatatthānupayogiatthakathanaṃ ^b^atthantaraṃ^eb^. Mātikāpāṭho viya atthahīnaṃ ^b^niratthakaṃ^eb^. Tikkhattuṃ vuttampi sakkhipaṭivādīhi aviditaṃ ^b^aviññātatthaṃ^eb^. Pubbāparavasena sambandharahitaṃ ^b^asambandhatthaṃ^eb^. Avayavavipallāsavacanaṃ ^b^appattakālaṃ^eb^. Avayavavikalaṃ ^b^ūnaṃ^eb^. Adhikahetūdāharaṇaṃ ^b^adhikaṃ^eb^. Ṭhapetvā ^a^V0.0060^ea^ anuvādaṃ saddatthānaṃ punappunaṃ vacanaṃ atthāpannavacanañca ^b^punaruttaṃ^eb^. Parisāya viditassa tīhi vuttassa apaccudāhāro ^b^ananubhāsanaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ vādinā ^a^M0.0062^ea^ vuttaṃ parisāya viññātaṃ paṭivādinā duviññātaṃ, taṃ ^b^aviññātaṃ^eb^. Taṃvādinā vattabbe vutte paravādino paṭivacanassa anupaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^appaṭibhā^eb^. Kiccantarappasaṅgena kathāvicchindanaṃ ^b^vikkhepo^eb^. Attano dosānujānanena parapakkhassa dosappasañjanaṃ paramatānujānanaṃ ^b^matānuññā^eb^. Niggahappattassa niggaṇhanaṃ ^b^anuyuñjitabbassa upekkhanaṃ^eb^. Sampattaniggahassa aniggahaṭṭhāne ca niggaṇhanaṃ ^b^anuyuñjitabbassa anuyogo^eb^. Ekaṃ siddhantamanujānitvā aniyamato tadaññasiddhantakathāppasañjanaṃ ^b^apasiddhantaraṃ^eb^. Asiddhā anekantikā viruddhā ca ^b^hetvābhāsā,^eb^ hetupatirūpakāti attho. Tesañca kathanaṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti.

Imesu ^b^dvāvīsatiyā^eb^ niggahaṭṭhānesu idaṃ paṭiññāya apanayanato sayameva paccakkhānato paṭiññāsaññāso nāma niggahaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘avajānaneneva niggahaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asiddhattā^eb^ti etena paccakkhato anumānato ca puggalassa anupalabbhamāha. Na hi so paccakkhato upalabbhati. Yadi upalabbheyya, vivādo eva na siyā, anumānampi tādisaṃ natthi, yena puggalaṃ anumineyyuṃ. Tathā hi taṃ sāsaniko puggalavādī vadeyya ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati, atthi puggalo’’ti bhagavatā vuttattā rūpavedanādi viya. Yañhi bhagavatā ‘‘atthī’’ti yadi vuttaṃ, taṃ paramatthato atthi yathā taṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. Yaṃ pana paramatthato natthi, na taṃ bhagavatā ‘‘atthī’’ti vuttaṃ yathā taṃ pakativādiādīnaṃ pakatiādīti, taṃ micchā. Ettha hi yadi vohārato puggalassa atthibhāvo adhippeto, siddhaṃ sādhanaṃ, atha paramatthato, asiddho hetu tathā avuttattā. Viruddho ca tassa aniccasaṅkhatapaṭiccasamuppannādibhāvāsādhanato rūpavedanādīsu tathā diṭṭhattātiādinā tassa ahetukabhāvasseva pākaṭabhāvato.

Yaṃ pana bāhirakā puthu aññatitthiyā vadanti. Attheva ca paramatthato attā ñāṇābhidhānassa pavattiyā nimittabhāvato rūpādi viya. Atha vā attātirittapadatthantaro rūpakkhandho khandhasabhāvattā yathā taṃ itarakkhandhā. Yañhettha padatthantaraṃ, so puggaloti adhippāyo.

Ettha ^a^M0.0063^ea^ ca purimassa hetuno paññattiyā anekantikatā asiddhatā ca. Na hi asato sakavādinaṃ ^a^V0.0061^ea^ pati paramatthato ñāṇābhidhānappavattiyā nimittabhāvo sijjhati. Vohārato ce, tadasiddhasādhanatā rūpādisabhāvavinimuttarūpopi puggalo na hotīti evamādiviruddhatthatā. Pacchimassa pana hetuno sādhetabbatthasāmaññapariggahe siddhasādhanatā, rūpakkhandhato padatthantarato paramatthantarabhūtavedanādisambhavassa icchitattā ca. Tabbisesapariggahe ca sakavādinaṃ pati udāharaṇābhāvo paraparikappitajīvapadatthavirahato. Itarakkhandhānaṃ vedanādivinimuttaubhayasiddhajīvapadatthasahitopi rūpakkhandho na hoti itarakkhandhā viyāti viruddhatthatā ca.

Yaṃ pana kāṇādā ‘‘sukhādīnaṃ nissayabhāvato’’ti anumānaṃ vadanti, te idaṃ vattabbā – kiṃ sukhādīnaṃ attani paṭibaddhaṃ yato sukhādinissayatāya attā anumīyati. Yadi uppādo, evaṃ sante sabbepi sukhādayo ekato eva bhaveyyuṃ kāraṇassa sannihitabhāvato aññanirapekkhato ca. Atha aññampi kiñci indriyādikāraṇantaramapekkhitabbaṃ, tadeva hotu kāraṇaṃ, kimaññena adiṭṭhasāmatthiyena parikappitena payojanaṃ. Atha pana tesaṃ attādhīnā vuttīti vadeyyuṃ, evampi na sijjhati udāharaṇābhāvato. Na hi rūpādivinimutto tādiso koci sabhāvadhammo sukhādisannissayabhūto atthi, yato attano attatthasiddhiyā udāharaṇaṃ apadiseyyuṃ. Iminā nayena asamāsapadābhidheyyattātiādīnampi ayuttattā nivāretabbā. Tathā ‘‘aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā’’ti iminā ca pakatiaṇuādīnampi bāhiraparikappitānaṃ asiddhatā vuttāvāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ pana tesaṃ asiddhīti? Pamāṇena anupalabbhanato. Na hi paccakkhato pakati siddhā kapilassapi isino tassa apaccakkhabhāvassa kāpilehi anuññāyamānattā.

Yaṃ pana ‘‘atthi padhānaṃ bhedānaṃ anvayadassanato sakalakalāpamattaṃ viyā’’ti te anumānaṃ vadanti. Iminā hi bhedānaṃ satvādīnaṃ vijjamānapadhānatā paṭiññātā. Ettha ca vuccate – sakalādīnaṃ padhānaṃ tabbibhāgehi kiṃ aññattaṃ, udāhu anaññanti, kiñcettha yadi aññattaṃ, sabbo loko padhānamayoti samayavirodho siyā, saṇṭhānabhedena aññattha paṭijānanato ^a^M0.0064^ea^ na dosoti ce? Taṃ na, valayakaṭakādisaṇṭhānabhedepi kanakābhedadassanato. Na hi saṇṭhānaṃ vatthubhedanimittaṃ tassa anupādānattā. Yaṃ yassa bhedanimittaṃ, na taṃ tassa anupādānaṃ yathā suvaṇṇamattikādighaṭādīnaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭo mattikāghaṭo koseyyapaṭo kappāsapaṭoti ca sādhetabbadhammarahitañca udāharaṇaṃ. Na hi padhānekakāraṇapubbakattaṃ sakalādīnaṃ pakativādino ^a^V0.0062^ea^ siddhaṃ, nāpi kāpilānaṃ kathañci aññattānujānanato. Anaññatte pana udāharaṇābhāvo. Na hi tadeva sādhetabbaṃ tadeva ca udāharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ, anvayadassanampi asiddhaṃ. Na hi tadeva tena anvitaṃ yujjati. Padhānena anvayadassanampi asiddhaṃ paravādinoti guṇassa padhānassa ananujānanato. Atha yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ padhānaṃ ‘‘padhīyati ettha phala’’nti, evampi asiddhameva kāraṇe phalassa atthibhāvānanujānanato, hetuno ca asiddhanissayatāparābhimatabhedānanujānanato. Atha visesena kāraṇāyattavuttitā phalassa sādhīyati, na kiñci viruddhaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayena paṭiccasamuppattiyā icchitattāti.

Apica pakativādino ‘‘satvarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ samabhāvo pakati, sā ca niccā satvādivisamasabhāvato aniccato mahatādivikārato anaññā’’ti paṭijānanti. Sā tesaṃ vuttappakārā pakati na sijjhati tato viruddhasabhāvato vikārato anaññattā. Na hi assassa visāṇaṃ dīghaṃ, tañca rassato govisāṇato anaññanti vuccamānaṃ sijjhati. Kiñca bhiyyo? Tiṇṇaṃ ekabhāvābhāvato. Satvādiguṇattayato hi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ icchantānaṃ tesaṃ satvādīnampi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ āpajjati, na ca yuttaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekabhāvoti. Evampi pakati na sijjhati. Kathaṃ? Anekadosāpattito. Yadi hi byattasabhāvato vikārato abyattasabhāvā pakati anaññā, evaṃ sante hetumantatā aniccatā abyāpitā sakiriyatā anekatā nissitatā liṅgatā sāvayavatā paratantratāti evamādayo aneke dosā pakatiyā āpajjanti, na jātivikārato anaññā paṭijānitabbā. Tathā ca sati samayavirodhoti kappanāmattaṃ pakatīti asiddhā sāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.

Pakatiyā ^a^M0.0065^ea^ ca asiddhāya taṃnimittakabhāvena vuccamānā mahatādayopi asiddhā eva. Yathā ca pakati mahatādayo ca, evaṃ issarapajāpatipurisakālasabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi. Etesu hi issaro tāva na sijjhati upakārassa adassanato. Sattānañhi jātiyaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ bījakhettabhāvena kammassa hīnatādivibhāgakaraṇena, tato parañca utuāhārānaṃ brūhanupatthambhanena, indriyānaṃ dassanādikiccasādhanena upakāro dissati, na, evamissarassa. Hīnatādivibhāgakaraṇamissarassāti ce? Taṃ na, asiddhattā. Yathāvutto upakāraviseso issaranimmito, na kammunāti sādhanīyametaṃ. Itaratrāpi samānametanti ce? Na, kammato phalaniyamasiddhattā ^a^V0.0063^ea^. Sati hi katūpacite kammasmiṃ tattha yaṃ akusalaṃ, tato hīnatā, yaṃ kusalaṃ, tato paṇītatāti siddhametaṃ. Issaravādināpi hi na sakkā kammaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ.

Apicetassa lokavicittassa issaranimmānabhāve bahū dosā sambhavanti. Kathaṃ? Yadi sabbamidaṃ lokavicittaṃ issaranimmitaṃ, saheva vacanena pavattitabbaṃ, na kamena. Na hi sannihitakāraṇānaṃ phalānaṃ kamena uppatti yuttā, kāraṇantarāpekkhāya issarassa sāmatthiyahāni. Cakkhādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kāraṇabhāvo na yutto. Karotīti hi kāraṇanti. Issaro eva ca kārakoti sabbakāraṇānaṃ kāraṇabhāvahāni. Yehi puthuvisesehi issaro pasīdeyya, tesañca sayaṃkāratā āpajjati, tathā sabbesaṃ hetukānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo. Yañjetaṃ nimmānaṃ, tañcassa attadatthaṃ vā siyā, paratthaṃ vā siyā. Attadatthatāyaṃ attano issarabhāvahāni akatakiccatāya isitāvasitābhāvato. Tena vā nimmitena yaṃ attano kātabbaṃ, taṃ kasmā sayameva na karoti. Paratthatāyaṃ pana paro nāmettha loko evāti kimatthiyaṃ tassa nirayādirogādivisādinimmānaṃ. Yā cassa issaratā, sā sayaṃkatā vā siyā paraṃkatā vā ahetukā vā. Tattha sayaṃkatā ce, tato pubbe anissarabhāvāpatti. Paraṃkatā ce, pacchāpi anissarabhāvāpatti sauttaratā ca siyā. Ahetukā ce, na kassaci anissaratāti evamissarassapi asiddhi veditabbā.

Yathā ca issaro, evaṃ pajāpati puriso ca. Nāmamattameva hettha viseso. Tehi vādīhi pakappitaṃ yadidaṃ ‘‘pajāpati puriso’’ti. Taṃnimittakaṃ ^a^M0.0066^ea^ pana lokappavattiṃ icchantānaṃ pajāpativāde purisavāde ca issaravāde viya dosā asiddhi ca vidhātabbā. Yathā cete issarādayo, evaṃ kālopi asiddho lakkhaṇābhāvato. Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upalabbhati. Yathā pathaviyā kathinatā, na evaṃ kālassa, tasmā natthi paramatthato kāloti. Kālavādī panāha ‘‘vattanālakkhaṇo kālo’’ti. So vattabbo ‘‘kā panāyaṃ vattanā’’ti. So āha ‘‘samayamuhuttādīnaṃ pavattī’’ti. Tampi na, rūpādīhi atthantarabhāvena aniddhāritattā. Paramatthato hi aniddhāritasabhāvassa vattanālakkhaṇatāyaṃ sasavisāṇādīnampi taṃlakkhaṇatā āpajjeyya.

Yaṃ pana vadanti kāṇādā ‘‘aparasmiṃ aparaṃ yugapadi ciraṃ khippamiti kālaliṅgānīti liṅgasabbhāvato ^a^V0.0064^ea^ atthi kālo’’ti, taṃ ayuttaṃ liṅgino anupalabbhamānattā. Siddhasambandhesu hi liṅgesu liṅgamattaggahaṇena liṅgini avabodho bhaveyya. Na ca kenaci aviparītacetasā tena liṅgena saha kadāci kālasaṅkhāto liṅgī gahitapubboti. Ato na yuttaṃ ‘‘liṅgasabbhāvato atthi kālo’’ti. ‘‘Aparasmiṃ apara’’ntiādikassa visesassa nimittabhāvato yuttanti ce? Na, paṭhamajātatādinimittakattā tassa. Na ca paṭhamajātatādi nāma koci dhammo atthi aññatra samaññāmattatoti nattheva paramatthato kālo. Kiñca bhiyyo, bahūnaṃ ekabhāvāpattito. Atītādivibhāgena hi lokasamaññāvasena bahū kālabhedā. Tvañcetaṃ ekaṃ vadasīti bahūnaṃ ekabhāvābhāvato nattheva paramatthato kālo. Tathā ekassa anekabhāvāpattito. Yo hi ayaṃ ajja vattamānakālo, so hiyyo anāgato ahosi, sve atīto bhavissati. Hiyyo ca vattamāno ajja atīto ahosi, tathā sve vattamānopi aparajja. Na cekasabhāvassa anekasabhāvatā yuttāti asiddho paramatthato kālo. Dhammappavattiṃ pana upādāya kappanāmattasiddhāya lokasamaññāya atītādivibhāgato voharīyatīti vohāramattakoti daṭṭhabbo.

Sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi asiddhā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Lakkhaṇābhāvā. Na hi sabhāvato niyatiyadicchā sambhavati. Aññathā evaṃvidho koci ^a^M0.0067^ea^ bhāvo atthi ce, tesaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, patiṭṭhāpakahetunā ca na catthi. Kevalaṃ panete vādā vimaddiyamānā ahetuvāde eva tiṭṭhanti, na cāhetukaṃ lokavicittaṃ visesābhāvappasaṅgato. Ahetukabhāve hi pavattiyā yvāyaṃ narasuranirayatiracchānādīsu indriyādīnaṃ viseso, tassa abhāvo āpajjati, na cāyaṃ paṇḍitehi icchito. Kiñca? Diṭṭhabhāvato. Diṭṭhā hi cakkhādito cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ bījādito aṅkurādīnaṃ pavatti, tasmāpi hetutovāyaṃ pavatti. Tathā pure pacchā ca abhāvato. Yato yato hi paccayasāmaggito yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ nibbattati, tato pubbe pacchā ca na tassa nibbatti sambhavati, kiñca bahunā. Yadi ahetuto pavatti siyā, ahetukā pavattīti imāpi vācā yathāsakapaccayasamavāyato pure pacchā ca bhaveyyuṃ, na ca bhavanti aladdhappaccayattā, majjhe eva ca bhavanti laddhappaccayattā. Evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammāti na sijjhati ahetuvādo. Tasmiñca asiddhe pavattiyā ahetubhāvo viya ahetupariyāyavisesabhūtā sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi asiddhā eva hontīti veditabbā.

Yaṃ pana kāṇādā ‘‘paramāṇavo niccā, tehi dviaṇukādiphalaṃ nibbattati, tañca aniccaṃ ^a^V0.0065^ea^, tassa vasenetaṃ lokavicitta’’nti vadanti, tampi micchāparikappamattaṃ. Na hi paramāṇavo nāma santi aññatra bhūtasaṅghātā. So pana aniccova, na ca niccato aniccassa nibbatti yuttā tassa kāraṇabhāvānupapattito tathā adassanato ca. Yadi ca so kassaci kāraṇabhāvaṃ gaccheyya, anicco eva siyā vikārāpattito. Na cāyaṃ sambhavo atthi, yaṃ vikāraṃ anāpajjantameva kāraṇaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteyyāti. Vikārañce āpajjati, kutassa niccatāvakāso, tasmā vuttappakārā paramāṇavo sattā aniccā, aññepi niccādibhāvena bāhirakehi parikappitā asiddhā evāti veditabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammappabhedato pana aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā’’^eb^ti.

Etthāha ‘‘yadi paramatthato puggalo na upalabbhati, evaṃ pana puggale anupalabbhamāne atha kasmā bhagavā ‘atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno’ti (a. ni. 4.95; kathā. 22), ‘cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi’nti ^a^M0.0068^ea^ (a. ni. 4.95; kathā. 22) ca tattha tattha puggalassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesī’’ti. Vineyyajjhāsayavasena. Tathā tathā vinetabbānañhi puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vineyyadamanakusalo satthā dhammaṃ desento lokasamaññānurūpaṃ tattha tattha puggalaggahaṇaṃ karoti, na paramatthato puggalassa atthibhāvato.

Apica ^b^aṭṭhahi^eb^ kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ, paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ, ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ, brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ, pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṃ, dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ, lokasammutiyā appahānatthañcāti. ‘‘Khandhā dhātū āyatanāni hirīyanti ottappantī’’ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu vā hoti ‘‘kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā’’ti. ‘‘Itthī hirīyati ottappati, puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo’’ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu hoti, tasmā bhagavā ^b^hirottappadīpanatthaṃ^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti. ‘‘Khandhā kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī’’ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā ^b^kammassakatādīpanatthampi^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti. ‘‘Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi, āyatanehī’’ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tathā ‘‘khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ, ruhiruppādakammaṃ, saṅghabhedakammaṃ karonti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī’’ti vuttepi, ‘‘khandhā mettāyanti ^a^V0.0066^ea^, dhātuyo, āyatanānī’’ti vuttepi, ‘‘khandhā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī’’ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā ^b^paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ pubbenivāsadīpanatthañca^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti. ‘‘Khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī’’ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu vā hoti ‘‘kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā’’ti. ‘‘Puggalo paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu hoti, tasmā bhagavā ^b^dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti. Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto nappajahanti lokasamaññāya lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti, tasmā bhagavā ^b^lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi^eb^ puggalakathaṃ kathetīti imehi ^b^aṭṭhahi^eb^^a^M0.0069^ea^ kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti, na paramatthato puggalassa atthibhāvatoti veditabbaṃ.

^b^Dhammappabhedākārenevā^eb^ti yathāvuttarūpādidhammappabhedato aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā rūpādidhammappabhedākāreneva puggalassa upaladdhiyā bhavitabbanti attho. Tena ‘‘kiṃ tava puggalo upalabbhamāno ruppanākārena upalabbhati, udāhu anubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharaṇavijānanesu aññatarākārenā’’ti dasseti tabbinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa loke abhāvato. Avisesavisesehi puggalūpalabbhassa paṭiññāpaṭikkhepapakkhā anujānanāvajānanapakkhā. Yadipime dvepi pakkhā anulomapaṭilomanayesu labbhanti, ādito pana paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetvā pavatto paṭhamanayo, itaro dutiyanti imaṃ nesaṃ visesaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘anujānanā…pe… veditabbo’’^eb^ti āha. Yathādhikatāya laddhiyā anulomanato cettha paṭhamo nayo ^b^anulomapakkho,^eb^ tabbilomanato itaro ^b^paṭilomapakkho^eb^ti vuttoti veditabbanti.

^b^Tena vata re^eb^ti ettha ^b^tenā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yena puggalūpalabbho patiṭṭhapīyati, tena hetunā. Svāyaṃ hetu sāsanikassa bāhirakassa ca vasena heṭṭhā dassito eva. Hetupatirūpake cāyaṃ hetusamaññā paramatthassa adhippetattā. Heṭṭhā ‘‘ājānāhi niggaha’’nti niggahassa saññāpanamattaṃ kataṃ, taṃ idāni ‘‘yaṃ tattha vadesī’’tiādinā nigamanarūpena micchābhāvadassanena ca vibhāviyamānaṃ pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato āropitaṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘āropitattā’’ti vuttaṃ.

Ettha ^a^V0.0067^ea^ ca ‘‘puggalo upalabbhatī’’ti ^b^paṭiññāvayavo^eb^ sarūpeneva dassito. ‘‘Tenā’’ti iminā sāmaññato ^b^hetāvayavo^eb^ dassito. Yvāyaṃ yasmā paṭiññādhammo hutvā sadisapakkhe vijjamāno, visadisapakkhe avijjamānoyeva hetu lakkhaṇūpapanno nāma hoti, na itaro, tasmā yattha so vijjati na vijjati ca, so sadisāsadisabhāvabhinno duvidho ^b^diṭṭhantāvayavo^eb^. Yathā rūpādi upalabbhati, tathā puggalo. Yathā ca sasavisāṇaṃ na upalabbhati, na tathā puggaloti ^b^upanayo^eb^. Svāyaṃ ‘‘vattabbe kho puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti imāya pāḷiyā dīpito, yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saddhiṃ hetudāharaṇehi ‘‘pāpanā’’ti vutto. ^b^Nigamanaṃ^eb^ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva āgataṃ, yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘ropanā’’ti ^a^M0.0070^ea^ vuttāti. Evaṃ porāṇena ñāyakkamena sādhanāvayavā niddhāretvā yojetabbā.

Idāni vattanena parapakkhupalakkhite hetudāharaṇe anvayabyatirekadassanavasena niddhāretvā sādhanapayogo yojetabbo. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ vattabba^eb^nti kimettha vattabbaṃ. Hetudāharaṇehiyeva hi saparapakkhānaṃ sādhanaṃ dūsanaṃ vā, na paṭiññāya, tassā sādhetabbādibhāvato. Taṃ pana dvayaṃ ‘‘tena vata re’’tiādipāḷiyā vibhāvitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāpanāropanāsīsena dassitaṃ. Paṭiññāṭhapanā pana tesaṃ visayadassanaṃ kathāyaṃ taṃmūlatāyāti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ pana vakkhatī’’^eb^tiādi. Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘idaṃ anuloma…pe… ekaṃ catukkaṃ veditabba’’nti vakkhati. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘yathā pana tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Niggahova visuṃ vutto,^eb^ na paṭikammanti adhippāyo. Visuṃ vuttoti ca pāpanāropanāhi asammissaṃ katvā visuṃ aṅgabhāvena vutto, na tadaññataro viya tadantogadhabhāvena vutto, nāpi ṭhapanā viya agaṇanupagabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Ye panā^eb^ti padakāre sandhāyāha. ^b^Dutiye…pe… āpajjati^eb^ tattha niggahassa ayathābhūtattā paṭikammassa ca yathābhūtabhāvatoti adhippāyo.

2. Paramatthato puggalaṃ nānujānāti, vohārato pana anujānātīti sakavādimataṃ jānantenapi paravādinā chalavasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti pucchāya katāya sakavādī tattha ayaṃ puggalavādī, imassa laddhi paṭikkhipitabbāti paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘āmantā’’ti. ‘‘Na upalabbhatī’’ti hi vuttaṃ hoti. Puna itaro sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho’’tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo lokavohārasiddho saccikaṭṭho, tato eva kenaci apaṭikkhipitabbato paramatthato tato so puggalo ^a^V0.0068^ea^ nupalabbhatīti. Puna sakavādī pubbe paramatthasaccavasena puggale paṭikkhitte idāni sammutisaccavasenāyaṃ pucchāti mantvā taṃ appaṭikkhipanto ‘‘na hevaṃ vattabbe’’ti āha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhamevāti sammutisaccaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo’’^eb^ti ^a^M0.0071^ea^. Evamavaṭṭhite ^b^‘‘yadi paravādinā…pe… nārabhitabbā’’^eb^ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ paṭhamapucchāya paramatthasaccassa saccikaṭṭhoti adhippetattā. ^b^‘‘Atha sakavādinā…pe… āpajjatī’’^eb^ti idampi na vattabbaṃ dutiyapucchāya sammutisaccassa saccikaṭṭhoti adhippetattā.

^b^Yadi ubhayaṃ adhippeta^eb^nti idaṃ yadi paṭhamapucchaṃ sandhāya, tadayuttaṃ tassā paramatthasaccasseva vasena pavattattā. Atha dutiyapucchaṃ sandhāya, tassā sammutisaccavasena paṭhamatthaṃ vatvā puna missakavasena vattuṃ ^b^‘‘sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni vā ekato katvāpi evamāhā’’^eb^ti vuttattā tampi na vattabbameva. ^b^Dvepi saccānī^eb^ti sammutiparamatthasaccāni. Tesu paramatthasaccasseva nippariyāyena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthabhāvo, itarassa upacārena. Tathā ca vuttaṃ ‘‘māyā marīci…pe… uttamaṭṭho’’ti. Tasmā sammutisaccavasena upaladdhiṃ icchantenapi paramatthasaccavasena anicchanato ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’tiādinā anuyogo yutto. ‘‘Padhānappadhānesu padhāne kiccasiddhī’’ti eteneva ^b^‘‘na ca saccikaṭṭhekadesena anuyogo’’^eb^tiādi nivattitañca hoti saccikaṭṭhekadesabhāvasseva asiddhattā. ^b^Nāssa paramatthasaccatā anuyuñjitabbā^eb^ti assa saccikaṭṭhassa paramatthasaccatā paravādinā na anuyuñjitabbā ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti sakavādinopi saccikaṭṭhaparamatthato tassa icchitabbattāti adhippāyo. ^b^Voharitasaccikaṭṭhassa attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭhatāpi^eb^ yuttā tassa tena adhippetattā. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā dassitoyeva. ^b^Vuttanayova doso^eb^ti ‘‘dvepi saccānī’’tiādinā anantarameva vuttaṃ sandhāyāha. Tassa pana adosabhāvo dassitoyeva. ^b^Atha na^eb^ iti atha na bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbheyyāti yojanā. ^b^Vattabbo^eb^ti yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ‘‘yo lokavohārasiddho’’tiādinā vuttameva, tasmā ettha ‘‘paramatthato puggalaṃ nānujānātī’’tiādinā adhippāyamagganaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

^b^Anuññeyyametaṃ siyā^eb^ti etaṃ anupalabbhanaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ viya dutiyapucchāyampi anujānitabbaṃ siyā. ^b^Na vā kiñci vattabba^eb^nti atha vā kiñci na vattabbaṃ ṭhapanīyattā pañhassa. Tathā hissa ṭhapanīyākāraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha ca kāmaṃ saccadvayākārena ^a^V0.0069^ea^ puggalo nupalabbhati, sammutiyākārena pana nupalabbhatīti upalabbhanabhāvassa vasena paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittañcā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0072^ea^ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ anuññātaṃ, dutiyapucchāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti etaṃ ekaṃyeva vatthuṃ uddissa anujānanapaṭikkhipanākāraṃ chalavacanaṃ nissāya. Tvaṃ niggahetabboti yojanā. ^b^Sambhavantassa sāmaññenā^eb^ti niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena sambhavantassa anulomanayena anujānanapaṭikkhepassa samānabhāvena. ^b^Asambhavantassa kappana^eb^nti paccanīkanayena tassa niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena asambhavantassa tathā kappanaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ chalavādo bhavituṃ arahati. ‘‘Atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto chala’’nti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti yathāvuttakappanaṃ chalavādoti vuttattā. Vacanasāmaññamattaṃ kappitaṃ chalaṃ vadati etenāti chalavādo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘chalavādassa kāraṇattā chalavādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vacanasāmaññamattaṃ^eb^ atthabhūtaṃ tadatthaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāya. ^b^‘‘Vicāretabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, kimettha vicāretabbaṃ. Yadipi pakkhassa ṭhapanāmūlakaṃ anujānanāvajānanānaṃ micchābhāvadassanaṃ tabbisayattā, pāpanāropanāhi eva pana so vibhāvīyati, na ṭhapanāyāti pākaṭoyamattho.

4-5.^b^Tenā^eb^ti sakavādinā. ^b^Tena niyāmenā^eb^ti yena niyāmena sakavādinā catūhi pāpanāropanāhissa niggaho kato, tena niyāmena nayena. So niggaho dukkaṭo aniggahoyevāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘aniggahabhāvassa vā upagamitattā’’^eb^ti, pāpitattāti attho. ^b^Evamevā^eb^ti yathā ‘‘tayā mama kato niggaho’’tiādinā aniggahabhāvūpanayo vutto, evameva. ^b^Etassā^eb^ti ‘‘tena hī’’tiādinā imāya pāḷiyā vuttassa.
Anulomapaccanīkavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

7-10.^b^Aññenā^eb^ti sammutisaccabhūtena. ^b^Parassā^eb^ti sakavādino. So hi paravādinā paro nāma hoti. Paṭiññāpaṭikkhepānaṃ bhinnavisayattā ^b^‘‘avirodhitattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Abhinnādhikaraṇaṃ ^a^V0.0070^ea^ viya hi abhinnavisayameva viruddhaṃ nāma siyā, na itaranti adhippāyo. Tamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘na hi…pe… āpajjatī’’^eb^ti āha. Yadi evaṃ kathamidaṃ niggahaṭṭhānaṃ jātanti āha ^b^‘‘attano^eb^^a^M0.0073^ea^^b^panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tena paṭiññāntaraṃ nāma aññamevetaṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
Paccanīkānulomavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Suddhasaccikaṭṭhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

11. Sāmaññena vuttaṃ visesaniviṭṭhaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīreti ayamattho’’^eb^ti. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti visesatthinā viseso anupayujjitabboti. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti desavasena sabbattha paṭikkhepavacanena.

12.^b^Majjhimajātikāle^eb^ti paccuppannattabhāvakāle. Attabhāvo hi idha ‘‘jātī’’ti adhippeto. Tato atīto purimajātikālo, anāgato pacchimajātikālo. ^b^Imesu tīsū^eb^ti sabbattha, sabbadā, sabbesūti imesu tīsu nayesu. Pāṭhassa saṃkhittatā suviññeyyāti taṃ ṭhapetvā atthassa sadisataṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘idhāpi hi…pe… yojetabba’’^eb^nti āha. Etthāpi ‘‘na kenaci sabhāvena puggalo upalabbhatī’’ti ayamattho vutto hoti. Na hi kenaci sabhāvena upalabbhamānassa sakalekadesavinimutto pavattikālo nāma atthīti.
13. Tatiyanaye ^a^V0.0071^ea^ na sabbekadhammavinimuttaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti yojetabbaṃ.

14.^b^Anulomapañcakassātiādimhi^eb^^a^M0.0074^ea^ aṭṭhakathāvacane. Puna ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yathāvutte aṭṭhakathāvacane, tesu vā anulomapañcakapaccanīkesu. ^b^Sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatī^eb^tiādikassa pāṭhappadesassa attho ‘‘sarīraṃ sandhāyā’’tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo attho. ^b^Paṭikammādipāḷi^eb^nti paṭikammaniggahaupanayananigamanapāḷiṃ. ^b^Tīsu mukhesū^eb^ti ‘‘sabbatthā’’tiādinā vuttesu tīsu vādamukhesu. Paccanīkassa pāḷi vuttāti sambandho. ^b^Ta^eb^nti pāḷiṃ. Saṅkhipitvā āgatattā ^b^sarūpena avutte. Suddhika…pe… vuttaṃ hoti^eb^ tattha ‘‘sabbatthā’’tiādinā sarīrādino parāmasanaṃ natthi, idha atthīti ayameva viseso, aññaṃ samānanti.
Saccikaṭṭhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

17-27. Saccikaṭṭhassa, saccikaṭṭhe vā saṃsandanaṃ saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandananti samāsadvayaṃ bhavatīti dassento ^b^‘‘saccikaṭṭhassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^saccikaṭṭhassa puggalassā^eb^ti saccikaṭṭhasabhāvassa paramatthato vijjamānasabhāvassa puggalassa. ^b^Rūpādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsandana^eb^nti saccikaṭṭhatāsāmaññena rūpādīhi samīkaraṇaṃ. ^b^Saccikaṭṭhe^eb^ti saccikaṭṭhahetu, tattha vā taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. ‘‘Tulyayoge samuccayo’’ti samuccayatthattā eva ca-kārassa saccikaṭṭhena upaladdhisāmaññena ^a^V0.0072^ea^ idha rūpamāhaṭanti tassa udāhaṭabhāvo yuttoti ^b^‘‘yathārūpa’’nti nidassanavasena attho vutto,^eb^ aññathā idha rūpassa āharaṇameva kimatthiyaṃ. Evaṃ sesadhammesupi. Yā panettha aññattapucchā, sāpi nidassanatthaṃ upabrūheti aññattanibandhanattā tassa. Opammasaṃsandane pana nidassanattho gāhīyatīti imasmiṃ suddhikasaṃsandane kevalaṃ samuccayavaseneva atthadassanaṃ yuttanti adhippāyo. Rūpādīni upādāpaññattimattattā puggalassa so tehi añño, anañño cāti na vattabboti ayaṃ sāsanakkamoti āha ^b^‘‘rūpādīhi…pe… samayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuññāyamāne^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye sutte ca appaṭikkhipiyamāne. Ayañca attho sāsanikassa paravādino vasena vuttoti veditabbaṃ.

^b^‘‘Ājānāhi^eb^^a^M0.0075^ea^^b^niggaha’’nti pāṭho diṭṭho bhavissati,^eb^ aññathā ‘‘paṭilomapañcakāni dassitāni, paṭikammacatukkādīni saṃkhittānī’’ti na sakkā vattunti adhippāyo. Codanāya vinā paravādino paṭijānāpanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭijānāpanatthanti…pe… codanattha’’^eb^nti. Codanāpubbakañhi tassa paṭijānāpanaṃ. Tena phalavohārena kāraṇaṃ vuttanti dasseti. ^b^Abyākatattā^eb^ti abyākaraṇīyattā, bhagavatā vā na byākatattā. ^b^Yadi ṭhapanīyattā paṭikkhipitabba^eb^nti imasmiṃ paccanīkanaye ṭhapanīyattā pañhassa sakavādinā paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. ^b^Parenapī^eb^ti paravādināpi ṭhapanīyattā laddhimeva nissāya anulomanaye paṭikkhepo katoti ^b^ayamettha^eb^ suddhikasaṃsandanāya ^b^adhippāyo yutto^eb^ anulomepi rūpādīhi aññattacodanāyameva paravādinā paṭikkhepassa katattāti adhippāyo.
Suddhikasaṃsandanavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

28-36.^b^Upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā cā^eb^ti iminā dvayampi uddharati upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā, upaladdhisāmaññena pucchā cāti. Tattha pacchimaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ samānatā’’^eb^tiādi. Tassattho – dvinnaṃ rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ saccikaṭṭhena samānatā ^a^V0.0073^ea^ tesaṃ aññattassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ na hoti. ^b^Atha kho…pe… upalabbhanīyatā^eb^ti idañca saṃsandanaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ hettha adhippāyo – yadi saccikaṭṭhasāmaññena rūpapuggalānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññaṃ icchitaṃ, teneva nesaṃ aññattampi icchitabbaṃ. Atha paramatthavohārabhedato tesaṃ aññattaṃ na icchitaṃ, tato eva upaladdhisāmaññampi na icchitabbanti.
37-45.^b^Upaladdhī^eb^ti puggalassa upaladdhi vijjamānatā. ‘‘Paṭikammapañcaka’’nti viññāyatīti yojanā.
Opammasaṃsandanavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

46-52.^b^Ekadhammatopī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0076^ea^ sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhesu ekadhammatopi. Etena tato sabbatopi puggalassa aññattānanujānanaṃ dasseti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘sakalaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāyā’’ti. ^b^Rūpādiekekadhammavasena nānuyuñjitabbo^eb^ avayavabyatirekena samudāyassa abhāvato. Yasmā pana samudāyāvayavā bhinnasabhāvā, tasmā ^b^‘‘samudāyato…pe… niggahāraho siyā’’^eb^ti paravādino āsaṅkamāha. ^b^Etaṃ vacanokāsa^eb^nti yadipi sattapaññāsadhammasamudāyato puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati tabbinimuttassa saccikaṭṭhassa abhāvato, tadekadesato panassa anaññattampi na icchateva. Na hi samudāyo avayavo hotīti. Tasmā ‘‘taṃ paṭikkhipato kiṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti vattuṃ mā labbhethā’’ti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Rūpādidhammappabhedavibhāgamukheneva anavasesato puggaloti gahaṇākāradassanavasena pavatto paṭhamavikappo, dutiyo pana avibhāgato paramatthasaccabhāvasāmaññenāti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vikappānaṃ viseso. ^b^Itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasananti āha ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^nti.

^b^Sabhāvavinibbhogato^eb^ti sabhāvena vinibbhujjitabbato. Sabhāvabhinno hi dhammo tadaññadhammato vinibbhogaṃ labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rūpato aññasabhāgattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpavajje^eb^ti rūpadhammavajje ^a^V0.0074^ea^. ^b^Tīsupī^eb^ti ‘‘rūpasmiṃ puggalo, aññatra rūpā, puggalasmiṃ rūpa’’nti imesu evaṃ pavattesu tīsupi anuyogesu. Sāsaniko evāyaṃ puggalavādīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘na hi so sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ icchatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Rūpavā’’ti iminā rūpena sakiñcanatāva ñāpīyati, na rūpāyattavuttitāti āha ^b^‘‘aññatra rūpāti ettha ca rūpavā puggaloti ayamattho saṅgahito’’^eb^ti.
Catukkanayasaṃsandanavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Niṭṭhitā ca saṃsandanakathāvaṇṇanā.
54. Lakkhaṇayuttikathāyaṃ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ‘‘chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ ājānāhi niggaha’’nti pāṭho gahetabbo.
Lakkhaṇayuttivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

55-59.^b^Padadvayassa atthato ekatte^eb^ti padadvayassa ekattatthe satīti attho. Parikappavacanañhetaṃ dosadassanatthaṃ ‘‘evaṃ sante ayaṃ doso’’ti. Tayidaṃ ekattaṃ upalabbhati evāti pacchimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Kehici puggalo kehici na puggalo’’ti byabhicāradassanato parena na sampaṭicchitanti katvā tameva asampaṭicchitattaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘puggalassa hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^avibhajitabbata^eb^nti ‘‘upalabbhati cā’’ti evaṃ avibhajitabbataṃ. ^b^Vibhajitabbata^eb^nti ‘‘puggalo ca tadaññañca upalabbhatī’’ti evaṃ vibhajitabbataṃ. Etena ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati evā’’ti pacchimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na ‘‘puggalo eva upalabbhatī’’ti imamatthaṃ dasseti. ^b^Taṃ vibhāga^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ vibhajitabbāvibhajitabbaṃ vibhāgaṃ ^b^vadato^eb^ sakavādino, aññassa vā kassaci. ^b^Etassā^eb^ti paravādino ^a^V0.0075^ea^. ^b^Yathāvuttavibhāga^eb^nti ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati…pe… kehici na puggalo’’ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ vibhāgaṃ. ^b^Yathāāpāditenā^eb^ti ‘‘puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa atthato ekatte’’tiādinā āpāditappakārena. ^b^Na bhavitabba^eb^nti yadipi tena puggalo upalabbhati eva vuccati, upalabbhatīti pana puggalo eva na vuccati, atha kho aññopi, tasmā yathāvuttena pasaṅgena na bhavitabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggitabbo ettha adhippāyo’’^eb^ti.
60.^b^Atthato puggalo natthīti vuttaṃ hoti^eb^ attasuññatādassanena anattalakkhaṇassa vihitattā.
Vacanasodhanavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

61-66.^b^Rūpakāyāvirahaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0078^ea^^b^sandhāya āha,^eb^ na rūpataṇhāsabbhāvaṃ. Tathā sati anekantikattā paṭikkhipitabbameva siyā, na anujānitabbanti. ‘‘Atthitāyā’’ti āhāti sambandho. ^b^Kāmībhāvassa anekantikattā^eb^ kassaci kāmadhātūpapannassa ^b^kāmadhātuyā āyattattābhāvato ca^eb^ kadāci bhāvassevāti yojanā.

67.^b^Kāyānupassanāyā^eb^ti kāyānupassanādesanāya. Sā hi kāyakāyānupassīnaṃ vibhāgaggahaṇassa kāraṇabhūtā, kāyānupassanā eva vā. ^b^Evaṃladdhikattā^eb^ti añño kāyo añño puggaloti evaṃladdhikattā. ^b^Āhacca bhāsita^eb^nti ṭhānakaraṇāni āhantvā kathitaṃ, bhagavatā sāmaṃ desitanti attho.
Paññattānuyogavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

69-72. Yānissa ^a^V0.0076^ea^ suttāni nissāya laddhi uppannā, tesaṃ dassanato parato ‘‘tena hi puggalo sandhāvatī’’tiādinā pāḷi āgatā, purato pana ‘‘na vattabbaṃ puggalo sandhāvatī’’tiādinā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dassento…pe… bhavitabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dassetvāti vā vattabba^eb^nti ‘‘yānissa…pe… tāni dassetvā ‘tena hi puggalo sandhāvatī’tiādimāhā’’ti vattabbanti attho. ^b^Dassento^eb^ti vā idaṃ dassanakiriyāya na vattamānatāmattavacanaṃ, atha kho tassā lakkhaṇatthavacanaṃ, hetubhāvavacanaṃ vāti na koci doso.

91.^b^So vattabbo^eb^ti so jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpajjanākāro vattabbo, natthīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Rūpī attā’’ti imissā laddhiyā vasena ‘‘yena rūpasaṅkhātena attano sabhāvabhūtena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchatī’’ti evaṃ pana atthe sati so ākāro vutto eva hoti, tathā ca sati ‘‘rūpaṃ puggaloti ananuññātattā’’ti evampi vattuṃ na sakkā. Yasmā pana ‘‘idha sarīranikkhepā’’ti anantaraṃ vakkhati, tasmā ^a^M0.0079^ea^ ‘‘so vattabbo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nirayūpagassa puggalassa antarābhavaṃ na icchatī^eb^ti idaṃ purātanānaṃ antarābhavavādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Adhunātanā pana ‘‘uddhaṃpādo tu nārako’’ti vadantā tassapi antarābhavaṃ icchanteva, keci pana asaññūpagānaṃ. Arūpūpagānaṃ pana sabbepi na icchanti. Tattha ye ‘‘saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī’’ti suttassa atthaṃ micchā gahetvā cutūpapātakālesu asaññīnaṃ saññā atthīti antarābhavatova asaññūpapattiṃ icchanti, tadaññesaṃ vasena ‘‘savedano…pe… paṭikkhipatī’’ti dassento ^b^‘‘ye panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ke panevaṃ icchanti? Sabbatthivādīsu ekacce.
92.^b^Nevasaññānāsaññāyatane^eb^ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatane bhave, acittuppāde vā saññā atthīti icchantīti na vattabbanti sambandho. Yato so saññābhavena asaṅgahito, bhavantarabhāvena ca saṅgahito.

93.^b^Indhanupādāno aggi viya indhanena rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādinā vinā natthī^eb^ti ettha ayamadhippāyavibhāvanā – yathā na vinā indhanena aggi paññāpīyati, na ca taṃ aññaṃ indhanato sakkā paṭijānituṃ, nāpi anaññaṃ. Yadi hi aññaṃ siyā, na uṇhaṃ indhanaṃ ^a^V0.0077^ea^ siyā, atha anaññaṃ, nidahitabbaṃyeva dāhakaṃ siyā, evaṃ na vinā rūpādīhi puggalo paññāpīyati, na ca tehi añño, nāpi anañño sassatucchedabhāvappasaṅgatoti paravādino adhippāyo. Tattha yadi aggindhanopamā lokavohārena vuttā, apaḷittaṃ kaṭṭhādiindhanaṃ nidahitabbañca, paḷittaṃ bhāsuruṇhaṃ aggidāhakañca, tañca ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ pabandhavasena pavattaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ. Yadi evaṃ puggalo rūpādīhi añño anicco ca āpanno, atha paramatthato ca, tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhādisaññite rūpasaṅkhātapaḷitte yaṃ usumaṃ so aggi taṃsahajātāni tīṇibhūtāni indhanaṃ. Evampi siddhaṃ lakkhaṇabhedato aggindhanānaṃ aññattanti aggi viya indhanato rūpādīhi añño puggalo anicco ca āpajjatīti.
Gatianuyogavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

97. Nīlaguṇayogato ^a^M0.0080^ea^ nīlo, nīlo eva nīlako, tassa, ayaṃ panassa nīlapaññatti nīlarūpupādānāti āha ^b^‘‘nīlaṃ…pe… paññattī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ pana pāṭhe ṭhite nīlaṃ upādāya nīloti kathamayaṃ paduddhāroti āha ^b^‘‘nīlaṃ rūpaṃ…pe… ettha yo puṭṭho nīlaṃ upādāya nīlo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ vacane. ^b^Tadādīsū^eb^ti ‘‘pītaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyā’’tiādikaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena gahitameva tadatthadassanavasena gaṇhāti.
98.^b^Vutta^eb^nti ‘‘maggakusalo’’tiādīsu chekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Kusalapaññattiṃ^eb^ kusalavohāraṃ.
112.^b^Pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā uttaramāhā^eb^ti paravādī pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā sakavādissa uttaramāha.

115. ‘‘Rūpaṃ rūpavā’’tiādinayappavattaṃ paravādivādaṃ bhindituṃ ‘‘yathā na nigaḷo negaḷiko’’tiādinā ^a^V0.0078^ea^ sakavādivādo āraddhoti āha ^b^‘‘yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti uttarapakkhe vuttaṃ vacanaṃ uddharitvā’’^eb^ti.
118.^b^Viññāṇanissayabhāvūpagamana^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvūpagamanaṃ. Tayidaṃ visesanaṃ ^b^cakkhussā^eb^ti imināva siddhanti na kataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
Upādāpaññattānuyogavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
123.^b^Kammāna^eb^nti kusalākusalakammānaṃ. Taggahaṇeneva hi taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇīye kiriyānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Nipphādakappayojakabhāvenā^eb^ti kārakakārāpakabhāvena.

125.^b^Kammakārakassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^yo^eb^ añño puggalo kārako. ^b^Tenapī^eb^ti kārakakārakenapi. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti kārakakārakassa. ^b^Añña^eb^nti aññaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti iminā vuttappakārena. Tehi tehi kārakehi puggalā viya aññāni kammāni karīyantīti dasseti. Tenāha ^a^M0.0081^ea^^b^‘‘kammavaṭṭassa anupacchedaṃ vadantī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ sante puggalassa kārako, kammassa kārakoti ayaṃ vibhāgo idha anāmaṭṭho hoti, tathā ca sati kārakaparamparāya vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti āha ^b^‘‘puggalassa…pe… vicāretabbameta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tassa kāraka^eb^nti puggalassa kārakaṃ. ^b^Idañcā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ puggalakārakassa kammakārakatāpattiyeva doso, atha kho idaṃ kammakārakatāya kārakaparamparāpajjanampi vicāretabbaṃ, na yujjatīti attho. Puggalānañhi paṭipāṭiyā kārakabhāvo kārakaparamparā.
170.^b^Eko anto^eb^ti ‘‘gāho’’ti sassatagāhasaṅkhāto antoti attho.

176. Siyā añño, siyā anañño, siyā na vattabbo ‘‘aññoti vā anaññoti vā’’ti ^a^V0.0079^ea^, evaṃ pavattanigaṇṭhavādasadisattā so eva eko neva so hoti, na aññoti laddhimattaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ pana natthevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parassa icchāvasenevā^eb^ti paravādino laddhivaseneva. ^b^Ekaṃ anicchantassā^eb^ti ekaṃ ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti gahaṇaṃ sassatadiṭṭhibhayena paṭikkhipantassa ^b^itaraṃ^eb^ ucchedaggahaṇaṃ āpannaṃ. Tañca paṭikkhipantassa aññaṃ missakaṃ niccāniccaggahaṇaṃ, vikkhepaggahaṇañca āpannaṃ. ^b^Kārakavedakicchāya ṭhatvā^eb^ti sveva kārako vedako cāti imasmiṃ ādāye ṭhatvā. ^b^Taṃtaṃanicchāyā^eb^ti tassa tassa vādassa asampaṭicchanena. ^b^Āpannavasenapī^eb^ti āpannagāhavasenapi ayaṃ anuyogo vuttoti yojanā. ^b^Sabbesaṃ āpannattā^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ vikappānaṃ anukkamena āpannattā nāyamanuyogo katoti yojanā. ^b^Ekekassevā^eb^ti tesu visuṃ visuṃ ekekasseva āpannattā. Tantivasena pana te vikappā ekajjhaṃ dassetvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Ekato yojetabbaṃ^eb^ catunnampi pañhānaṃ ekato puṭṭhattā.
Purisakārānuyogavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Kalyāṇavaggo niṭṭhito.

193.^b^Vikubbatī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena ‘‘dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇātī’’tiādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Abhiññānuyogo daṭṭhabboti yojanā. ^b^Tadabhiññāvato^eb^ti āsavakkhayābhiññāvato. ^b^Arahato sādhana^eb^nti arahato saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena puggalattābhāvasādhanaṃ. ^b^Tabbhāvassā^eb^ti arahattassa. Arahattadhārānañhi khandhā nāma puggalattaṃ tassapi hotīti.
Abhiññānuyogavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

209.^b^Tatiyakoṭibhūtassā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0080^ea^ tatiyakoṭisabhāvassa saṅkhatāsaṅkhatavinimuttasabhāvassa. ^b^Sabhāvassā^eb^ti ca sabhāvadhammassa. ^b^Laddhiṃ nigūhitvā^eb^ti puggalo neva saṅkhato, nāsaṅkhatoti laddhiṃ avibhāvetvā.
Ñātakānuyogādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
218.^b^Pajānanaṃ nāma na hoti^eb^ nibbidādīnaṃ appaccayattā. Paricchedanasamatthatañca dassetīti sambandho.

228.^b^Saharūpabhāvo^eb^ rūpena samaṅgitā, ^b^vinārūpabhāvo^eb^ tato vinissaṭatāti tadubhayaṃ rūpassa abbhantaragamanaṃ bahinikkhamanañca hoti. Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ saharūpabhāvavinārūpabhāvānaṃ lakkhaṇavacananti vuttaṃ.

237.^b^Oḷāriko^eb^ti thūlo. Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti ^b^attā,^eb^ attabhāvo. So eva yathāsakaṃ kammunā paṭilabhitabbato ^b^paṭilābho^eb^. Padadvayenapi kāmāvacarattabhāvo kathito. ^b^Manomayo attapaṭilābho^eb^ rūpāvacarattabhāvo. So hi jhānamanena nibbattattā ^a^M0.0083^ea^ manomayo. ^b^Arūpo attapaṭilābho^eb^ti arūpāvacarattabhāvo. So hi rūpena amissitattā arūpoti evamettha attho veditabbo. ‘‘Attā’’ti pana jīve lokavohāro niruḷho, asatipi jīve tathāniruḷhaṃ lokavohāraṃ gahetvā sammāsambuddhāpi voharantīti dassento ^b^‘‘iti imā lokassa samaññā, yāhi tathāgato voharatī’’^eb^ti vatvā idāni yathā voharanti, taṃ pakāraṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘aparāmasa’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

^b^Paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti kakkhaḷaphusanādisalakkhaṇavasena aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena ca. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasenā’’tiādinā vuttena paramatthato puggalābhāvavacanena ^a^V0.0081^ea^. ^b^Ito purimā^eb^ti tattha tattha sakavādipaṭikkhepādivibhāvanavasena pavattā ito atthasaṃvaṇṇanato purimā. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti vā ‘‘yathā rūpādayo dhammā’’tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanena. ^b^Yathā cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho. Tena samaññānatidhāvanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā parāmāso ca na hoti janapadaniruttiyā abhinivisitabbato, yathā ca samaññātidhāvanaṃ na hoti, evaṃ ito purimā ca atthavaṇṇanā yojetabbā. Samaññātidhāvane hi sati sabbalokavohārūpacchedo siyāti.

^b^Tasmā sacca^eb^nti yasmā tattha paramatthākāraṃ anāropetvā samaññaṃ nātidhāvanto kevalaṃ lokasammutiyāva voharati, tasmā saccaṃ paresaṃ avisaṃvādanato. ^b^Tathakāraṇa^eb^nti tatho avitatho dhammasabhāvo kāraṇaṃ pavattihetu etassāti tathakāraṇaṃ, paramatthavacanaṃ, aviparītadhammasabhāvavisayanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammānaṃ tathatāya pavatta’’^eb^nti.
Paṭivedhānuyogādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Puggalakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

239.^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0084^ea^^a^V0.0082^ea^^b^sutta^eb^nti idaṃ lakkhaṇamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ‘‘Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī’’ti (a. ni. 5.149-150) idampi hi suttaṃ anāgāmiādīnaṃyeva parihāninissayo, na arahato. ^b^Samayavimutto^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino sekkhassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yathāha –

‘‘Katamo ca puggalo samayavimutto? Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samayavimutto’’ti (pu. pa. 1).

‘‘Parihānidhammo’’ti ca puthujjano ca ekacco ca sekkho adhippeto, na arahāti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā yathādassitāni suttāni anāgāmiādīnaṃ parihāniladdhiyā nissayo, na arahato, tasmā. Taṃ nissāya taṃ apekkhitvā yasmā ‘‘arahatopī’’ti ettha arahatopi parihāni, ko pana vādo anāgāmiādīnanti ayamattho labbhati, tasmā pi-saddasampiṇḍitamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘arahatopi…pe… yojetabba’’^eb^nti āha. Yasmā vā kāmañcettha dutiyasuttaṃ sekkhavasena āgataṃ, paṭhamatatiyasuttāni pana asekkhavasenapi āgatānīti tesaṃ laddhi, tasmā ‘‘arahatopī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ suttaṃ arahato’’^eb^tiādi.

^b^Tatiyasmi^eb^nti ‘‘sabbesaññeva arahantānaṃ parihānī’’ti etasmiṃ pañhe. So hi ‘‘sabbeva arahanto’’tiādinā ^a^V0.0083^ea^ āgatesu tatiyo pañho. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti mudindriyānaṃ. ^b^Tatiyasmimpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo vuttatthasamuccayo. Tena paṭhamapañhaṃ samuccinoti ‘‘tatthapi tikkhindriyā adhippetā’’ti.

^b^Soyeva na parihāyatī^eb^ti sotāpannoyeva sotāpannabhāvato na parihāyatīti attho. Na cettha sakadāgāmibhāvāpattiyā sotāpannabhāvāpagamo parihāni hoti visesādhigamabhāvato. Pattavisesato ^a^M0.0085^ea^ hi parihānīti. ^b^Itare^eb^ti sakadāgāmiādikā. ^b^Uparimaggatthāyā^eb^ti uparimaggattayapaṭilābhatthāya ‘‘niyato’’ti vuttamatthaṃ aggahetvā.
Vādayuttiparihānikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

241.^b^Tato^eb^ti arahattato. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti dassanamaggaphale. ^b^Vāyāmenā^eb^ti vipassanussāhanena. ^b^Tadanantara^eb^nti sotāpattiphalānantaraṃ. Paṭhamaṃ dassanamaggaphalānantaraṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, tato parihīno puna vāyamanto tadanantaraṃ na arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti kā ettha yuttīti adhippāyo. Paravādī nāma yuttampi vadati ayuttampīti kiṃ tassa vāde yuttigavesanāyāti pana daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aparihānasabhāvo bhāvanāmaggo ariyamaggattā dassanādassanamaggo viya. Na cettha asiddhatāsaṅkā lokuttaramaggassa parassapi ariyamaggabhāvassa siddhattā, nāpi lokiyamaggena anekantikatā ariyasaddena visesitattā. Tathā na viruddhatā dutiyamaggādīnaṃ bhāvanāmaggabhāvassa oḷārikakilesappahānādīnañca parassapi āgamato siddhattā.
Ariyapuggalasaṃsandanaparihānikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
265. Puggalapaññattiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V0.0084^ea^ ‘‘patti, phusanā’’ti ca paccakkhato adhigamo adhippetoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pattabbaṃ vadatīti āha phusanāraha’’^eb^nti.
267.^b^Katasanniṭṭhānassā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sattāhe māse utumhi antovasse vā aññaṃ ārādhessāmīti katanicchayassa.
Suttasādhanaparihānikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Parihānikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

269.^b^Heṭṭhāpī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0086^ea^^a^V0.0085^ea^ paranimmitavasavattidevehi heṭṭhāpi. ^b^Maggabhāvanampi na icchantīti viññāyati^eb^ ‘‘idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti iminā ‘‘dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti upaladdhivasenā’’ti vuttattā.

270.^b^Tassevā^eb^ti paravādino eva. ^b^Puggalavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devāna’’nti evaṃ puggalavasena. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti paravādino. ^b^Paṭikkhepo na yutto^eb^ti evaṃ puggalavasena atthayojanā na yuttāti adhippāyo. Puggalādhiṭṭhānena pana katāpi atthavaṇṇanā okāsavasena paricchijjatīti nāyaṃ doso. ^b^Tassāyaṃ adhippāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘gihīnañcevā’’tiādinā vutto tassa paravādino yadi adhippāyo, evaṃ saññāya paravādino sakavādinā samānādāyoti na niggahāraho siyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saka…pe… tabbo’’^eb^ti. Paṭhamaṃ pana anujānitvā pacchā paṭikkhepeneva niggahetabbatā veditabbā. Keci ‘‘yattha natthi pabbajjā, natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti pucchāya ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ maggappaṭivedhaṃ sandhāya paravādino paṭikkhepo. Yadipi so devānaṃ maggappaṭilābhaṃ na icchati, sambhavantaṃ pana sabbaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘gihīna’micceva avatvā ‘ekaccānañca devāna’nti vutta’’nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ ‘‘sandhāyā’’ti vuttattā, purimoyevattho yutto.
Suddhabrahmacariyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

273.^b^Rūpāvacaramaggenā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0086^ea^ rūpāvacarajjhānena. Tañhi rūpabhavūpapattiyā upāyabhāvato maggoti vutto. Yathāha ‘‘rūpupapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī’’ti (dha. sa. 160). ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ. ‘‘Idhavihāyaniṭṭhahetubhūto rūpāvacaramaggo’’tiādikaṃ dīpentaṃ vacanaṃ anāgāmimaggassa tabbhāvadīpakena ‘‘idha bhāvitamaggo’’tiādikena kathaṃ sametīti codetvā yathā sameti ^a^M0.0087^ea^, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pubbe panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^‘‘pubbe’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘idha bhāvitamaggo’’tiādikaṃ vadanti, idhāpi pana ‘‘rūpāvacaramaggenā’’tiādikaṃ. Tattha ^b^anāgāmī evā^eb^ti anāgāmiphalaṭṭho eva. ^b^Jhānānāgāmī^eb^ti asamucchinnajjhattasaṃyojanopi rūpabhave uppajjitvā anāvattidhammamaggaṃ bhāvetvā tattheva parinibbāyanato. ^b^Adhippāyo^eb^ti yathāvutto dvinnaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ avirodhadīpako adhippāyo.

^b^Idhā^eb^ti kāmaloke. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti brahmaloke. Ettha ca paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo ‘‘tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehī’’ti suttaṃ kiṃ yathārutavasena gahetabbatthaṃ, udāhu sandhāyabhāsitanti? Tattha jānamāno sandhāyabhāsitanti vadeyya. Aññathā ‘‘paranimmitavasavattideve upādāyā’’tiādi vattuṃ na sakkā ‘‘deve ca tāvatiṃse’’ti vuttattā. Yathā hi tassa ‘‘seyyathāpi devehi tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ mantetvā’’tiādīsu viya sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya kāmāvacaradevesu tāvatiṃsadevā pākaṭā paññātāti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na teyeva adhippetāti suttapadassa sandhāyabhāsitatthaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti etthāpi anavajjasukhaabyāsekasukhanekkhammasukhādisannissayabhāvena mahānisaṃsatāya sāsane pabbajjā ‘‘idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti imasmiṃ sutte adhippetā. Sā hi uttarakurukānaṃ devānañca anokāsabhāvato dukkarā dullabhā ca. Tattha sūriyaparivattādīhipi devesu maggapaṭilābhāya atthitā vibhāvetabbā, uttarakurukānaṃ pana visesānadhigamabhāvo ubhinnampi icchito evāti.
Saṃsandanabrahmacariyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Brahmacariyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

274.^b^Odhiso^eb^ti ^a^V0.0087^ea^ bhāgaso, bhāgenāti attho. Bhāgo nāma yasmā ekadeso hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘ekadesena ekadesenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa catubhāgehi pahānaṃ ‘‘odhiso pahāna’’nti adhippetaṃ, icchitamevetaṃ sakavādissa ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā’’ti ^a^M0.0088^ea^ ca ādivacanato. Yasmā pana maggo catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaro, na ekābhisamayavasenāti paravādino laddhi, tasmā yathā ‘‘maggo kālena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, kālena samudayaṃ pajahatī’’tiādinā nānakkhaṇavasena saccesu pavattatīti icchito, evaṃ paccekampi nānakkhaṇavasena pavatteyya. Tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesaekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘sotāpatti…pe… ekadese pajahatī’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Sati hi nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ dukkhadassanādīhi ekadesaekadesappahānaṃ siyāti ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhāditā, tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ. Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno, asotāpanno cāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno’’^eb^tiādi.

Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo ‘‘maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati, udāhu kiccato’’ti. Yadi ārammaṇatoti vadeyya, tassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantaparicchedasamucchedā na yuttā tato anissaṭattā, tathā maggadassanaṃ. Na hi sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ, maggantaraparikappanāyaṃ anavaṭṭhānaṃ āpajjatīti, tasmā tīṇi saccāni kiccato, nirodhaṃ kiccato ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evamasammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī’’tiādi. Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi so passatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1100) ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino aññasaccadassanasamaṅgibhāvavicāraṇāyaṃ tadatthasādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā gavaṃpatittherena ābhatattā paccekañca saccattayadassanassa yojitattā. Aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassane dukkhādidassanamayojanīyaṃ ^a^V0.0088^ea^ siyā. Na hi lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakāribhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā. Tathā yojane ca sabbaṃ dassanaṃ ^a^M0.0089^ea^ dassanantaraparanti dassanānuparamo siyā. Evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayassa asambhavato paccekaṃ maggānaṃ odhiso pahānaṃ natthīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
Odhisokathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

280. Yadipi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘tayo magge bhāvetī’’ti vuttaṃ, maggabhāvanā pana yāvadeva kilesasamucchindanatthāti ñatvā ^b^‘‘kiccasabbhāvanti tīhi pahātabbassa pahīnata’’^eb^nti āha. Tattha ^b^tīhī^eb^ti heṭṭhimehi tīhi ariyamaggehi ^b^pahātabbassa^eb^ ajjhattasaṃyojanassa pahīnataṃ samucchindananti attho. ^b^Taṃ pana kicca^eb^nti adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanesu maggassa pahānābhisamayakiccaṃ. ^b^Teneva maggenā^eb^ti anāgāmimaggeneva. ^b^Etaṃ na sametī^eb^ti evaṃ magguppādato pageva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīyantīti laddhikittanaṃ iminā maggassa kiccasabbhāvakathanena na sameti na yujjati. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti iminā yathāvuttameva virodhaṃ paccāmasati. ^b^Pahīnāna^eb^nti vikkhambhitānaṃ. Yo hi jhānalābhī jhānena yathāvikkhambhite kilese maggena samucchindati, so idhādhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dassanamagge…pe… adhippāyo’’^eb^ti.
Jahatikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

282.^b^Sabbaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0089^ea^^b^atthī^eb^ti ettha yasmā paccuppannaṃ viya atītānāgatampi dharamānasabhāvanti paravādino laddhi, tasmā ^b^sabba^eb^nti kālavibhāgato atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ. So pana ‘‘yampi natthi, tampi atthī’’ti kālavimuttassa vasena anuyogo, taṃ atippasaṅgadassanavasena paravādipaṭiññāya dosāropanaṃ. Nayadassanaṃ vā atītānāgatānaṃ natthibhāvassa. ^b^Atthī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0090^ea^ pana ayaṃ atthibhāvo yasmā desakālākāradhammehi vinā na hoti, tasmā taṃ tāva tehi saddhiṃ yojetvā anuyogaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘sabbattha sabbamatthī’’tiādinā pāḷi pavattā. Tattha yadipi ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti idaṃ sāmaññavacanaṃ, taṃ pana yasmā visesaniviṭṭhaṃ hoti, parato ca ^b^sabbesū^eb^ti dhammā vibhāgato vuccanti, tasmā oḷārikassa pākaṭassa rūpadhammasamudāyassa vasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīre’’ti vuttaṃ, nidassanamattaṃ vā etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā ca kāṇādakāpilehi paṭiññāyamānā ākāsakālādisattapakatipurisā viya paravādinā paṭiññāyamānaṃ sabbaṃ sabbabyāpīti āpannameva hotīti. ‘‘Sabbattha sarīre’’ti ca ‘‘tile tela’’nti viya byāpane bhummanti sarīrapariyāpannena sabbena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sirasi pādā…pe… attho’’^eb^ti.

Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbamatthīti yojanā. Etasmiṃ pakkheyevassa aññavādo paridīpito siyā ‘‘yaṃ atthi, attheva taṃ, yaṃ natthi, nattheva taṃ, asato natthi sambhavo, sato natthi vināso’’ti. Evaṃ sabbenākārena sabbaṃ sabbesu dhammesu sabbaṃ atthīti atthoti sambandho. Imehi pana pakkhehi ‘‘sabbaṃ sabbasabhāvaṃ, anekasattinicitābhāvā asato natthi sambhavo’’ti vādo paridīpito siyā. ^b^Yogarahita^eb^nti kenaci yuttāyuttalakkhaṇasaṃyogarahitaṃ. ^b^Taṃ pana ekasabhāva^eb^nti saṃyogarahitaṃ nāma atthato ekasabhāvaṃ, ekadhammoti attho. Etena devavādīnaṃ brahmadassanaṃ atthevātivādo paridīpito siyā. ^b^Atthīti pucchatī^eb^ti yadi sabbamatthīti tava vādo, yathāvuttāya mama diṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhibhāvo atthīti ekantena tayā sampaṭicchitabbo, tasmā ‘‘kiṃ so atthī’’ti pucchatīti attho.
Vādayuttivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

285.^b^Atītā^eb^^a^V0.0090^ea^^b^…pe… karitvā^eb^ti etthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – atītaṃ anāgatanti rūpassa imaṃ visesaṃ, evaṃ visesaṃ vā rūpaṃ aggahetvā paccuppannatāvisesavisiṭṭharūpameva appiyaṃ paccuppannarūpabhāvānaṃ samānādhikaraṇattā etasmiṃyeva ^a^M0.0091^ea^ visaye appetabbaṃ, vacīgocaraṃ pāpetabbaṃ satipi nesaṃ visesanavisesitabbatāsaṅkhāte vibhāge tathāpi avibhajitabbaṃ katvāti. Yasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘paccuppannanti vā rūpanti vā’’ti paccuppannarūpasaddehi tadatthassa vattabbākāro itisaddehi dassito, tasmā ^b^‘‘paccuppannasaddena…pe… vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Rūpapaññattī^eb^ti rūpāyatanapaññatti. Sā hi sabhāvadhammupādānā tajjāpaññatti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sabhāvaparicchinne pavattā vijjamānapaññattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpasamūhaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti taṃtaṃattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtānaṃ abhāvavibhāvanākārena pavattamānānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya. Upādānupādānampi hi upādānamevāti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti samūhupādāyādhīnatāya avijjamānapaññattibhāvato. ^b^Vigamāvattabbatā^eb^ti vigamassa vatthabhāvāpagamassa avattabbatā. Na hi odātatāvigamena avatthaṃ hoti. Na pana yuttā rūpabhāvassa vigamāvattabbatāti yojanā. ^b^Rūpabhāvo^eb^ti ca rūpāyatanasabhāvo cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhāvo. Na hi tassa paccuppannabhāvavigame vigamāvattabbatā yuttā.
Kālasaṃsandanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

288.^b^Anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho yathā ‘‘khadire vā bandhitabbaṃ palāse vā’’ti. Tasmā ‘‘hutvā hotī’’ti ettha hoti-saddo anāgatapaccuppannesu yaṃ kiñci padhānaṃ katvā sambandhaṃ labhatīti dassento ^b^‘‘anāgataṃ…pe… daṭṭhabba’’^eb^nti āha. Tattha ^b^paccuppannaṃ honta^eb^nti paccuppannaṃ jāyamānaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ labhantaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti laddhivasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tampi hutvā hotī^eb^ti yaṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhāvappattiyā ‘‘hutvā hotī’’ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ tadapi puna hutvā hotīti pucchati. ^b^Tabbhāvāvigamato^eb^ti paccuppannabhāvato hutvāhotibhāvānupagamato. ^b^Paccuppannābhāvato^eb^ti paccuppannatāya abhāvato.

^b^Vacanaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0092^ea^^a^V0.0091^ea^^b^arahatī^eb^ti iminā vacanamatte na koci dosoti dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadipi tassa puna hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāhotibhāvo natthi, punappunaṃ ñāpetabbatāya pana dutiyaṃ tato parampi tathā vattabbataṃ arahatīti ‘‘āmantā’’ti paṭijānātīti. ^b^Dhamme^eb^ti sabhāvadhamme. Tappaṭikkhepato ^b^adhamme^eb^ abhāvadhamme. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sasavisāṇe’’^eb^ti.

^b^Paṭikkhittanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘hutvā hoti, hutvā hotī’’ti ettha pubbe yadetaṃ tayā ‘‘anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī’’ti vadatā ‘‘taṃyeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna’’nti laddhivasena ‘‘anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotī’’ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotī’’ti pucchite yo paravādinā hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāabhāvato ‘‘na hevā’’ti paṭikkhepo kato, tena paṭikkhittanayena.
